Thinking up all kinds of excuses* to comfort his beloved’s heartache.

IV.

They came upon many different villages, and all were expecting them,

Ready to offer tribute, for indeed the prince was truly a man of distinction endowed with every good quality.

Thus, there was no hesitation at all because he repaid them joyfully with royal grants,

And all surrendered their hearts in homage and respect to him.

V.

It would take too long to tell of the time they spent on the road, stopping overnight here and there.

They came to Indraprastha where they were welcomed by the whole court,

Chief amongst them Kuntī and the sons of Pāṇḍu, with Yudhisthira in first place.

‘It is like a ray of light in the darkness’, thought the people throughout the land.

VI.

Without further ado, Lady Kuntī delightedly embraced Pārtha’s bride.

Because she had looked forward so eagerly to their arrival,

All she could say was: ‘My dear daughter! My son!’ so moved that her tears began to flow

And deluged the hair-knots of the two who paid her homage there before her.

VII.

As for Dharmatanaya, he too was full of joy,

As were Bhīma, the heroic Nakula and his brother, all were also overjoyed

To see Pārtha, returning as a world conqueror to his family,

Moreover, he had won the world-renowned goddess of the Yadu tribe.

VIII.

It would take so long to describe the happiness of the king and all the court.

The five sons of Pāṇḍu returned together to the palace,

Accompanied by Kuntī. Ever at the side of Subhadrā, Pārtha’s wife,

Was the Lady Dropadī, who looked to her needs and was full of affection for her.

IX.

The homage that had been prepared for them was extraordinary.

They were received with prayers of good fortune by the court priests and the foremost among learned religious leaders.

The feasting and ceremonies were perfect,

And all the ladies of noble birth, overcome with love, were happy to serve them.

X.

And thus Phalguṇa returned, his fame yet more renowned.

Ever more safe and sound was that most excellent kingdom, now restored to prosperity, knowing no impediment.

The members of each caste and stage of life,* as well as all the common people knew good fortune once again, as they had before.

Yudhistira, son of Dharma, in his most wondrous and excellent majesty, was the parasol protecting the whole world.

Canto 62

I.

He* was as perfect as god Indra. How could his power, that so abounded in goodness, be surpassed?

Shamed, the evil-doers stopped. They were destroyed and good men prospered.

The admonitions of the great seer were undiminished, for he had instructed them in the proper course for those cursed to rely on the senses.*

In short, the four brothers were the source of his strength, while the sage kept watch over the eldest among them always.

II.

Blameless was he, occupying himself constantly with his subjects, fostering dharma like a light in the darkness of the land.

Renowned throughout the world for his great courage, his might ever the strong protection of the world.

As long as the kṣatriya warriors lived in righteousness, no evil could befall those who led the hermit’s life.

In prosperity, he was the place of refuge for the helpless, caring for them, succouring them.

III.

And so, now here ends the story in praise of him who is the caretaker of the world.

It is called The Journeying of Pārtha, the work of one who humbly seeks help and audaciously presumes to imitate [great poets].

Deficient though it is, may it be received by the most excellent of men, may he not take offence at it, even though it is without merit.

May His Majesty, Surawīrya, have compassion and give his blessing to my efforts to capture beauty in verse.

Bibliography

Edited and translated by Creese (1998). Digital data furnished by the author processed tgo XML-TEI by Axelle Janiak and Arlo Griffiths (2025).

References

Creese, Helen. 1998. Pārthāyaṇa, The journeying of Pārtha: An eighteenth-century Balinese kakawin. Bibliotheca Indonesica, 27. Leiden: KITLV Press.

.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (a) S aswi for rawi (c) Q tan -->
.<lg n="7">
.<l n="a">ndah śīghrân lĕpas ing swarājya laku sang nṛpatanaya sinanggrahêng langö</l>
155<l n="b">akweh sobha taman-taman katĕmu de nira ri wĕlahan ing purāśrama</l>
.<l n="c">kaywanyân pakĕmul-kĕmul hima sawang lumuh alara mame kakingkingan</l>
.<l n="d">humbut ning lirang ārjja rumbay amĕḍar sawang angĕsah akung hameri luh</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (c) L pakĕmu-kĕmul (d) L rumambay; -->
160<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">lunghā lampah i sang narendrasuta mangkin umaliwat adoh sakêng sabhā</l>
.<l n="b">oruk tingkah ikang kināryyakĕn awarṇna salahasa yadin katoliha</l>
.<l n="c">tistis lwīr akĕkĕs-kĕkĕs kalamukan hawuk amuni langönya sungkawa</l>
.<l n="d">krām ning wai manisih ya tâbalut apiṇḍa pamatan ing unĕng linurwakĕn</l>
165</lg>
. <!-- 8 (c) L alamukan awuk -->
.<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">tĕkwan rāmya nikang basantamasa rāmya ri hawan ira rāmya tūt hĕnu</l>
.<l n="b">kāryy ânwam hangĕlih-ngĕlih sĕmi nikang kayu kasirir awarṇna koyangan</l>
170<l n="c">polahnyân angĕsah sawang pangĕsah ing ruḍita wiphala kungnya de nira</l>
.<l n="d">awrā kīrṇna tibêng lĕmah paḍa luñut kusuma nika katon sumamburat</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (b) Q angĕlih-ĕlih -->
.<lg n="10">
175<l n="a">nyagrodhânwam aneka boddhi nika yan paruruhurana len prih ambulu</l>
.<l n="b">lumrā ng pakṣy anacar paḍâsira-siran tĕka sumayab aliwran ing tahĕn</l>
.<l n="c">mĕnggĕp syungnya na medi-medi sinameni bayan ika marĕk sagocara</l>
.<l n="d">ahrit śabda nikang kuwong siniring ing walik alara tinambang ing cucur</l>
.</lg>
180<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">prāptêng pora ḍusun-ḍusun hana tĕgal-tĕgal i hiringan ing gunung-gunung</l>
.<l n="b">wwang māhwan ya paḍângaring ndan alĕbā patarukan i gagānya tūt gĕgĕr</l>
.<l n="c">dudw âmöh susu kapwa mangkana lanā gawayan ika marĕk marêng pura</l>
.<l n="d">rîndrapraṣṭha nahan prasiddha pahulanya suruhan i gawenya nityasa</l>
185</lg>
. <!-- 11 (c) R gawe nika n umarĕk, S gawa nika n umarĕk -->
.<lg n="12">
.<l n="a">mĕṇḍung wāhu sumār jawuhnya maniram-nirami tarukan ing lurah-lurah</l>
.<l n="b">mangkin kentar ado[h] himanya tĕkap ing pawana mahĕli teja ning rawi</l>
190<l n="c">bhrantā ng cātaka manglangūt ri surud ing jalada malih i rāmya ning wukir</l>
.<l n="d">hetunya n pangamarmmakĕn ri sira kelu salahasa tuminghali ng tawang</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 12 (b) L ketar; = Q -->
.<lg n="13">
195<l n="a">tan magyā ta laris nirân krama halintang i tataraban ing wanāntara</l>
.<l n="b">kweh katyāgan aneka tang kabuyutan tinĕmu nira katon paḍâhalĕp</l>
.<l n="c">lāwan maṇḍala dharmmaśāla kuṭi pājaran arĕja wihāra söh langö</l>
.<l n="d">lingsir ning sawitā pirêka lawas ing diwasa tĕka sirêng Saraswatī</l>
.</lg>
200 <!-- 13 (a) S alari -->
.<lg n="14">
.<l n="a">singgih nirmmala bañw inuttama pawitra pinakabañu ning wanāśrama</l>
.<l n="b">towin śuddha hi maikalanya n apasir-pasir analaga mādrakâḍake</l>
.<l n="c">rañjing-rañjing ikâlangö panilukanya n asaji-saji pūrṇna pangkaja</l>
205<l n="d">panglinggan ri dalĕmnya tan patatalan marahakĕna gatinya n uttama</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 14 (b) Q śuddha i; L makalanya -->
.<lg n="15">
.<l n="a">āmbĕk sang nṛpaputra harṣaja tuminghali kalĕngĕngan ing mahānadī</l>
210<l n="b">mambö rāmya ni posik ing jaladhi posik i bañu nika mosik ombakan</l>
.<l n="c">mātrânūb lari ning samīraṇa matangnya kumucak amangun larap-larap</l>
.<l n="d">ryyak-ryyaknyân lalitâmijah lwir agirang ta mamapag i sang āryya Phalguṇa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 15 (b) Q kombakan -->
215<lg n="16">
.<l n="a">hangsa śweta ya tânĕlat ri tĕngah ing sarayi mahas awarṇna manglĕngĕng</l>
.<l n="b">kahyun-hyun tumiling-tiling ri kĕtĕr ing bhramara wijah amanwa-manwakĕn</l>
.<l n="c">lwir mājar hĕning ing nadī tiki n inulwala ning anila medy aringgĕkan</l>
.<l n="d">denyâsnāna nirāgrahêng wipula pangkaja kahanan ikâpuḍe-puḍe</l>
220</lg>
. <!-- 16 (a) S sarayu (b) L māhamban hyun for kahyun-hyun -->
.<lg n="17">
.<l n="a">ngkānê lwāni pasir-pasirnya tamatan dahat adalĕm angāmbĕk-āmbĕki</l>
.<l n="b">honyêkang kaga cakrawāka kalawan priya mangalihi mendung-endungan</l>
225<l n="c">munggwîng pangkaja lot yathāsuka mapahyunan amiruru bajra keśara</l>
.<l n="d">kengĕl pwa ng harawinda marmmara kacūrṇnan i pakĕpĕk ikang wihanggama</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="18">
.<l n="a">aśrī reh ni hiring-hiringnya n ahijo paḍa marĕja bangun linangwakĕn</l>
230<l n="b">de ning śewala mĕnggĕp angragĕti pantĕs aniru-niru gātra ning pupur</l>
.<l n="c">nāntĕn têki sawang paras-paras ikang wwang ahayu sahajâmangun raras</l>
.<l n="d">lwir saptangkura sumrak anglĕlĕh i denya n awangi pakis ĕṇḍah ing bañu</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 18 (b) S don ing -->
235<lg n="19">
.<l n="a">wwantĕn satpada medran angrarah amūrwwa raras i lĕngĕng ing saroruha</l>
.<l n="b">darpanyâliwĕran ya monĕng akarang-karang angarĕki kosapêng hṛbuk</l>
.<l n="c">hūmrĕng lwir kĕtĕr ing kapat tuwin arūm lalita jaya-jayanya komala</l>
.<l n="d">lwir hūngkāra pamūrṣitanya ri narendratanaya rumĕsĕp nirāntara</l>
240</lg>
.<lg n="20">
.<l n="a">ngkā rakwân tumĕḍun sirârahup acāmana lumĕkas asūryyasaiwana</l>
.<l n="b">māryy ângel sira denya mangkin alilang twas ira tĕlas irân pangarccana</l>
.<l n="c">ndah mĕntas tumuluy sakêng bañu tathāpi kajĕnĕkana ring śilātala</l>
245<l n="d">harṣânon ri pakungnya yâwing-awingan watu hangingin-ingin mungup-mungup</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 20 (c) S tumuluya -->
.<lg n="21">
.<l n="a">len tang harṣa nirân mulat ri gati ning pingul amijah i lo nikang bañu</l>
250<l n="b">tĕkwan medi lĕkas niki n pangicipir hana gumiwang anambi ring watu</l>
.<l n="c">yêkângde kusut ing nadī jaga-jaga ng kuluma milu kawĕs marambĕhan</l>
.<l n="d">ngkā n kāgyat tĕkap ing wihangga kumucup karaṇa nika larup* marêng rĕṇĕk</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 21 (d) Q larut -->
255<lg n="22">
.<l n="a">mangkin konang-unang tikang walahar anglĕngĕngi kadi hamiṇḍa ring tawang</l>
.<l n="b">singhit pwa ng rawi rukṣa tang kusuma honya ta kasawur i pombak ing bañu</l>
.<l n="c">lwir wintang dinĕlö halĕpnya sumarambah anama-nama raśmi ning suji</l>
.<l n="d">lwir puṣpāñjali śuddha tulya pasayutnya yan angucapa rakwa ling nira</l>
260</lg>
. <!-- 22 (c) S anamar-namar -->
.<lg n="23">
.<l n="a">nyâśokâsana puṣpa bāṇa paḍa lurwa kakiraṇan i tīra ning nadī</l>
.<l n="b">kapwâśā magĕyuh langönya katawan smi ta kusuma nikang tahĕn madhu</l>
265<l n="c">tan samwas makire manis mala-malar susupana ring akung macangkrama</l>
.<l n="d">rāmyânūt ri patinggal ing bhramara māri mangarĕki hinernya yan rurū</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 23 (d) LS mangrĕki -->
.<lg n="24">
270<l n="a">rūmnya ngganya parantya ning rimang angarccana madanawilāśa ring jinĕm</l>
.<l n="b">honya ng tañjung angambwakĕn kusuma mār mrat angawadi sugandha kānginan</l>
.<l n="c">mambw ârūm panĕḍĕng nikang śikari mogha tan akalib aliṇḍungan wungū</l>
.<l n="d">tapwan marmma hure ni sāntĕn ika molur acawit ajagêng smarātura</l>
.</lg>
275 <!-- 24 (a) Q paranti ning -->
.<lg n="25">
.<l n="a">kālanya n ri tiling hyang ārkka makucĕm kalĕngĕngan ika suksĕkâlangö</l>
.<l n="b">heman tan hana ning mahas-mahas acangkrama mangucapa rūmnya ring karas</l>
.<l n="c">sis denya n wwaya tang mayūra sahajângaring-aring anamar mahas mangö</l>
280<l n="d">pantĕs yan kĕkĕsĕnya ring rasa wilāpa kalĕngĕngan ikang Saraswati</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 25 (b) Q mahas-ahas; Q ramya for rūmnya (c) R inserts (amahas) before mahas -->
.<lg n="26">
.<l n="a">manggĕh buddhi nirân mangö mingĕt-ingĕt [r]yy amĕna nira nahan rinūpaka</l>
285<l n="b">siddhā ning lumicin mangiṣṭya pawĕkas parama ṛṣi rikāna lakṣyakĕn</l>
.<l n="c">wet ning lwā nikanang daśendriya rumĕñcĕm amaribhawa litnya ring tutur</l>
.<l n="d">yêkângde hilang ing Śiwasmṛti lĕbur bisama madĕg ikang rajah tamah</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 26 (a) = Q (c) Q mamaribhawa -->
290<lg n="27">
.<l n="a">ānghing kottaman ing hiḍĕp taki-takin ring anĕmu-nĕmu tatwa ning hurip</l>
.<l n="b">byaktâwās kadi cakra ning ratha yadin hulurana lĕwu denya tan padon</l>
.<l n="c">āpañ jāti nikang śarīra taya leñ juga dadahakĕn ing yaśâdhikā</l>
.<l n="d">yêkī n kenaka ning tuwuh niyata haywa malĕmĕha ring wiṣṭi ning hayu</l>
295</lg>
. <!-- 27 (b) L huluranā -->
.<lg n="28">
.<l n="a">nāhan wastu ni de nirângangĕn-angĕn tulusa ni pangadeśa sang ṛṣi</l>
.<l n="b">lwir bhrantâkuyĕngañ juga* ng hati dhumāraṇa kapatĕha ning daśendriya.</l>
300<l n="c">āpan bheda nikang hiḍĕp ya ta maweh sukĕr alĕmĕh i sandhi ning smṛti</l>
.<l n="d">hetunya n humĕnĕng samāntaji winodanan i kĕtĕr i śabda ning kuwong</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 28 (a) R pangdesa, S pangudesa (b) = LQ, K jaga -->
.</div>
305<div type="canto" rend="met" n="2" met="navaharṣa">
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">irikā ta muwah lumaku sira ri lingsir ikang diwasa</l>
.<l n="b">paran ing twas iniṣṭi nira taya waneh nghing ikang Himawān</l>
.<l n="c">ndah amūrwwa ta lampah ira taman angel mahawan palapat</l>
310<l n="d">alangö mulat ing manuk angada-hadā ta larinya lĕyĕp</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (b) L Hīmawān -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">wangi ning wanapuṣpa maluru kasirir ya ta manglĕngĕngi</l>
.<l n="b">tan arĕn mangawe twas ira tumalingê kĕtĕr ing bhramara</l>
315<l n="c">kahiḍĕp ta pañumbwa nika kadi kĕtĕr ning amūrwwa lulut</l>
.<l n="d">araras sinamāntarakĕna ri panawwang ikang mrak arūm</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) Q kasilir -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">i pasañcayan ing wanakusuma sumār mrik amṛṣṭy arurū</l>
320<l n="b">rinarah tĕkap ing hangin umirir angimbuhi raśmi nikā</l>
.<l n="c">kadi laywan ikang kusumaśara aneka waneh sumĕlap</l>
.<l n="d">i sukĕt-sukĕt ing luru-luruk anamar sinusuk-susukan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (a) Q omits wana; S amrik -->
325<lg n="4"><l n="a">nya sudanya latângalaya kapanasan kadi śoka rapuh</l>
.<l n="b">katirah lumale sulur ika makuśā bhramitâmlas-arĕp</l>
.<l n="c">umingĕl pwa pakis haji nika hajapĕn yan awarṇna humöt</l>
.<l n="d">hana rakwa wĕlas-harĕp angulili munggw i parantyan akung</l>
.</lg>
330 <!-- 4 (d) S paraniyan -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">angĕlih sĕmi ning mangunĕng asĕmu lurwa kĕnêng kiraṇa</l>
.<l n="b">lwir angel mangĕsah lumayana ri lĕmĕsnya manganti gĕrĕh</l>
.<l n="c">akiput kumisik gĕsing ika n angaweśa ri rĕs ning unĕng</l>
.<l n="d">ri huyangnya kinolakĕna* pamĕkul ing prabhu sanmata mār</l>
335</lg>
. <!-- 5 (d) LQ kinolakĕn i -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">agĕnĕt pwa sukĕtnya puru-puru latāngkura ketnya n arĕs</l>
.<l n="b">tuwi sungsang ikânwangi riy alikukunya lumĕnghy angure</l>
.<l n="c">sumĕkar ta kayĕnya n umadĕg i jurangnya sugandha mawit</l>
340<l n="d">humĕnĕng hana cĕb luput ika dumĕling ri wĕgangnya luput</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (c) S tayĕn -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">ndah atīta lawas nṛpatanaya lumakw anusup ring alas</l>
.<l n="b">kali durgga jurang giri gahana aneka linakwa nira</l>
345<l n="c">tuwi lālana met <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>paran ira wulakan lwah anindya suci</l>
.<l n="d">patapan ya ta rakwa panginĕpan irêka tĕhĕr hiniwö<hi rend="superscript">†</hi></l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (c) L lālāna -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">anusup ta muwah nṛpatanaya susatya mahâmirati</l>
350<l n="b">ikanang wana parwwata juga pakamitra nirân winĕgil</l>
.<l n="c">ya ta rakwa mahâsĕgĕ-sĕgĕhi sirâsaji sarwwaphala</l>
.<l n="d">hana herttali rāmya ya tika sumĕneha patīrthan ira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (b) L pakamitrān winĕgil (c) Q omits mahâ-; S sumajya -->
355<lg n="9"><l n="a">tĕka rakwa sirêng Himagiri atisobha sabhānya katon</l>
.<l n="b">ndan apiṇḍa kadewatan alĕp ikang ārkka lumöng manisih</l>
.<l n="c">kahatur jaladanya sumaput aputih kadi bapra lĕngöng</l>
.<l n="d">ahurup lĕyĕp ing gagana juga lĕyĕpnya kunĕng tinahā</l>
.</lg>
360 <!-- 9 (a) L surêng for sirêng (b) S anisih -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="3" met="śikhariṇī">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">sawang mosik tingkah ni para-parah ing parwwata lĕngöng</l>
.<l n="b">bangun masyang tang cāmara kumisik osah kapawanan</l>
365<l n="c">halah herherĕn lwir ni pakusikan ing pādapa mingĕl</l>
.<l n="d">lawan lunglūnganya n lalita mangungang lot mangalaya</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ri himbang-himbangnyân wana gahana udyāna juga ya</l>
.<l n="b">katampwan krām-krām ning kiraṇa karahanyân panĕpuhi</l>
370<l n="c">mamöngpöng sāśry ârumpukana ta sĕkarnyêka dumilah</l>
.<l n="d">kadi pwâhyas harṣân tinama-tama de Paṇḍutanaya</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">wināswās tingkah ning halas ika sawang wāhw atamuyan</l>
.<l n="b">pasungsungnya jrah ning kusuma sumĕkar kapwa ya marūm</l>
375<l n="c">tahĕn tejârumbut pracala mara sinwamnya hamirah</l>
.<l n="d">hatur bāng ning lambe gĕrĕmĕ pasĕnāhanya ri sira</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">lĕbaknya kweh lwir Nandanawana mahārāmya tan alah</l>
.<l n="b">gihānyârcĕp [h]endah prasama mahalĕp warṇna racana</l>
380<l n="c">lawan wṛkṣanyâneka hana parijātânwam anĕḍĕng</l>
.<l n="d">pralĕmba lwir ning pādapa nika mure lambika mapös</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (b) = LS -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">nadīnyânūs lĕnglĕng mwang i tĕla-tĕlā ning parang arĕs</l>
385<l n="b">waneh muñcār sangkêng paras analaga lwir tasik anak</l>
.<l n="c">ri dunghus-dunghusnya n rucira manaruh rūm ning udadhi</l>
.<l n="d">prakīrṇnā ng paṇḍanyâpuḍak anidĕhi ng wungkal alangö</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">saharṣâmbĕk sang Pārtha makin umanek ring Himagiri</l>
390<l n="b">makin kāścaryyânon ri halĕp ika sākṣāt surapada</l>
.<l n="c">katungkul-tungkul denya para-parah ing Bhāratapura</l>
.<l n="d">lĕbak lungkan-lungkan yy udaya śata tīrthân kalihatan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (d) Q lungka- -->
395<lg n="7"><l n="a">jurang sūkṣmâtyantêng bisama tuwi kalyañ jaladhara</l>
.<l n="b">marok mwang wĕlkah ning walirang angaras yan pangĕmuki</l>
.<l n="c">kasöngan teja byakta tiki n atĕmah wangkawa lumöng</l>
.<l n="d">pilih sök truh ngganya n lagi kiniwat ing gĕntĕr awarah</l>
.</lg>
400 <!-- 7 (b) L araras for angaras -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">prabhā ning wwe sākṣāt ya tiki kahanan nirmmalanadī</l>
.<l n="b">pilih Ganggādwārêki winuni ri denyâparimita</l>
.<l n="c">tumampang* ta ngwang ling nira tama tiki n mangkat angalih</l>
.<l n="d">hawanyâhrit pringgâkarakal i jurangnyâringi-ringi</l>
405</lg>
. <!-- 8 (c) LR tumampā, S tumama ng -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">lĕwĕs denya n mewĕh taya gamana ning wwang tama tĕkā</l>
.<l n="b">yatan sang siddhārṣi prawara sira sang bhikṣuka huwus </l>
.<l n="c">nahan pamyaktan kottaman ira ta sang Paṇḍūtanaya</l>
410<l n="d">ndatan mewĕh prāptân tamakĕna sumadhyā parahita</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (d) S parahite -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">ḍatĕng sang Pārtha ngkā ri kahanan ikang kalyan asĕnöt</l>
.<l n="b">katon pwêkang Ganggāwiwara paramānindya wimala</l>
415<l n="c">anūs ri lwang ning gahwara mamulakan wwenya ya mulĕk</l>
.<l n="d">apan sākṣāt his ning śaśadhara hurip ning sabhuwana</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 10 (c) LQ lyang -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">sĕḍĕng prāpta ngkā sang nṛpatanaya mangkin sapurati</l>
420<l n="b">tuminghal ring Ganggâmṛtamaya haturnyêka malilang</l>
.<l n="c">apan manggĕh pangdoh ni pangawaśa ning twas salahasa</l>
.<l n="d">rikā n masnānâdyus sira tumĕḍun ing tīrthawiwara</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (b) Q ri (c) L pangaweśa -->
425</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="4" met="praharṣiṇī">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">ngkā rakwân salila ta sang narāryya Pārtha</l>
.<l n="b">lāgy âköm ri wiwara ning nadī pawitra</l>
.<l n="c">lyab-lyabnyâtiśaya maweh manah wiśuddha</l>
430<l n="d">maswadhyāya japa sirêka yan pamūjā</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">bwat nārīśwara sinamādhi sūkṣmatatwa</l>
.<l n="b">sangkêng āṣṭadala hanêng nadī pratiṣṭha</l>
.<l n="c">sūryyâtmā hinawatakĕn ring antarikṣa</l>
435<l n="d">līna dhyāna ta mapisan ri windudewa </l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">wwantĕn stry ārjja marĕk i sang narendraputra </l>
.<l n="b">raśminyânamar ari ning raras maweh kung</l>
.<l n="c">sākṣāt Karttika pangawak nikang kalangwan</l>
440<l n="d">lĕnglĕng ning wulan ajapĕn manis-manisnya</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">byaktâmungwa ri lĕngĕng ing mangö wimūrccha</l>
.<l n="b">warṇnâtruh riris alangö patahnya mār mrik</l>
.<l n="c">mwang rupnyânĕlĕhi lanâmĕḍar kilatnya </l>
445<l n="d">tejā ning muka gumawang makin rinĕngga </l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (c) Q rumnyâ- -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">ndan sang Pārtha sira tiki n tĕlas masandhyā</l>
.<l n="b">kānggĕk citta nira tumonya tan pasangkan</l>
450<l n="c"><foreign>lakṣmī</foreign> ning Himagiri Jahnawîki tan len</l>
.<l n="d">yêkā n śangsaya tumahā ring Indrajāla</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (c) = L, K lakṣmi -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">hetunya n pangucap arūm paran kitântĕn</l>
455<l n="b">prāptêng parwwata ri sĕḍĕngkw atīrthayātra</l>
.<l n="c">nāntĕn tan saparan ing anglĕngöng hiḍĕpku</l>
.<l n="d">āpan ratna ning ahajöng kitâri rakryan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">jañjan lwir* cumataka sambhawê rarasta</l>
460<l n="b">śrī ning tāman atawa rūmnya yan winimba</l>
.<l n="c">śrīdantâmithuna manisnya ring wajâkrām</l>
.<l n="d">handul munggw i gisi-gisinya lot rumangkĕp</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (a) LQ ngwang -->
465<lg n="8"><l n="a">endah tang katirah angaśrayê laṭinta</l>
.<l n="b">mwang nīlotpala ri matanta rūmnya n unggu</l>
.<l n="c">lung hing* jangga wahu lumung wwayê gulūnta</l>
.<l n="d">lingkw indung mangunĕng amiṇḍa ring patah rūm</l>
.</lg>
470 <!-- 8 (b) = L, K nilotpala (c) Q ning -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">kambang ning priyaka mĕkar yy awakta mambĕt</l>
.<l n="b">[h]astângerangi sĕmi ning haśoka lĕnglĕng</l>
.<l n="c">ndah mangkā ng wĕtis anusah tikung puḍak mrik</l>
.<l n="d">nyū dantâgĕmuh anular ta yêng stanâhrit</l>
475</lg>
. <!-- 9 (b) = LQ (c) Q omits ng -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">nāhan rakwa ling ira Pārtha yan panantwa</l>
.<l n="b">wruh tang strînggita ni manah narendraputra</l>
.<l n="c">he rakryan lĕwu amanuṣya kabwatanta</l>
480<l n="d">prāpta ngke tuwi tak anon waneh juga ngwang</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 10 (a) S nira (c) Q amanuṣa (d) R inserts (wang) before ngwang -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">hāh tan popama mara göng nikê kṛtinta</l>
.<l n="b">siddhā ning tumama marêng Himâdri durgga</l>
485<l n="c">hīnganya n putus ing inuttamâdhikāra</l>
.<l n="d">yogya n śāraṇa sang amet kawṛddhyan ing rāt</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (d) R karaṇa for śāraṇa -->
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">nā lingnyângupasama towi sārjjawâsih</l>
490<l n="b">ndan sang Phalguṇa mamanis wuwus <foreign>nirâtwang</foreign></l>
.<l n="c">wīnang dyah sang apa kitâhajöng hana ngke</l>
.<l n="d">tājar ngwang duga-duga hāh lĕwĕs mahātku</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 12 (b) MSS niratwang (c) S mara for hana -->
495<lg n="13"><l n="a">māskw îndung [h]atawa kitâri sūkṣmadewī</l>
.<l n="b">wetnya n konĕng-unĕng anunggw i kāwakanta</l>
.<l n="c">sakweh ning kusuma angasrayê rarasta</l>
.<l n="d">byaktêki n hana rumagĕt katon paniwya</l>
.</lg>
500<lg n="14"><l n="a">pintĕñ janma ni lĕngĕng ing kapat mawak rūm</l>
.<l n="b">śrī ning sāgara madhu niṣkalâśarīra</l>
.<l n="c">singhit pwa ng jaladhi linangwakĕn langönya</l>
.<l n="d">lāwan parwwata winawêng langö salah de</l>
.</lg>
505<lg n="15"><l n="a">rakryan tan wiphala kunĕng hayunta heman</l>
.<l n="b">ngke ring durgga gahana towi tungga-tunggal</l>
.<l n="c">lwir tan wiśmaya matakut kitêng wanādri</l>
.<l n="d">wet ning singha gaja ulângawit lawan mong</l>
.</lg>
510<lg n="16"><l n="a">mangkā lwir nṛpatanayâmĕpĕr matakwan</l>
.<l n="b">ndah mājar duga-duga têka sang sinantwa</l>
.<l n="c">rakryan rĕngwakĕna nihan manĕhta māsku</l>
.<l n="d">strīkanyā ngaran Ulupuy nghulun pwa yâsih</l>
.</lg>
515<lg n="17"><l n="a">ndah pūrwwākĕna mara janma ni nghulun strī</l>
.<l n="b">śrī Korawya ta karĕngö gahan [h]ulā göng</l>
.<l n="c">ndātan len ri sira mahādbhutêng prabhāwa</l>
.<l n="d">ring wīryyâpratihata tan samêng triloka</l>
.</lg>
520 <!-- 17 (b) = L -->
.<lg n="18"><l n="a">wwantĕn rājya atiśayêng alĕp wiśeṣa</l>
.<l n="b">de ning bhāswara maṇi ratna aprameya</l>
.<l n="c">lwir kendran hayu nika tan pacāla ring śrī</l>
.<l n="d">kabwatnyân hana parijāta kalpawṛkṣa</l>
525</lg>
.<lg n="19"><l n="a">nā tang swargga tuwi masor hayunya kāsrang</l>
.<l n="b">de ning nītala pakĕkĕs nikâdwitīya</l>
.<l n="c">[singgih yan damĕl ira Padmayonidewa]*</l>
.<l n="d">hetunyâsama-sama wet ny ulih nirâmrih</l>
530</lg>
.<lg n="20"><l n="a">nā <foreign>tândĕl</foreign> nira bhujagādhirāja tuṣṭi</l>
.<l n="b">sakweh ning [h]uraga samanta kapwa bhakti</l>
.<l n="c">ndah parṇnah nghulun iki nāgarājaputrī</l>
.<l n="d">langgöng sāśwata juga nora mātra duhka</l>
535</lg>
. <!-- 20 (a) MSS tandĕl; L ira (b) = L; Q manta -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="5" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">sāntĕn-sāntĕn ikang sukôttama huwus kesyan tĕkap ning yayah</l>
540<l n="b">yângde wyāpara tar jĕnĕk saka ri göng ning śreṣthi kady âwarĕg</l>
.<l n="c">āmbĕk tan winaḍa n mahāngrarah i rūm ning deśa śūnyâsĕnöt</l>
.<l n="d">prāpta ngke dumadak manĕmwa ri kitâdewāśrayêng Jahnawī</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (b) Q tan (d) L -aśrayê -->
545<lg n="2"><l n="a">mogha ngwang kĕna rāga tibra sinarik de ning smarāstrânala</l>
.<l n="b">anghing his ni manis-manista taḍahĕñ jampya ny unĕngku n rimang</l>
.<l n="c">āpan hyang Rati marmma mangrahatakĕn kingking ning oghângarang</l>
.<l n="d">sih rakryan palarĕn warâmṛta kitâtah pāwak ing Manmatha</l>
.</lg>
550<lg n="3"><l n="a">mwang ndyânung kahalĕp nikang wanawaśânganti ng* sukĕt kāsy-asih</l>
.<l n="b">darppângingkis anambi ring watu sumong rukṣâkusut nisprabhā</l>
.<l n="c">roṇḍon lurw aluñut ya rakwa kalaśānya ndin panĕmwa ng suka</l>
.<l n="d">tan wāktan kĕlut ing śarīra masamun kumrut riniṇḍing lanā</l>
.</lg>
555<lg n="4"><l n="a">sangkṣĕpanya tuhanku mantuka marêng nāgendrarājyâmriha</l>
.<l n="b">bhuktin tang suka bhakti ni nghulun agöng sambeganĕn tânghyanga</l>
.<l n="c">nyāta ng nāga kabeh prabhakti tarimanta prārthananyâniwi</l>
.<l n="d">bhoga mwang paribhoga yêkana hiwön secchânawung sanggama</l>
.</lg>
560 <!-- 4 (d) S hiwĕh for hiwön -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">nā ling sang Hulupuy sarāga sumahur sang Pārtha somyâmanis</l>
.<l n="b">hāh māskw îbu halib pwa denta mangalap ngkānê maṇik ning hati</l>
.<l n="c">heman raśmi nikung prahāsana rasanyâmlad waśângde tĕñuh</l>
.<l n="d">santoṣâñ juga denta māsku ta kari ng niśśrādha sih ngwang hari</l>
565</lg>
. <!-- 5 (b) Q balik for halib (d) Q tak kari; L nisśṛdhā -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">mangke kāla ning anggĕgö pasamayan pangde nirang Nārada</l>
.<l n="b">brāhmācāryya ya hetu ning malarasan ngke ring Himādry ânusup</l>
.<l n="c">anghing dwādaśa kāla hīngan i lawas ning warṣa herĕn tĕkā</l>
570<l n="d">yângde lök yadiyan pangisyana sarāgâmūrwwakĕn sanggama</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (a) L pasamayan i -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">nāhan têki sahur sang Arjjuna muwah mojar tikang kāminī</l>
.<l n="b">ḍū swāmingku salah tikângangĕn-angĕntâmrih [r]yy ujar sang ṛṣi</l>
575<l n="c">wruh ngwang don i wuwus nirân gumawaya ng protsāha sambhodhana</l>
.<l n="d">singgih śrī Drupadātmajā sira tikânggĕh ning bratantânaḍi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (b) = Q -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">len sangke rasikâparan ta kasalah dentânggĕgö sanggama</l>
580<l n="b">tan sangkêng paraḍāra lĕmpunĕn* ujarkw âmūrṣitâmrih rĕṇa</l>
.<l n="c">wṛddhyā ning kulawangśa donya pahayunta ng kāmamudrāgama</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan bhyāsakĕna prihĕn tĕpĕt ikang dhyāyī tĕkêng śūnyata</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (b) LQ lampunĕn -->
585</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="6" met="turidagati">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">mapa kari citta sang nṛpatiputra hinuluran ujarnya met* siwi</l>
.<l n="b">humĕnĕb-ĕnĕb ndan āmbĕk ira singgih ujar ika n aminta tanggapĕn</l>
.<l n="c">karaṇa nirân pangaywakĕna lingnya hinubhayan apan parêng hayu</l>
590<l n="d">apituwi tan pacāla ring arūm taya wipata kunĕng hiḍĕp nira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (a) LQ pet -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">nda huwus atūt wilāśa nira sotan i manah ing atunggalan hunĕng</l>
.<l n="b">angadĕg adan ta rakwa nṛpaputra dinulur ira nāgakanyakā</l>
595<l n="c">ri bĕla[h] ikang wasundara nahan ta hawan ira marê[ng] rasātala</l>
.<l n="d">tuhun alaris sirâpaduluran suka tinuduh i tingkah ing hĕnū</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (c) = LQ; = Q -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">katĕmu tikāng anâlaya wangun-wangunan ika anopamêng halĕp</l>
600<l n="b">racana nikang humah kanaka gopura pagĕr ika kapwa mās maṇik</l>
.<l n="c">swang asĕmu tejamaṇḍala parĕmpwan ika paḍa-paḍâmangun hulap</l>
.<l n="d">iningĕt-ingĕt hayunya n adhikāra saka ri hayu ning kadewatan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (c) Q parĕmpwin -->
605<lg n="4"><l n="a">surabhawanâsinang tĕkap ikang dinakara wararatna bhāswara</l>
.<l n="b">hiwag ika yan makāntang akucĕm lalu diwasa ri kāla ning kulĕm</l>
.<l n="c">kunĕng irikang rasātala ya tângurang-urangi pĕtĕng tĕkêriya</l>
.<l n="d">ya juga lanâsinang tĕkap ikang sphaṭika maṇi suteja nityasa</l>
.</lg>
610 <!-- 4 (a) L omits wara -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">irika narendraputra tinamākĕna tĕkap ira nāgakāminī</l>
.<l n="b">asaji halĕp nikāng alaya kañcana pinacira wastw anindita</l>
.<l n="c">hana wanitârjja kapwa sinawang maṇik anguray arūm raras nikā</l>
.<l n="d">amuhara kung liringnya dinĕlö lĕmĕs ika n aśarīra pādapa</l>
615</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">wwaya ta marĕk sumanggraha mangaswakĕna pamapaganya ring tamuy</l>
.<l n="b">apĕnĕd awĕtwa-wĕtwan i kapantĕs ika ta magĕsĕng ring inggitā</l>
.<l n="c">alĕbu-lĕbū raras ni saḍĕk ing kusuma paḍa minging kinasturi</l>
.<l n="d">sinawawa raśmi mangjĕngĕrakĕn pasaji-saji manis tininghalan</l>
620</lg>
. <!-- 6 (a) R mangswakĕna, S umangswakĕna (c) R rarab -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">hana wangunan gṛhasphaṭika pangkaja madana hatĕpnya mās tatur</l>
.<l n="b">arĕja rinĕngga puṣpamaya kapwa maṇimaya lumöng hanêriya</l>
.<l n="c">hana ta kunang sumajya pawirāman ika gĕlaran ing smarāstuti</l>
625<l n="d">ndan inapi raśmisañcaya jahitnya n asĕmu parahasyan ing wulan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">irika ta munggah ing pakasutan sang ahayu kalawan nṛpātmaja</l>
.<l n="b">pangawaśa ning paḍa priya matūt wawang aruma[h] ikang raras hati</l>
.<l n="c">papupul irân hanêng śayana rāmya paḍa sira makesi ning manis</l>
630<l n="d">asĕmu pamiṇḍa ning mĕnur angaywakĕna raras arok lawan gaḍung</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (b) = Q; S rarah -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">hana ta waneh patūt nira hatur salaga marĕk i rāmya ning nadī</l>
.<l n="b">niyata juga ng Ratih makalawan Manasija sira karwa ring jinĕm</l>
635<l n="c">pawilĕt i sandhi ning gati ciniṇḍya nira tĕlĕng ikang smarāgama</l>
.<l n="d">kṣaṇika tatan kapanggila pasungsungan akĕcap irêng pasanggaman</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">kunĕng i huwus nikang gati tĕkap sang amithuna langö nirêng tilam</l>
.<l n="b">wawang alulut sirârddha kaharas maṇik i hati nirân hañar waśi</l>
640<l n="c">parĕng umijil sirâśila makālihan ajajar i heng nikang gṛha</l>
.<l n="d">hana humaḍang marĕk sapariwāra nira umupacāra sanggraha</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 10 (a) S kunang (b) S kaharan -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">ri yawa nikang gṛhasphaṭika parṇnah ira kadi sakêng Smarālaya</l>
645<l n="b">paḍa sumĕnāha tang taḍah aneka parama rasa pattya ng enaka</l>
.<l n="c">ri tĕlas irânaḍah krama parĕng ta sira maluy umunggahêng jinĕm</l>
.<l n="d">bĕtah anawung hunĕng nira hanêng śayana taya kawarśih ing gati</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (d) Q ngka for bĕtah -->
650<lg n="12"><l n="a">suka-suka sang sĕḍĕng mangayu raśmi saturida hanêng pasanggaman</l>
.<l n="b">tuwi pinagantakĕn mahasa lālana madulur anis marêng taman</l>
.<l n="c">tan alĕh ahimya-himyan angusir sakalĕngĕngan ikang pajang wulan</l>
.<l n="d">sahaja marângrĕrĕb-rĕrĕb akālihana jinĕm apuṣpa pādapa</l>
.</lg>
655 <!-- 12 (c) L ingkang -->
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">pangirim-irim nikang masa kapat patĕr amijah angambwakĕn riris</l>
.<l n="b">umahas-ahas ta rakwa sira rāmya manĕpĕrakĕn ing tapowana</l>
.<l n="c">nguni-nguni ring nadītaṭa marêng jurang amarĕki durgga ning parung</l>
.<l n="d">hana wulakan pamenan ira lot aṭika-ṭikan asangwa kung lulut</l>
660</lg>
. <!-- 13 (b) Q n anĕpĕrakĕn -->
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">salawas irângurĕn turida harṣa silih-asih angekacumbana</l>
.<l n="b">wruh amiṣayêng rĕsĕp taya kagiṇḍal ira paḍa sarāga tan wiwal</l>
.<l n="c">jĕnĕk amulung-mulung madanatantra taya kahala de Dhanañjaya</l>
665<l n="d">sinamaya sūkṣma lingga ning akung ndan apagĕṭa miwö ng karāsikan</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="7" met="jaloddhatagati">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">tangeh lawas irêng rasātala hana</l>
670<l n="b">ndatan dwa mawĕkâdhikāra nipuna</l>
.<l n="c">inakwan ira wīra ring raṇa hĕlĕm</l>
.<l n="d">ya rakwa Irawan ngaranya karĕngö</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ndatan malupa sang narendratanaya</l>
675<l n="b">prayojana jugêki nitya katutur</l>
.<l n="c">ya hetu ning adan humangkata muwah</l>
.<l n="d">sinantwa winarah ta sang priya huwus </l>
.</lg>
. <lg n="3"><l n="a">samangkana sirân lumakwa maliha</l>
680<l n="b">ḍatĕng ri Himawān ta rakwa wĕkasan</l>
.<l n="c">wisāta manusup sirânginak-inak</l>
.<l n="d">aneka ta jurang wukir paranira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (b) S ring -->
685</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="8" met="kāmamālā">
.<note>Creese calls this meter Wirat Tĕbu Sol.</note>
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">kaparah tikāng acala rāmya amanuṣa langönya durggama</l>
690<l n="b">giri Nīlaśṛngga karĕngö tuwi gahana sukĕt nikang wukir</l>
.<l n="c">apĕluk jurangnya n adalĕm śikara nika kahundul ing parung</l>
.<l n="d">kumisik bañunya ya manumbĕr i muka tumĕḍun marêng jurang</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">alilang hilīnya gumulak mangabarat i tĕlā nikang wukir</l>
695<l n="b">susu ning lĕmah kahiḍĕpanya kadi rajata warṇna bhāswara</l>
.<l n="c">amijah ḍaranya masibu mwang akĕpĕk angaring marambatan</l>
.<l n="d">sakadang matūt ndatan arinya mamarĕngi* patīrtha sang ṛṣi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (d) Q mamarĕki -->
700<lg n="3"><l n="a">alalĕh katon para-parah niki n arĕcĕp angungkul-ungkuli</l>
.<l n="b">ri hiring-hiringnya patapan mapangajaran i pinggir ing parung</l>
.<l n="c">ndah atindu-tindu patatānya sana-sini paḍâgawe langö</l>
.<l n="d">wara puṣpadeha dumilah kadi dahana kinuṇḍa tan paḍĕm</l>
.</lg>
705 <!-- 3 (c) S ndan -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">araras patinghalan ikang para kili winagĕd raras nikā</l>
.<l n="b">kahatur cumāmpaka manisnya sumaji-saji tinghal ing mulat</l>
.<l n="c">ri pasiṇḍi-siṇḍi nika pantĕs angayati pakiñcang ing halis</l>
.<l n="d">anamar kilang juga liringnya winulatan ikânghĕmū-guyu </l>
710</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">i talun-talunya ya ta lālana hamumu* gangan lawañ jamūr</l>
.<l n="b">nguniweh lalab paḍa winungkus i jamang ika tan tahêng susu</l>
.<l n="c">anusah manis ringa-ringan yan angidung i samīpa ning parung</l>
.<l n="d">ahirit sinambangan ikang gagung asahuran ing jurang-jurang</l>
715</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) LQ hamupu -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">irikang tapowana rarasnya n abuhaya sumajya sang ṛṣi</l>
.<l n="b">hana tâmipil kusuma darbbha hinikĕt inamĕrnya ring kukū</l>
.<l n="c">sawaneh marêng ghaṭa lumampah angamĕr arĕjâñawuk bañu</l>
720<l n="d">dinĕlö manisnya n angĕnoh rumĕngu-rĕngu sawang surâpsarī</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">anĕḍĕk tikang tasik anak bañu nika n inungang katungkulan</l>
.<l n="b">kumucup tang erttali sakêng wiwara niki kawantus ing tĕngah</l>
.<l n="c">amangun-mangun hima lumöng kakiraṇan atĕmah kuwung-kuwung</l>
725<l n="d">sawaneh katon kapalĕyö kadi bhujaga kumĕṇḍĕng anglayang</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (b) S kumucur (d) R kumĕnḍam, S kumĕnḍḍĕm -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">sĕmi ning wanāntara lume mĕhah angayam-ayam truh ing nadī</l>
.<l n="b">kadi tan puji n marĕk i rūmnya pinakaciri munggu ring gĕlung</l>
730<l n="c">ri ḍatĕng narendratanayângdurugakĕna langö ning aśrama</l>
.<l n="d">huni ning kuwong lwir angatag mijila hana ta sang Dhanañjaya</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="9" met="pr̥thvītala">
735<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">rĕsĕp ta sirang āryya Phalguṇa tiki n mulat kāsrĕpan</l>
.<l n="b">katon halĕp ikang pradeśa nikanang wukir pājaran</l>
.<l n="c">lumūd manah irân rapuh kangĕlihan tĕkap ning rawi</l>
.<l n="d">ya kāraṇa nirân tan aśru wĕkasan sawetnyân mangel</l>
740</lg>
. <!-- 1 (a) S pasrĕpan (d) L tan sru -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">hanan laku sumĕngka rāmya lumihat hiring ning langit</l>
.<l n="b">linangwakĕn ikang manuk wahu mulih larinyâlangö</l>
.<l n="c">tuwi pwa n alalĕh lapat-lapat aḍanta-ḍantânglayang</l>
745<l n="d">ya rakwa sumawe raras twas anamar kĕḍap ning wukir</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (c) Q lumatlapa ta danta -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">hawan lĕngĕng atuṇḍa-tuṇḍa tĕpi ning jurangnyâdalĕm</l>
.<l n="b">ikang sukĕt anambi-nambir asĕnöt latānyân sumong</l>
750<l n="c">lumĕnghay adawā katon lung i galingnya munggw ing parung</l>
.<l n="d">hanêki n amilĕt ri ampiji waneh tahĕnyâlĕsĕs</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">larap ni sĕmi ning walik-kaḍĕp i himbang ing pājaran</l>
.<l n="b">lawan pisang alas pupus nika mapös hatur kānglihan</l>
755<l n="c">sawang layu-layū lumimbay alaris sĕḍĕng kānginan</l>
.<l n="d">aganti lawan aṇḍurū ya tan arĕn kĕlabnyângawe</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) Q walik-aḍĕp (d) L andarū -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">samangkana pamangsul ing kidang awās manisnyân wulat</l>
760<l n="b">mulat ḍara-ḍaran [n]ikang wray irikang tahĕn sambrama</l>
.<l n="c">sumantĕn anacar ta sarwwaphala honya manghruk parĕng</l>
.<l n="d">dudū tang angaring lutungnya yan amangkuk ing pāng jĕnĕk</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">tangeh yan iniwön samāntara ḍatĕng sirêng aśrama</l>
765<l n="b">katon kadi sumanggrahê sira kayunya kumrām kabeh</l>
.<l n="c">sĕkarnya wilajêng lĕmah kadi rurū nikang bhūṣaṇa</l>
.<l n="d">angutkaṭa sumār nirāntara wanginya lumrā marūm</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (b) S omits stanzas 6b-10a -->
770<lg n="7"><l n="a">lalu ng ghaṭita māsa tistis ahawan ta sang hyang rawi</l>
.<l n="b">sirĕm-sirĕm i sĕbsĕb ing kiraṇa kālasandhyā huwus</l>
.<l n="c">awarṇna cinirup tikang gagana tumrang abhrâmirah</l>
.<l n="d">urutnya sumirat-sirat karudhiran panarkêriya</l>
.</lg>
775 <!-- 7 (a) L tīstis -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">makin kawuwuhan langö racana ning pawitrāśrama</l>
.<l n="b">tuwin kinĕmulan kusut ni jaladanya lumrânurun</l>
.<l n="c">inaywan i kukus nikang huti pamūja sang paṇḍita</l>
.<l n="d">ikang kaluṣa moha śīrṇna tilakanya sākṣāt gĕsöng</l>
780</lg>
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">mirir wangi nikang pahoman i dalĕmnya mawrā sumār</l>
.<l n="b">sugandha saha dhūpa ḍīpa humaras wanginyângasut</l>
.<l n="c">samanta jayaghaṇṭa-ghaṇṭi ya tiki n pangungkung parĕng</l>
.<l n="d">lawan stawa karĕngw asangghani malap twas angde lĕngöng</l>
785</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">manuknya n akule lanā n pakulĕman rikāng aśrama</l>
.<l n="b">humung mahurahan kĕcĕknya n amicāra warṇnâkṣara</l>
.<l n="c">lĕngöng panamay ing dwirepa karĕngö hanêng srak minging</l>
.<l n="d">bangun wruh angawat lalitya pangidungnya somyârĕrĕh</l>
790</lg>
. <!-- 10 (c) Q panayam for panamay -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">aneka ta tinon [n]arendrasuta rāmya ning pājaran</l>
.<l n="b">ya têka magawe kapūhan ira tuṣṭa māntĕn rapuh</l>
.<l n="c">mangö mingĕt-ingĕt marāryyan irikang śilâlwâratā</l>
795<l n="d">anganty anginĕp ing tapowana nahan tatâmbĕk nira</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="10" met="kāmamālā">
.<note>Creese calls this meter Wirat Tĕbu Sol.</note>
800<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">ndah iwön ta sang ṛṣi kabeh mijil agarawalan panungsunga</l>
.<l n="b">tapi-tapy adandan umijil sahana nira hanêng tapowana</l>
.<l n="c">ndan apadgaṭâmĕkasakĕn* daluwang ira tĕhĕr ndatan hiner</l>
.<l n="d">agirang-girang lumihat ing lituhayu ya tikângjĕngĕr hati</l>
805</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">kadunung ta sang nṛpatiputra ta maśila ri pöhan ing tapa</l>
.<l n="b">apĕnĕd ri sor nikang aśoka mangisapu ya tâsuhun sĕkar</l>
.<l n="c">mututung ta sang ṛṣi tuminghali sira paramênggitâhalĕp</l>
.<l n="d">yadiyan mucap Kusumacāpa waling ira mulat mĕngĕn[-mĕngĕn]</l>
810</lg>
. <!-- 2 (c) L matungtung for mututung (d) = LQ -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">tan alah kapūhan ika sang para kili kadi wismṛti ng hiḍĕp</l>
.<l n="b">swang anagwa-nagwakĕn unangnya ri mata rasa tan wĕnang hinöt</l>
.<l n="c">mawuwus ta sang ṛṣi sabhāgya mami manarukêng tapowana</l>
815<l n="d">katĕkān manĕmwa phala ni ngwang amirati ḍatĕng nṛpātmaja</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (d) Q anirati -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">mapa tang prayojana narendratanaya mahas ing wanāntara</l>
.<l n="b">kadi tambay ing parama māryya gatarasa mamî wanāśrama</l>
820<l n="c">tĕpĕt ing samāhita kunang pinahayu hayu ing tapabrata</l>
.<l n="d">takari ng kṛtārtha pangaranya panuluyana denta sanmata</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">na wuwus watĕk ṛṣi narendrasuta majar i sang mahāyati</l>
.<l n="b">atĕrĕh pwa de nira yathārtha nira ḍatĕng atīrtha kāraṇa</l>
825<l n="c">riy ulih nirêng nitala yêka ta winarahakĕn tĕkap nira</l>
.<l n="d">agirang ta sang ṛṣi rumĕngwa kadi kawuwuhan sukâbungah</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) R inserts (watĕk) before mahāyati -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">wĕkasan ta sang nṛpatiputra dinulur umulih ring aśrama</l>
830<l n="b">ri ḍatĕng nirân pinaripoṣita tĕkap ira sang watĕk ṛṣi</l>
.<l n="c">hana târggha pādya saha mūlaphala lawan ikang mahoṣadhi</l>
.<l n="d">suka sang Dhanañjaya kaweni manah ira tĕkap mahāmuni</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">iti nā sĕḍĕng nṛpatiputra hana ta sira ring tapowana</l>
835<l n="b">pinaran-paran ta sira de para yati malulut marê sira</l>
.<l n="c">mahas ing tapowana winūrṣita saparan irê mahāyati</l>
.<l n="d">nda aneka de nira maharsuka ri sira watĕk mahājana</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (b) Q mahāyati -->
840<lg n="8"><l n="a">pira têki rakwa ri lawas nira n amĕgil i sang mahāyati</l>
.<l n="b">kadi tan hanêki dumagê samanah ira parārtha nityasa</l>
.<l n="c">irikā sirâmuhun umangkata ri sira sang ugrapaṇḍita</l>
.<l n="d">karĕṇan mahāmuni kumolakĕna ta sira sang nṛpātmaja</l>
.</lg>
845<lg n="9"><l n="a">bapa sang pangöban ing anāśraya parahita dharmma ring prajā</l>
.<l n="b">katĕkān manĕmwa suka ring kadi kita guṇawān nghulun tuhan</l>
.<l n="c">nyata sang mahājana tamolah ing acala kita prayojana</l>
.<l n="d">kita māsihânulusakĕn patayaśa pinakāśrayêng hayu</l>
.</lg>
850<lg n="10"><l n="a">na wuwus dwijarṣi sira sang nṛpatanaya tĕhĕr umangkata</l>
.<l n="b">mahawan halas-halas ikang pangajaran i siluk nikang wukir</l>
.<l n="c">irikang nadī sira n atīrtha maharaḍin ikang kasatwikan</l>
.<l n="d">malihêng purāntara kunĕng parana nira sinambramêng suka</l>
.</lg>
855<lg n="11"><l n="a">wwaya têki bhūpati hinuttama suyaśa mahārddhikêng praja</l>
.<l n="b">siniwi ng Mayūra wararājya nagara nira sang nareśwara</l>
.<l n="c">karĕngö pwa sangjña nira Citradahana tuhu bhūmipālaka</l>
.<l n="d">satatâsihêng agati tan wijigi sira n anon nirārthakā</l>
.</lg>
860 <!-- 11 (c) L sajña -->
.</div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="11" met="rajanī">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">sira ta narendra Citradahanânak anindya hayu</l>
.<l n="b">kadi paśarīra ning raras amiṇḍa ri gātra nira</l>
865<l n="c">swang awangi gandha ning kusuma tan pagap arddha marĕs</l>
.<l n="d">matang ika Citragandha panĕngĕr nira rājasutā</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">apituwi rakwa buddhi naranātha yayā n masĕkĕl</l>
.<l n="b">gati nira tungga-tunggala makesi ni nāla nira</l>
870<l n="c">bisama ya tan kagantyana dĕlāha hiḍĕp nṛpati</l>
.<l n="d">karaṇa nirân wirangrwang i karākṣakan ing nagara</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">pangayam-ayam nirang nṛpati mahyun amantwa mĕne </l>
.<l n="b">ya ta pinametakĕñ jalu sulakṣana tan kahala</l>
875<l n="c">makaphala wangśajā sumilihêng pura len karatun</l>
.<l n="d">alah apĕgā ng manah mangĕn-angĕn ryy abhilāśa nira</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">syapa kari sang mahānipuna wastu wineh atikā</l>
.<l n="b">maran aharĕp mahalwakĕna tan baśa yan kawawā</l>
880<l n="c">niyata kaduryyaśan ling ira tuccha gatinya tĕmĕn</l>
.<l n="d">tan ulaha ning janottama yadin paratêng wipata</l>
.</lg>
. <lg n="5"><l n="a"> hana mara tôpamanya ta kunang yadiyan warangĕn</l>
.<l n="b">kusuma sĕḍĕng manohara sumambyakĕn ing bhramara</l>
885<l n="c">lĕwu mara denya yogya hañangĕnya warĕg juga ya</l>
.<l n="d">ya pangupadṛṣta ning taruṇa moliha tan wibaśa</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">karaṇa nirâsĕkĕl taya mangenaki buddhi nira</l>
.<l n="b">luluy angajap ndatan palalayan twas irâbayangan</l>
890<l n="c">nguni-nguni têkanang bala kadi pwa ya niśśaraṇa</l>
.<l n="d">taya mara ngūni lingnya sahananya mĕhah malara</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (c) S tikanang -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">tuwi mara kārmma ning dadi ikang rwa tumūt mijila</l>
895<l n="b">hala hayu yêka rakwa tinĕmunya lanā manapĕl</l>
.<l n="c">paḍa-paḍa tan kasah pwa ya rikang dadi janma kabeh</l>
.<l n="d">sudhana kṛpāna len ganal alit taya tan kahana</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">wwang alupa ring rasâgama anāḍi Śiwasmaraṇa</l>
900<l n="b">niyata nikân panĕmwa hiwĕh ing dadi tan lĕpasa</l>
.<l n="c">kathamapi sang Mayūrapati satwika lot ginĕgö</l>
.<l n="d">panĕmu nirêng inak ruḍita śoka marĕk mangikū</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (b) Q panĕmbah for panĕmwa -->
905<lg n="9"><l n="a">ya tika ginopitêng hṛdaya göng ni kaduhkan ira</l>
.<l n="b">ya juga lanā linālana wineh nira tan masukĕr</l>
.<l n="c">pasisi wanāntarāśrama nahan ta pamenan ira</l>
.<l n="d">bari-bari yêka rakwa pangimūr pwa ri sungsut ira</l>
.</lg>
910<lg n="10"><l n="a">pira ta kunĕng lawas nira narādhipa rañca makung</l>
.<l n="b">tinuduh i singhit ing manah angiṣṭy awasāna nira</l>
.<l n="c">pamahayu ning hyang angdani ḍatĕng nira Pārtha mĕne</l>
.<l n="d">niyata sirêka mangruwagi sungkawa sang nṛpati</l>
.</lg>
915<lg n="11"><l n="a">tuwi karĕngö ta rakwa hayu sang wara rājasutā</l>
.<l n="b">angĕtĕrakĕn raras ni lĕngĕng ing giri māryy alangö</l>
.<l n="c">kalawan ikang wilāpa kadi māntĕna rūmnya larut</l>
.<l n="d">karaṇa nirân ḍatĕng kawawa de ni karĕngwan ira</l>
.</lg>
920<lg n="12"><l n="a">prakaśita yan ḍatĕng prawara Paṇḍusutê nṛpati</l>
.<l n="b">sipi kari göng i buddhi naranātha sirâtamuyan</l>
.<l n="c">atawa kĕta ng balâmala-malar taya len ri sira</l>
.<l n="d">kadi salagâlabĕh ri tĕka ning riris ing jalada</l>
.</lg>
925 <!-- 12 (b) S ni for i -->
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">sahaja sawang mahodadhi katonan ikang nagara</l>
.<l n="b">gumuru[h] ikang wwang ing pura mijil ya tiki n kĕtĕra</l>
.<l n="c">ndan asĕmu candrapūrṇna nṛpaputra sumöng iriya</l>
.<l n="d">ya ta karaṇanya sök turida lot kumisik mangĕsah</l>
930</lg>
. <!-- 13 (b) = LQ -->
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">iningĕt-ingĕt halĕp nira narendrasutâtiśaya</l>
.<l n="b">madana basanta komala lawan madhumāsa ḍatĕng</l>
.<l n="c">tuwin aniwaryyaśakti lituhayw aguṇêng samara</l>
935<l n="d">nṛpasuta kewalâta wiṣaya ny ucapanya wagus</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="15"><l n="a">irika ta sang nareśwara marĕk ri narendrasuta</l>
.<l n="b">wulat amanis panungsung ira sārjjawa buddhi nira</l>
.<l n="c">rumĕsĕp i nāla sang wahu ḍatĕng ta panantwa nira</l>
940<l n="d">sipi kari bhāgyamānta mami wet ni ḍatĕngta laki</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="16"><l n="a">kadi tṛṇawṛkṣa [rukṣa] makirih ya paḍangkwa huwus </l>
.<l n="b">hinilan ikang hudan bisama kungnya mangel angajap</l>
.<l n="c">kawadiy uyangnya kāwit asĕwö pwa ya niskaraṇa</l>
945<l n="d">amĕnangi sih bhaṭāra Suranātha tahāngkwa kita</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 16 (a) = LQ (d) Q sihta; S tahāngkwi -->
.<lg n="17"><l n="a">kalawan iking kaḍatwan atiśuṣka lĕwĕs wiphala</l>
.<l n="b">kadi hana ta swakārmma nika gāryyang atah makucĕm</l>
950<l n="c">hana mara ganta ning hayu kapanggiha denya mĕne</l>
.<l n="d">kuśala guṇanta mūlya amĕnganya n amuktya hayu</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="18"><l n="a">wacana narendra harṣa mawuwus ta narendrasuta</l>
.<l n="b">taha mara lingta nātha katuluy pwa mahā manguḍang </l>
955<l n="c">parama kasajjananta atiśuddha parārtha wibhuh</l>
.<l n="d">sumĕkar i padma ning hati matangnya sumewa haji</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="19"><l n="a">irika ta yan pininta nira sang wararājasuta*</l>
.<l n="b">taya winihang narāryya ri Mayūra papātra nira</l>
960<l n="c">bapa halapĕnta māsku siwinĕnya kitêki baśa</l>
.<l n="d">nya pahalawönta têki punagingkwa pakīrtyakĕna</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 19 (a) Q rajaputra (b) S papātran -->
.<lg n="20"><l n="a">prathama niking Mayūra wararājya rĕngönta harah</l>
965<l n="b">prabhu sira sang Prabhākara nahan ta rawitkwa sira</l>
.<l n="c">ati malawas r adĕg nira tan ora tanūja haji</l>
.<l n="d">lumaku sirâgawe tapa mangiṣṭya anak ya ta don</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 20 (c) Q tan nora -->
970<lg n="21"><l n="a">karuṇa ta sang hyang Ïśwara katon dṛdha sang nṛpati </l>
.<l n="b">tĕhĕr anganugrahânaka sawijya atah ri sira</l>
.<l n="c">katĕka-tĕkê swaputrakula mangkana haywa waneh</l>
.<l n="d">ya tika tinūt ni wīja nira yan hana ring nagara</l>
.</lg>
975</div>
. <div type="canto" rend="met" n="12" met="rucira">
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">tĕwĕk nikang wiṣama kabhukty aweh suma</l>
.<l n="b">taya ng purākṛta masĕwö wyamohita </l>
980<l n="c">nya sanghulun kawĕkas anak warānggana</l>
.<l n="d">katon pwa tan tĕhĕr agawe prajânghita</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (a) Q suka for suma (c) S riya for nya -->
.<lg n="2">
985<l n="a">hudāśinanta bapa sinambhawâsiha</l>
.<l n="b">ikāng anak jalu ya pininta ni nghulun</l>
.<l n="c">yayânaka nghulun inahā gumantyana</l>
.<l n="d">pratiṣṭhitêng nagara ya sulkakanyakā</l>
.</lg>
990 <lg n="3">
.<l n="a">ahan wuwus nira nṛpaputra tan cala</l>
.<l n="b">inakwakĕn ryy anaka narendrakanyakā</l>
.<l n="c">jalu prasiddha sumilihêryy adĕg nira </l>
.<l n="d">samāpta pāyu ning ubhayênalapkĕna</l>
995</lg>
. <!-- 3 (a) Q nire -->
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">huwus suwārddhana para taṇḍa de haji</l>
.<l n="b">paniwya sang nṛpaduhitê sang Arjjuna</l>
1000<l n="c">saharṣa tang bala rumĕngö ta tan wihang</l>
.<l n="d">pajātyan ing maniwi susatya mangkana</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (b) L -duhītê (c) L balā -->
.<lg n="5">
1005<l n="a">wawang dine tikang upakāra ning smara </l>
.<l n="b">pasanggrahê sira n anawung hanêng jinĕm</l>
.<l n="c">wawang ndatan kahala kabeh paḍânghaḍā</l>
.<l n="d">subaddha pūrṇna wali nirâsamêng hayu</l>
.</lg>
1010<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">ikang wwang ing pura rumĕngö yathāsuka</l>
.<l n="b">paḍâmahaywakĕn agawe pamūrṣita</l>
.<l n="c">waneh madan hyas ika samênakêng tamuy</l>
.<l n="d">ikang kĕtĕg-kĕtĕg araras rinūpakā</l>
1015</lg>
.<lg n="7">
.<l n="a">hanêki sanggraha gṛha rāmya kottama</l>
.<l n="b">ri de nikâparimita wṛnda ring halĕp</l>
.<l n="c">anopamêng racana kinanta ning raṇu</l>
1020<l n="d">sawang Himālaya ri haturnya komala</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8">
.<l n="a">nahan parantya nira ta sang Dhanañjaya</l>
.<l n="b">aneka tang surasa pasajya pāwwata</l>
1025<l n="c">sĕnāha tang marĕk umiwö hanângawat</l>
.<l n="d">sinangkyan ing paḍahi lalitya len kĕtur</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">surup nikang rawi umulih narādhipa</l>
1030<l n="b">taya ng kasangśayan ira buddhi sāśwata</l>
.<l n="c">sawet ni göng i manah irê Dhanañjaya</l>
.<l n="d">panonan ing suka mijilêng mukâbungah</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
1035<div type="canto" rend="met" n="13" met="kusumavilasita">
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">prāpta narendra ring gṛha cumuṇḍuk i kahanan i sang nareśwarī</l>
.<l n="b">lāgi sinungsung ing smita ḍatĕng nira tinamakĕn ing wulat marūm</l>
.<l n="c">de nira sang narendramahiṣī dadi mawara-warah nareśwara</l>
1040<l n="d">[r]yy ārtha nikang prayojana mĕne kawarangan ira sang suputrikā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (c) L mahiṣi (d) = Q -->
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">tan winihang tĕkap nṛpawadhū yugala nira narendrakanyakā</l>
1045<l n="b">mangkana têki sang wwang i dalĕm paḍa gĕrĕmĕ hanâsĕwöh lulut</l>
.<l n="c">sang nṛpaputra lingnya sira wastu sawawa pamawê suputrikā</l>
.<l n="d">ndā * hawiwākṣitan krama parĕng narapati paratêng suputrikā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (d) MSS nda -->
1050<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">tan dwa ḍatĕng ta rakwa naranātha kunĕng iki narendraputrikā</l>
.<l n="b">arddha wirangrwang epu rumĕngö samanah ira ta sang narādhipa</l>
.<l n="c">prāpta ta sang narendra ri sirâmuhara salahasā n kinölakĕn</l>
.<l n="d">luh nira lot pinöm tuhun anungsung i tĕka nira sang narādhipa</l>
1055</lg>
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">marmma manah nikang wwang i dalĕm ri wingit ira sumöng mĕnĕb-mĕnĕb</l>
.<l n="b">kweh paricārikânwam angiring paḍa wihikan ing inggitê sira</l>
.<l n="c">denya marĕk manimbangi katonan ika n asĕmu pañjrah ing mĕnur</l>
1060<l n="d">śrī nṛpaputrikâmawa langönya n amungari hatur niśākara</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">kāla nirân panĕmbah alaris lungayan ira n amādapâlume</l>
.<l n="b">ambĕt ikang tĕngah sawawa rosnya pañurigan ing angga tan singi</l>
1065<l n="c">towin arūm katon kirab i gātra nira tĕkap i teja ning damar</l>
.<l n="d">byakta wĕnĕs nikang muka sawang wulan aluru waśângrĕsi ng hati</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">ngkā n pangucap narādhipa muwah nṛpawaramahisî suputrikā</l>
1070<l n="b">om rari tan waneh kita lanā pinala-palar apuṇya ri nghulun</l>
.<l n="c">rūmta ya kesyananta atawânulusakĕna hajöng suputrikā</l>
.<l n="d">nghing kita tāsyasih karaṇa ning tumĕkakĕna marêng nirātmakā</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7">
1075<l n="a">rakryan arêbu māsku takari ng kita rari hinarĕp-harĕp mami</l>
.<l n="b">lāmpu n ujarku denta ring apâku lumugasana sihkwa putrikā</l>
.<l n="c">wet ni tuwuhta sāmpun anĕḍĕng sapangalapan akārmma tan sali</l>
.<l n="d">ndah sira sang Dhanañjaya siwinta sira saphala sambhawê kita</l>
.</lg>
1080 <!-- 7 (a) Q tĕmĕn for mami -->
. <lg n="8">
.<l n="a">mangkana ling nareśwara kunang nṛpawaraduhitā ndatan sahur</l>
.<l n="b">mepu tĕkângadĕh luh ira kāsrĕk i manah ira tan wring olaha</l>
.<l n="c">rĕs nira yan lumangghaṇa pakon narapati ri sirâmangun sĕkĕl</l>
1085<l n="d">hetu nirân mĕhah juga tangeh yan amituhu ri sang yayah bibi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (a) L duhītā -->
.<lg n="9">
.<l n="a">ndah mawuwus narendramahisī tuhan ibu naranātha singgihĕn </l>
1090<l n="b">tan hana rakwa lena ri kitêbu makalarapan ing twang i nghulun</l>
.<l n="c">wandhawawargga puṇyakĕna denta yat anuwuha jalwa putraja</l>
.<l n="d">tan malihêng Mayūra ya ta panggajaha nagara sulkakanyakā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (d) Q panggajahana -->
1095<lg n="10">
.<l n="a">toh palalu nda haywa tumahā nṛpati mubura dharmma sang prabhu</l>
.<l n="b">prārthana sang masūnwa warabhāryya hana kari hiwĕhnya sūngakĕn</l>
.<l n="c">pingging ikang katalyana ri sih ning atanaya mahĕlya duryyaśa</l>
.<l n="d">hātnya tatan kĕnênaku ikang hala hayu panĕmunya ring prajā</l>
1100</lg>
. <!-- 10 (a) Q palalun -->
.<lg n="11">
.<l n="a">sāmpun irân ghumoṣita mulih narapati kawĕkas suputrikā</l>
.<l n="b">śoka tinuntun ing kaka amogha malumay agĕyuh kakingkingan</l>
1105<l n="c">prāpta sirêng dalĕm gṛhalatā prihati pamatĕk ing kakanyakan</l>
.<l n="d">kewala luh nira drawa makin hinari-hari linālanêng kaka</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (b) L śokā; L omits kaka -->
.</div>
1110<div type="canto" rend="met" n="14" met="mattarāga">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">strī-strī hanêng nagara lĕnglĕng osik angarang linurwan ing unĕng</l>
.<l n="b">bhrantâlangö kasarik ing manis nṛpatiputra tibra mangani</l>
.<l n="c">mogâhuyang hamuni kungnya moyut amajang śaśāngka ri dalĕm</l>
.<l n="d">mangkin tinĕngw an ahawan wulan ḍatĕng irân panūkṣma turida</l>
1115</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ānyāt ta moruk angure rikang patiga mūrcchitângrĕs asuma</l>
.<l n="b">kingkingnya lāgi tinatānya ring sumanasâlangö dadi ṭikā</l>
.<l n="c">denyâmisik-misiki ceṭi kānya lara ning rimang kinĕcapan</l>
.<l n="d">yângde tĕñuhnya rumase ng wingitnya ri wilāpa manglĕngĕrakĕn</l>
1120</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) Q murchâ- (d) Q manglĕngĕngakĕn -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">wwantĕn kalusyan i kisapwan ing kaka huyangnya tibra tan alĕh</l>
.<l n="b">bhrantângajap kalawanan raras ri rĕcĕp ing rimang saturida</l>
.<l n="c">līlā yadin layata ring pasir tĕhĕr angiṣṭya bhāṣaracana</l>
1125<l n="d">tañ jrih rinūdha ri panumbĕr ing ryyak arĕṇah tayêng panginĕpan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">strī ratna dug singi rarasnya têki n asawang sĕkar sumalaga</l>
.<l n="b">śokângarang kapilangö ri sor nikang aśoka mār pinijĕtan</l>
.<l n="c">lot winwang ing kaka hamatya-matyani hatur priyambada marĕk</l>
1130<l n="d">towin wruh anglipurakĕn ta kingking ika tan sahêng nṛpasuta</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">ndin ngganya yan mĕkara danta ning salaga wiṣṭi rūmnya tan irĕng</l>
.<l n="b">ardhâluñut ri taya ning kapat marĕkakĕn ririsnya n amĕḍar</l>
.<l n="c">nirdon sĕwönya kadi tan sih ing pawana irṣya medi capala</l>
1135<l n="d">manggângañut jalada nisturân pinalar ing hunang katanĕhan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">toh ndyâwaśāna nika tan waneh wiḍala rūmnya denya kapati</l>
.<l n="b">nirwa mrik ing hasana len mĕnūr suraga nāgapuṣpa wilaja</l>
.<l n="c">yar tan sinambhawa nikang madhubrata dumohi tan pangarasa</l>
1140<l n="d">lāwan hyang indu māri raśmi yadyapi tinambang ing cucur akung</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">rakryan tuhanku kita sang sawargga ri kalangwan ing masa kapat</l>
.<l n="b">wruh ngwang ring inggita nikêng wuwusta cumitêng aśoka salaga</l>
.<l n="c">sis ta pwa denta mamangun welaskw ibu mulat manista n alume</l>
1145<l n="d">byaktânusah kusuma wāhu sah saka rikang patah mrik awĕnĕs</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">hāh dyah nihan manĕ-manĕhta māsku marĕkê narendratanaya</l>
.<l n="b">mwang ketakârjja wawanĕnkwa cihna niki panghyang ing katuridan</l>
.<l n="c">ndin tan kasanmata katon manista n ajapĕn ring ārṇnawa madhu</l>
1150<l n="d">byaktā n karĕm kalĕlĕpêng tĕngah ri pangariṣṭa rāga ning akung</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="15" met="mr̥tatodaka">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">tanngeh pwâmbĕk ikang katĕkan unĕng</l>
1155<l n="b">wet ning rāga wirangwrang anaputi</l>
.<l n="c">hetunya n balisah paḍa malara</l>
.<l n="d">ringrang bhranta kinölnya kaḍĕḍĕtan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">tan mangkā sira sang nṛpaduhitā</l>
1160<l n="b">kingking tan wruh i rāt nira maputĕk</l>
.<l n="c">ceṭī mwang kaka lot angupuk-upuk</l>
.<l n="d">wruhnyôjar hamawêng rasa kalangön</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) L duhītā (c) L ceūi; S manupuk-upuk -->
1165<lg n="3"><l n="a">mangkin tibra sirân mĕkĕh asĕkĕl</l>
.<l n="b">wet ning twas baribin rininga-ringa</l>
.<l n="c">tan ryy amban sira tar kĕjĕp angarang</l>
.<l n="d"><foreign>jātī</foreign> ning yuwatī ya tika hana</l>
.</lg>
1170 <!-- 3 (d) = L, K jāti -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">pangde sang prabhu motusa ri sira</l>
.<l n="b">tambe rakwa mĕne sira warangĕn</l>
.<l n="c">ndah yêki n lumare hṛdaya nira</l>
.<l n="d">hetunya n sira mohita wĕwĕgĕn</l>
1175</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">gĕṇḍing mwang padahî yawa karĕngö</l>
.<l n="b">rāmyârūm pangawatnya kinidungan</l>
.<l n="c">lĕñjĕp ning curing arja pamiḍuḍuk</l>
.<l n="d">kapwâsrang sakulĕm hamarimisi</l>
1180</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">sangsiptan wĕngi sākṣaṇa kalalung</l>
.<l n="b">lunghā ng lek sumurup ta sira humöt</l>
.<l n="c">ngkā n ping sapta tikang ghaṭita muni</l>
.<l n="d">kady anggyākĕn ikang rahina tĕkā</l>
1185</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="16" met="girisa">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">atha sumĕgĕp atingkah salwir ning wali sumaji</l>
.<l n="b">krama tumama tikang wwang ngkānêng heng paḍa tumatā</l>
1190<l n="c">diwasa wimala tumrang hyang wai bhāswara sumirat</l>
.<l n="d">nagara cumaraṇâkrām gĕṇḍing ghurṇnita hamijah</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">nṛpati sira sinewa ngkānêng maṇḍapa ri yawa</l>
.<l n="b">makin amuwuhi sobhā ng rājya lwir tasik angĕbĕk</l>
1195<l n="c">wwang ika supĕnuh angjrah bheda wyāpara mariwö</l>
.<l n="d">saragi kumisik asrang rāmya lwir kĕtĕr ing alun</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">hana ta parĕng agasyak sāmpūrṇnâmangan anginum</l>
.<l n="b">sarahina wijah aywan sarwwecchā taya kahala</l>
1200<l n="c">nda tucapa nṛpaputrī ngkānêng weśma piniḍuḍuk</l>
.<l n="d">raras i manis irânrang rūm-rūm ning Ratih inajöng</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">ri sĕḍĕng ira pinöngpöng de ning sthāpita ri dalĕm</l>
.<l n="b">tekap ing angajĕng endah ndan sang dyah makin asuma</l>
1205<l n="c">sumalahasa sirê twas sang nāthân taya tinahā</l>
.<l n="d">karaṇa nira tan arṣêng rūm ning hyas kinĕnakĕna</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) Q swapita (b) L ahajöng for angajĕng (d) Q nira n -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">saphala sira hangantyākĕn śrī ning kapat araras</l>
1210<l n="b">kunĕng i wingit irângde rūkṣa lwir sĕkar alume</l>
.<l n="c">aruṇa tumiling angdoh warṇnânggyākĕna warangĕn</l>
.<l n="d">patĕr ahirit arĕs mār himpĕrnyân pangawat akung</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">irikang alaya lĕnglĕng ngkā rakryan hinariwuwu</l>
1215<l n="b">apituwi sarĕcĕp ning nyāsanyân linarangakĕn</l>
.<l n="c">pamiḍuḍukan irâśrī mār mrat manglĕlĕhakĕna</l>
.<l n="d">kaka-kaka tinamêng rūm mĕnggĕp lwir suramahiṣī</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">lĕwu raras ira sākṣāt hyang ning reka pinahayu</l>
1220<l n="b">inanupama suputrī ratnânindita ri dalĕm</l>
.<l n="c">drawa tatan awalör lyus hyang-hyang ning juruh angajap</l>
.<l n="d">ri manis ira n angaṇḍĕh kepwan rūmnya piniturun</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (d) L irân -->
1225<lg n="8"><l n="a">rawi sumurup anolih krāmnyânunggw i laṭi nira</l>
.<l n="b">jalada sumarawat truh ndan byaktê gĕlungan ira</l>
.<l n="c">dadali habayangan mör lwir miśrê rĕngu ning alis</l>
.<l n="d">kilat aluru kumiñcang ngkānê jöng nira niyata</l>
.</lg>
1230 <!-- 8 (c) Q ni -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">ndan amĕwĕhi pamakpak ning manggalya puja-pujan</l>
.<l n="b">linĕngĕngakĕna de ning wwang ri jro pamiru-miru</l>
.<l n="c">angarangi panameni ng gĕṇḍing mwang curing araras</l>
.<l n="d">saji-saji nika mambö posik ning [h]udadhi lĕngöng</l>
1235</lg>
. <!-- 9 (d) = LQ -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">atha ri surup ikang wai meghanyâñawĕli lumöng</l>
.<l n="b">masa kalima tumanggal <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>tumrang hyang wulan alangö</l>
.<l n="c">sawang alara ya medī de sang sūkṣma ning ahajöng</l>
1240<l n="d">alah aluru manganti ngkānêng rĕm pinisusuran<hi rend="superscript">†</hi></l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">pamatĕh i halĕp ing hyas de sang wwang marĕk i sira</l>
.<l n="b">lwir angirangi langö ning sandhyâmwīt i raras ira</l>
.<l n="c">nguni-nguni sarĕcĕp ning bhāṣa mwang rasa palupuy</l>
1245<l n="d">hana ri manis irângde kingking ta pwa kinĕcapan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (a) Q ing (b) L rangirangi -->
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">awicarita suputrī ndah warṇnan nṛpatanaya</l>
.<l n="b">kinĕ[na]kĕna tĕkap ning pūjāsambhara hiniwö</l>
1250<l n="c">tĕkap ira sang atingkah mangke pwa n pawarang ira</l>
.<l n="d">krama tumuluy umantuk warṇnan de ning amaranga</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 12 (b) = Q -->
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">irika ta sira kālih munggah ring jinĕm alangö</l>
1255<l n="b">widhi ning amayu yêkā n rāmyâwās ri lulut ira</l>
.<l n="c">asĕmu lĕngĕng angicchā yan kesyan karas arĕṇik</l>
.<l n="d">sang ahayu sira sākṣāt rĕsrĕs ning riris alangö</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">ri sĕḍĕng ira n umunggah ndan sang śrī nṛpaduhitā</l>
1260<l n="b">sumar i hāti nirôsah tibrâśā tinamakĕna</l>
.<l n="c">tuhun awĕdi sawet ning kingking wāhu tinarima</l>
.<l n="d">tan anginaki ring āmbĕk tan panghrĕt prih inuluran</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 14 (a) L irân -->
1265<lg n="15"><l n="a">papupul ira piniṇḍa ryy āmbĕk ning mulat araras</l>
.<l n="b">pupus arĕja ya têkā pamyaktê nṛpaduhitā</l>
.<l n="c">nṛpasuta sira himpĕr janggâñjrah luluy angaras</l>
.<l n="d">na wuwus ika paḍônĕng rĕñcĕm twasnya lĕngĕrana</l>
.</lg>
1270 <!-- 15 (a) L ing -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="17" met="mr̥dukomala">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">mangke pwâmiṣayêng langönya tĕkap ing wulan manĕpuhi</l>
.<l n="b">abhrâwā gumawang wangun-wangunan ing <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>gṛhâparimita</l>
1275<l n="c">lāwan söng ni wuwungnya kañcana rinĕngga ning maṇimaya</l>
.<l n="d">krām ning lek mawĕnĕs kasĕnwan i sĕnö nikâkara-kara<hi rend="superscript">†</hi></l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">mambö nyāsan ikang smarāśrama halĕp nikang jamaṇikā</l>
.<l n="b">lwir digdhāha rinantagêng aruṇa ta pwa himpĕr angalih</l>
1280<l n="c">tĕkwan yan hadukūla mālini paturwan ing gṛhalatā</l>
.<l n="d">ambö ning mukawāśa gopita minging mwang utkaṭa sumār</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">sāmpun rakwa ciniṇḍya ring śayana sang narendratanaya</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā sang dyah tinamêng kisapwan ira śoka mār mabayangan</l>
1285<l n="c">tan pendah bhramarângamĕr salaga yan tininggal i dalĕm</l>
.<l n="d">mangkin lwir taḍahharṣa matta marĕk ing niśākara lĕngöng</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">sang lĕnglĕng sira mangkin āngrĕs angĕsah wirangwrang awĕnĕs</l>
.<l n="b">māmbĕt yan kinayuh tĕngah nira tiki n humingsĕr atulak</l>
1290<l n="c">kingking lot sumaput ndatan pahamĕngan tĕñuh manah ira</l>
.<l n="d">luh ngkānêng mata angdadak madhu tikĕl ny alis nira mayat</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">mangkin [h]eñjuh amātyakĕn kĕtĕ-kĕtĕg ta sang nṛpasuta</l>
.<l n="b">singgih yan sira pāwak ing madhu lawan gula drawa rinok</l>
1295<l n="c">wwang tūs ning patĕr ing kapat malapi kingking ing katuridan</l>
.<l n="d">pöh ning rāsika de ning ojar asirat-sirat manis ira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) = LQ -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">dyah sang katwang i lĕnglĕng ing hasana kĕmbang ing sanagara</l>
1300<l n="b">dentângdadya paran kunĕng karaṇa ning raras rumimanga</l>
.<l n="c">harṣa pwêka lawan hunĕng karika dadya ratna winagĕd</l>
.<l n="d">tungtung ning hangarang sakêng Smara siniddhikāra ta kita</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">sambandhanya manis-manista pinakadya hing wwang araras</l>
1305<l n="b">tāsyāsih ring angölwakĕn hṛdaya pangdan ing Manasija</l>
.<l n="c">nityângde twas akung nimitta ning umulw amet ngwang i kita</l>
.<l n="d">mangke pwa n katĕkān mangatpada rarasta ring pakasutan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (b) L akung ngölwakĕn -->
1310<lg n="8"><l n="a">nāhan ling nira sang minanwakĕn irân minge saha tangis</l>
.<l n="b">kady âlūma lĕmĕs nikang pangawak āsmu sinwam angĕsah</l>
.<l n="c">bwat pangrājaśa sang narendratanaya śru sangśaya nira</l>
.<l n="d">ardhângintay ameta rakwa ri lukar ni puṇḍutan ira</l>
.</lg>
1315<lg n="9"><l n="a">om rakryan mapa wiṣṭi ni ngwang amĕlas-harĕp cinapalan</l>
.<l n="b">yadyan prangprangĕn ing halis kapana denya māliha langö</l>
.<l n="c">nohan yan curikĕnta ring wulat arūm sadenya cacahĕn</l>
.<l n="d">donkw îndung hamalar sihanta ring unĕng mĕne n tinarima</l>
.</lg>
1320 <!-- 9 (a) S ning -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">sang śrī ning twas akung kangelan anukĕr lumĕnghay anangis</l>
.<l n="b">tan sārân panĕpak yayâpalisa lunghid ing naka nira</l>
.<l n="c">kokih tang tali-taly amogha cucul ing tĕngah mrik alaris</l>
.<l n="d">lwir mātyênayatan sirânglalu ri rĕs nirân rinabhaṣa</l>
1325</lg>
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">manggĕh citta narendraputra magirang makin tan awĕling</l>
.<l n="b">göng-göngĕn sira tan kamāsihĕn i pamrat ing smara sĕsök</l>
.<l n="c">tĕmpunyê wĕkasan tatan dwa rumujak marê sang araras</l>
.<l n="d">sāntĕn trāsa kalandĕṣêng jaja sayatnya māngrĕs arisi</l>
1330</lg>
. <!-- 11 (c) Q tĕmpuh yê (d) L mangṛṣa ri sira -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="18" met="praharṣiṇī">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">sāmpunya n kawawa gupe wimūrccha sang dyah</l>
1335<l n="b">himpĕr pādapa mawĕnĕs hañar kalahrwan</l>
.<l n="c">mĕnggah mār mawungu marêng dagan manguṇḍĕng</l>
.<l n="d">siñjang mriknya karudhiran mĕlĕs sujinya</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">yângde twas nira n agilâmahaywakĕn ken</l>
1340<l n="b">wet ning rĕs nira tumahêng ulah kapingrwan</l>
.<l n="c">tan sobhâta sira mijil sakêng jinĕm mrik</l>
.<l n="d">ndah mogârĕngu tumiling ri jöng nirâmwas</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">kāgyat tang kaka ri wijil nirân sinungsung</l>
1345<l n="b">māskw indung rari palalun laranta māsku</l>
.<l n="c">tan pendah hañar anginang pĕḍĕs ri lambe</l>
.<l n="d">byaktanyân ahĕli rĕsĕp gatinya sowah</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (b) S rati for rari -->
1350<lg n="4"><l n="a">hetunya n mulih anĕku ta[ma]n* masowe</l>
.<l n="b">lingnyângaswakĕna rahup ri sang suputrī</l>
.<l n="c">sang sinwī rumaras arĕs katon ring āmbĕk</l>
.<l n="d">mañjing ring kṣaṇa hinatĕr sirê kamantyan</l>
.</lg>
1355 <!-- 4 (a) = S (d) Q sirêng -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="19" met="citraturida">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">ndan sang kawĕkas i rūm ning jinĕm araras twas nira makin eñjuh</l>
.<l n="b">de ning mulat arĕjângras manis ira himpĕr sarasija lindi</l>
1360<l n="c">his ning kapat alangö lwir nira tiki n ojar mangĕtĕri ng āmbĕk</l>
.<l n="d">mambö madhukara medĕm ring asana mār mrik [h]atalĕ-talĕh rūm</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">dyah sang maṇik ing akung munggw i tĕlĕng ing onĕng hĕla-hĕla rāgī</l>
.<l n="b">darpângrimangi rikang twas lungid i halistângani hati rĕñcĕm</l>
1365<l n="c">ndin tan pĕjaha linurwan tĕkap i matantâmiṣayani kingking</l>
.<l n="d">denyângrahatiy <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>unĕng rūmta pinakasāntĕn satata tumanggöng</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (d) Q -rahati hunĕng -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">ndan yan pĕjaha kakantâtĕmaha sipat rup kawadi lawan ken<hi rend="superscript">†</hi></l>
1370<l n="b">rāmyân pangalĕpi rūm ning wulat añĕñĕr mwang marĕk i kapö mrik</l>
.<l n="c">yan ring jinĕm angaras ring susu rumagĕt mwang tĕngah arĕjâkrām</l>
.<l n="d">rakryan mapa suka ni ngwang tinarima de ning mangarĕki raśmi</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">ling sang nṛpasuta cumbw ângari-hari mār mrat rasa nika lĕnglĕng</l>
1375<l n="b">śṛnggāra malapi rĕs ngwang kĕna turida prih malara katurwan</l>
.<l n="c">oruk nṛpaduhitângunngun asĕmu sĕbsĕb ning aruṇa mātis</l>
.<l n="d">tapwan lumihati rūm ni[ng] liring ing akung lwir juruh angañut prih</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (c) R aruma for aruṇa (d) = LQ -->
1380<lg n="5"><l n="a">akweh raras ira manglālanakĕna kingking nira nṛpaputrī</l>
.<l n="b">harṣângarĕki sirân anghulunana tĕkwan hangayati sāntĕn</l>
.<l n="c">anghing pamatĕh ikang cumbana tĕpĕt ing dhyāna samaya pinrih</l>
.<l n="d">yêkā n kadi lĕyĕp ing lod juruh inaras ring jaladhara rāgī</l>
.</lg>
1385 <!-- 5 (d) S ing for ring -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="20" met="navaharṣa">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">i kapingrwa nikang gati nṛpaduhitânglih alah mawĕnĕs</l>
.<l n="b">manis ing muka molĕm aluru kadi candra sĕḍĕng makucĕm</l>
1390<l n="c">tuwi kembuhan ing damar anuluhi mogha tĕkângrahati</l>
.<l n="d">nṛpaputra makin pamasa-masa sawet ning unĕng tan arĕn</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (a) L i kapirwa; S awĕnĕs -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ndan ikāng anawing paḍa ta kapilangö kakĕnan turida</l>
1395<l n="b">rumĕngö ri kĕtĕr nira n angudang-udang sahajângrarasi</l>
.<l n="c">sira sang rwa tiḍĕm paḍa maharip angel manawung salulut</l>
.<l n="d">rasa tan huningêng ulĕs ira saha ken kawĕkas dinaga</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (b) S mangudang-udang -->
1400<lg n="3"><l n="a">tan iwön pwa panidra nira ri mari ning gati ring śayana</l>
.<l n="b">krama meh tĕka tang rahina tuwin arūm sirir ing pawana</l>
.<l n="c">anawan wangi ning śri-gaḍing asana puṣpa lawan kamuning</l>
.<l n="d">lĕngĕng ing parahasyan asĕmu pawirāman aweh twas akung</l>
.</lg>
1405<lg n="4"><l n="a">araras muni kokila nika panguhuhnya malon karĕngö</l>
.<l n="b">mwang ikang mrak anguwwang alalĕ[h] irikang gupurânglangĕngi</l>
.<l n="c">kĕtĕr ing bhramarê kuwung ika kadi cumbwa wayuh mangamĕr</l>
.<l n="d">kajĕnĕknya winungwan ing asana lawan puḍak ārjja minging</l>
.</lg>
1410 <!-- 4 (b) = Q; Q anglĕngĕngi -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="21" met="svāgatā">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">sang hyang ārkka sumĕnö wahu tumrang</l>
.<l n="b">warṇna raśmi ning amöm smita rāgī</l>
1415<l n="c">māwa tang kiraṇa bhāswara lumrā</l>
.<l n="d">megha dhūmra sumirat-sirat abhrā</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ceṭikā paḍa sĕnāha patingkah</l>
.<l n="b">ring surambyan umaḍang paḍa ceṣṭa</l>
1420<l n="c">sopacāra ḍamu yêka wawanya</l>
.<l n="d">kapwa mĕñcuh atisomya saharṣa</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="22" met="śikhariṇī">
1425<lg n="1"><l n="a">kunĕng sang karwâpöm lagi karahinan luhya saharas</l>
.<l n="b">makin kagyat wāhw ânglilira* lukar ing ken pinahayu</l>
.<l n="c">mijil sangkêng jro pāmrĕman ata sirân tinghal apĕḍay</l>
.<l n="d">akarwan-karwan lagy aḍamu pinapak ning kaka-kaka</l>
.</lg>
1430 <!-- 1 (a) S kunang (b) Q anglilir i (c) Q pamrĕman na -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">parĕng mĕntas ngkānê tataraban ikang weśma mapupul</l>
.<l n="b">yathālīlâsaṇḍing patiti-titihan pangkwan aśila</l>
.<l n="c">wināswās dewī-dewa halĕp ira sangkêng surapada</l>
.<l n="d">marĕk pwêkang gundik ri sira matatâmaṇḍaga ri sor</l>
1435</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">ndatan manggĕh ngganya n mapupul i surambyan gati nira</l>
.<l n="b">wawang monĕk de ning manis ira sang angde katalĕhan</l>
.<l n="c">kalurwan tinghal pintĕn angatagakĕn mañjing i dalĕm</l>
.<l n="d">maluy munggah ngkānêng śayana sira rāmyâwuḍa-wuḍa</l>
1440</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">tuwin [h]endah lwir ning pamiḍuḍuk ira n karwa hiniwö</l>
.<l n="b">arūm kady âmakpak panguda-ngudang ing gĕṇḍing alangö</l>
.<l n="c">lawan [h]ambö ning [h]utkaṭa jĕnu waneh gulgula mirir*</l>
.<l n="d">ya tâmungwākĕn rāga nira rasa tan peda saharas</l>
1445</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) = LQ (c) = Q; = Q -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">tabĕh ping pat ryy ābhā nira mijila sangkêng gṛha parĕng</l>
.<l n="b">sĕnāha pwêkang sarwwa surasa huwus pūrṇna humaḍang</l>
.<l n="c">karaṇḍan kapwâtingkah atiśaya denyâlawa-lawā</l>
1450<l n="d">gupit mwang nṛttârūm panaḍah ira sarwweccha tinĕkān</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">kasinghyan bwat ning Kāma Ratih inajöng ring pakasutan</l>
.<l n="b">ndatan giṇḍal de ning silih-asih atūt solura langö</l>
.<l n="c">rĕsĕp lwir duh ni wwah sĕrĕh arĕja lāwan waja singi</l>
1455<l n="d">samāptângde <foreign>tuṣṭī</foreign> sumĕkar i panon ing bapa-bibi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (c) L ning (d) = L, K tuṣūi -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="23" met="nāgata">
1460<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">byakta huwus amatĕh līlā citta narapati</l>
.<l n="b">mangkin apulih inak wwang ring rājya sapurati</l>
.<l n="c">wṛddhi wawang umaluy krām ning wīryya sanagara</l>
.<l n="d">nora sumukĕri ng āmbĕk nirwighna sama-sama</l>
1465</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">tan hucapa ta lawas ning lek sang rwa silih-asih</l>
.<l n="b">nora kawiwal irâtūt sakrandana ri dalĕm</l>
.<l n="c">kapwa paḍa mangĕne twas ning nāla gāti [ni]ra</l>
1470<l n="d">tulya mangunĕng umangkĕp mwang jangga silih-asih</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) S ucapĕn (c) = Q -->
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">mangkin anupama sih sang nāthân panĕkakĕna</l>
1475<l n="b">de nira nṛpatiputrâweh sobha manah ira</l>
.<l n="c">mogha tĕlĕb alulut sang Pārthâta juga lanā</l>
.<l n="d">towi sumĕkar ing āmbĕk ning wargga bala hita</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (a) L upama -->
1480<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">prāpta pangĕtĕr ikang rĕtw âkon mahas alangö</l>
.<l n="b">sang nṛpatanaya hāmhām ny āmbĕk nira rumĕngö</l>
.<l n="c">hetu nira ta madan mangdon mangraraha langö</l>
.<l n="d">tīrtha wimala nahan bhyāṣan ling nira n atutur</l>
1485</lg>
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">sāmpun inanumata n winwīt sang kalulut ira</l>
.<l n="b">mukya sira naranātha mwang śrī waramahiṣī</l>
.<l n="c">ndah [h]atita sakatambe mangkat nṛpatanaya</l>
1490<l n="d">rabdha bala haji milwā mangkat paḍa marĕpat</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (c) = L (d) Q apangkat -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="24" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita">
1495<lg n="1"><l n="a">rāmyârūm wangi ning taman kapawanan hūng ning mayūrâlangö</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā tâdan nṛpaputra mangkat alaris ring rājyadhāny ân laku</l>
.<l n="c">lunghā ng ratri katon tikang saḍawatā kalrān rarab ning rĕmĕng</l>
.<l n="d">byaktâpiṇḍa maṇik sumār sumarasah tang bun pĕnuh ring tĕgal</l>
.</lg>
1500 <!-- 1 (d) L ri -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">meh tumrang rawi rîndradeśa sumirat lumrê lurah ning wukir</l>
.<l n="b">kumrām tang wanawṛkṣa kapwa mahalĕp sinwamnya mabhrâraras</l>
.<l n="c">harṣân pangjra[h] ikang cakora ri lurahnyâsrang laki-stry ângaring</l>
.<l n="d">mangkā ng kokila kārkaśān uni hatur sambega ning parwwata</l>
1505</lg>
. <!-- 2 (c) = LQ; L ângiring for ângaring (d) S muni -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">wāhw âron amĕrĕh-mĕrĕh gati nikang wṛkṣâkirih katrangan</l>
.<l n="b">rāmyâlung sĕmi ning latā wila-wila mwang tang sungutnyâsalit</l>
.<l n="c">ekĕl ning katirah mure ya ta rumangkĕp ring tahĕn kañcana</l>
1510<l n="d">holnyângol huray ing wanañjari hatur monĕng pangaywan lulut</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">tūt tĕmbing ni gĕgĕr-gĕgĕr patarukanyâśrī kasĕnwan rawi</l>
.<l n="b">mĕṇḍuh ta pwa pucang gaḍingnya manĕḍĕng nyuhnyârĕjâtuntunan</l>
.<l n="c">ngkānê himbang ikang gagānya n alangö kalyan pisang ring jurang</l>
1515<l n="d">hāryyanyâgĕlar ing lĕmah wahu rurū mambö tikĕl ning tanah</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">tandur-tanduran arja tĕkwan ahijo wāhw <foreign>âkiris</foreign> kābunan</l>
.<l n="b">jahli mwang hwi hilus payanggu manĕḍĕng cungnyâtatâtūt galĕng</l>
.<l n="c">len tang munggw i lĕbak-lĕbaknya tan adoh sāśrī lĕmahnyâraḍin</l>
1520<l n="d">warṇnākāra saḍak gaḍing wahu mungup srak ning talĕsnyâmĕḍar</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) MSS akiris (c) L omits lĕbak- -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">anglīlā pupus ing lirang winulatan sākṣāt panĕpy ângligā</l>
.<l n="b">kady āsā makuśêng lĕmah kapilangö jangganya lum yângajap</l>
1525<l n="c">lwir sāntĕñ juga kesisan [n]dan agĕmuh lĕnglĕng nikang nyū-gaḍing</l>
.<l n="d">pintĕn ngganya titir malap raras ing oghânis humungsyâlangö</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (c) = LQ ; L nyu- -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">ramyā ng cangkilung ing jurang sinamay ing pingnya n humuny ânaḍeng</l>
1530<l n="b">erangnyân angĕlik swaranya n apĕyĕh monĕng manganti ng* rangin</l>
.<l n="c">höh-höh panglari ning samīra kĕtĕr ing pring wungwang angde langö</l>
.<l n="d">lāwan pakṣi kĕtur manohara karĕngwa <foreign>lwīr</foreign> amungwâraras</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (b) Q mon ing for monĕng (d) = L, K lwir -->
1535</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="25" met="kilayu anəḍəṅ">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">lunghā ta laku nira huwus makin katĕmu tang sakamatan alangö</l>
.<l n="b">wwantĕn lura-lurah alĕbā n inambah ira tūt halas-alas arĕnĕb</l>
.<l n="c">aśrī pagaga-gagan aneka tanduran ikâta pinuyu-puyuran</l>
1540<l n="d">heman ya wipula hinatīta mogha mangaluṣya sumarik atalu</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (b) L alĕbah inambah -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">koñjuk cara-cara nika pinggi-pinggir i hĕnū nira tĕgal araḍin</l>
.<l n="b">munggw î suku-suku nikanang gĕgĕr paḍa mangungkuli tarukan ikā</l>
1545<l n="c">trang ning dinakara karaṇanya kapwa paḍa wāspada tuwin angungang</l>
.<l n="d">ngkānê para-parah ika sūkṣma miñcuk i luwuknya hana kaluwutan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) L hĕnu -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">kubwanya n amarĕk i rĕṇĕs-rĕṇĕs lwir anular-nular i pangajaran</l>
1550<l n="b">sugyan ya magigu ri panas hyang ārkka palapatnya kadi kadahaka</l>
.<l n="c">lāgy âjaga-jaga ri kadhūrttan ing wray awĕgig ya malapa tanĕman</l>
.<l n="d">mwang sūkarawana kadurus mahângrabhaṣa cūra paḍa guragaḍa</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">nyū-danta majaja-jajar arja suṇḍay amarantya riy unur angaway</l>
1555<l n="b">rāmyân paḍa ḍara-ḍaran anglangūt sabha-sabhā nikang angapi langö</l>
.<l n="c">ndan wyarttha pajap-ajap anambi ring wut angawandha tĕhĕr anguruṭut</l>
.<l n="d">tan pāntara pamĕḍi-mĕḍinya kārkaśa kupiknya lalu tan inapa</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">honya ng gagarangan asuhun-suhun kusuma pākṣa manulari langö</l>
1560<l n="b">ndan wismṛti juga ri haturnya tan pawangi mātra kadi tan akumöd</l>
.<l n="c">cĕnggânaru-naruh i raras nikāng asana ring kapat inalihakĕn</l>
.<l n="d">denyânasa-nasar ing arūm apan pisaningūn ri ya magaway unĕng</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">kamwāgan amĕḍar i wanginya yângĕmukakĕn pupulutan arusit</l>
1565<l n="b">manggâjĕmur angawatakĕn kasinya kadi moddha kuṭila kuhira</l>
.<l n="c">bāng ning pilapilu pamarĕngga honya suka panggil umawit i jurang</l>
.<l n="d">mwang singgugu sumaji sĕkarnya rurw apasah asmu suma mangalaśā</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">jrah ning wunga tali kadi cāla-cāla ya puji n hiwag angani hati</l>
1570<l n="b">dūra n pangawadi wiparīta rehnya n akurang-kurang ulah atĕngö</l>
.<l n="c">lwir bhranta manigi-nigi maṇḍalīka sinawenya mariris umingĕl</l>
.<l n="d">langguk ya tan amiṣaya rāga meṣi pangalimbang ika kajaruhan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">nāhan racana ni lĕngĕng ing katinghalan i lampah ira nṛpasuta</l>
1575<l n="b">akweh para tapa tumurun yathākrama cumuntĕn i sira lumari</l>
.<l n="c">maswāgata duga-duga somya mawwata mahoṣadhi phala surasa</l>
.<l n="d">tuṣṭênabhimata dĕmakan tĕkap nṛpatiputra tatan upir-upir</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (b) L ratā- for yathā- -->
1580<lg n="9"><l n="a">kweh porajana tan ucapĕñ jurunya pinirêka paḍa-paḍa marĕk</l>
.<l n="b">sāmpūrṇna pahula nika bhoga honya phalamūla duwĕgan amanis</l>
.<l n="c">twak len kilang sahana-hanê kuwunya hinatĕrnya taya puji-pujin</l>
.<l n="d">līlā nṛpatisuta ri denya mangkana hanâhyun ira n anginĕpā</l>
.</lg>
1585<lg n="10"><l n="a">tambe kamĕna nira muwah [h]umangkata marâwana mahas alangö</l>
.<l n="b">sanyāsa diwasa sumurup tikang rawi matang nira madan akulĕm</l>
.<l n="c">ngkānêng kuśala cinaturanggabhṛtya paḍa tan palĕ-palĕh akĕmit</l>
.<l n="d">towin hina[ri]wuwu tĕkap nikang para duwan marĕk atata-tatā</l>
.</lg>
1590 <!-- 10 (a) MSS umangkata (d) = Q -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="26" met="turidagati">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">ri tĕlas ikang kulĕm nṛpatiputra lumaku muwah angrarah langö</l>
