.<l n="b">i silu-siluk nikāng acala rāmya kahawan ira pinggir ing parung</l>
1595<l n="c">alapat arūm karĕngwan i taluktak ika lĕngĕng aganti ring jurang</l>
.<l n="d">pakĕcap ing erttalinya tan awās tuna-tuna karĕngö maweh langö</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (b) S jurang for parung (c) S palapat for alapat (d) L pangĕcap; -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">lura-lurah anglunang ri pĕluk ing wukir alas-alasanya tūt hiring</l>
1600<l n="b">alalĕh i sornya kampira putih jalada nika katon ñamut-ñamut</l>
.<l n="c">hana tumĕḍun maliṇḍungan apiṇḍa tura-turah ikang wĕngi n hilang</l>
.<l n="d">kumĕḍap ikang walik-kaḍĕp aganti kadi matag amukṣa tan hiner</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (d) Q matah for matag; S mokṣa -->
1605<lg n="3"><l n="a">atha kumĕñar hyang ārkka mabingar kadi muka ning akung hanêng jinĕm</l>
.<l n="b">apalarasan tusāra nika ring tṛṇa hangada-hadânusup-nusup</l>
.<l n="c">alilang awās hanâmpu tapa munggw i patarukan i lambwan ing wukir</l>
.<l n="d">asĕmu ḍarâputih lumarap ārjja kasuluhan ikang diwākara</l>
.</lg>
1610 <!-- 3 (c) L munggw î -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">bala nira rāmya tūt ri lĕbak ing gĕgĕr ataratayan kasamburat</l>
.<l n="b">mwang ikang alumba-lumba sawaneh tang aruruku ring agra lor kidul</l>
.<l n="c">amija-mijah mamet ri lĕngĕng ing giriwana pinaran paḍâgirang</l>
.<l n="d">tuwi karĕngö pratidhwani ning anggrit angidĕri paḍâtri ghūrṇnita</l>
1615</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) L rata-ratayan, Q atarateyan for atatatayan (b) L sawaneh angaruruku -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">nṛpasuta harṣa yan tumurun ing ratha lumaku mahas mapet langö</l>
.<l n="b">manusupa ring wanāntara ya kawruhana niyata ling nirê hati</l>
.<l n="c">tuhun alaris tayângdulura kewala sira juga tan hana wruha</l>
1620<l n="d">kalalu layat nirân lĕpas adoh ndan anĕbu-nĕbu sangśayâlangö</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (c) L añjulura for angdulura -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">kunĕng iki sang nṛpātmaja kalangwan i racana nikang wanângaḍang</l>
.<l n="b">kiniwat ikang mahantĕn angungang sinama jamur i dunghus ing trĕbis</l>
1625<l n="c">ya ta kahanan narendrasuta lālana tumiling i rāmya ning tĕtö*</l>
.<l n="d">hana ta parabnya mātra palupuynya rininga-ringa lāgi tan lutur</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (c) Q gĕgĕr for tĕtö -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">patapan añar katon ri tĕpi ning jurang arĕcĕp angungkul-ungkuli</l>
1630<l n="b">kunĕng iki sang tamolah i dalĕmnya kasutapan ira ndatan hinop</l>
.<l n="c">linawanan ing tapī pili-pilih pamurung ing [ang]usir jayendriya</l>
.<l n="d">titir anganam rarasnya kinirenya <foreign>lumĕngĕri</foreign> samādhi sang ṛṣi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (a) L angungkuli (c) = Q, L lacuna of 13 syllables from linawana to [ang]usir; (d) = Q, J lumĕngöri -->
1635<lg n="8"><l n="a">lwah amalahar [h]amānuṣa katonan ika kadi pangipyan ing langö</l>
.<l n="b">ya juga katungku-tungkulan ing agra kadi ta panganak nikang pasir</l>
.<l n="c">kunĕng i sarenya rāmya hana ring palipiran acawit śilātala</l>
.<l n="d">pilih awarah pĕnĕdnya tanahĕn pangudarana gurit kawiśwara</l>
.</lg>
1640 <!-- 8 (a) MSS amānuṣa -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">ikang i tĕngahnya manda tan awās karang iki n amaranti ring bañu</l>
.<l n="b">ya ta dinĕlö ndatan cala pakömnya yan inupuk-upuk kasĕmburan</l>
.<l n="c">sinahaja komalânidĕhi pāṇḍan ika paran i sanghub ing limut</l>
.<l n="d">hana ta puḍaknya kengis anguḍoḍa kadi pitĕngĕn ing mahas mangö</l>
1645</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">iningĕt-ingĕt ring inggita langönya pawulatan ikang nadītaṭa</l>
.<l n="b">luluy angalap ri lĕnglĕng ing apālapan angusira rāmya ning parab</l>
.<l n="c">wwaya ta manuknya kīnnara lawan dali-dali tĕka mampirêriya</l>
.<l n="d">hana kapukĕt rikang wwad ing aket tĕlas asibu pijĕr parĕng miḍĕm</l>
1650</lg>
. <!-- 10 (d) L kaputĕk -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">cangak ataramtam ing bañu waneh mangadĕg-adĕg apakṣa bhikṣukā</l>
.<l n="b">angikĕt-ikĕt wilāśa pakaleśya nika n anulingi lyang ing wĕlut</l>
.<l n="c">kapacĕ[h] ikang maningṭing akĕcĕk salaki-bini milag parĕng mĕsat</l>
1655<l n="d">humĕnĕng ikang mayūra tan ari ñ jĕnĕk angigĕl angantya ring bañu</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (c) = LQ -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="27" met="toṭaka">
1660<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">nṛpaputra makin sira harṣa mulat</l>
.<l n="b">irikang walahar mahĕning wimala</l>
.<l n="c">ya matangnya masö ta sirân parahup</l>
.<l n="d">tumĕḍun ri dalĕm ning anindyanadī</l>
1665</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">waramudra wiśeṣa kināryya tĕhĕr</l>
.<l n="b">ri bhaṭāra sahasrarawi n pajapa</l>
.<l n="c">saha kūṭarahasyasamādhi nira</l>
1670<l n="d">dudug ing paramārtha acintyamaya</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="28" met="pr̥thvītala">
.<lg n="1">
1675<l n="a">sĕḍĕng prawara Phalguṇâjapa manöb tĕḍuh nirmmala</l>
.<l n="b">ndatan dwa hana ta grahâhugah agöng matunggwêng nadī</l>
.<l n="c">ya hetu nika tan hana ngwang umarêrikâlah kumöl</l>
.<l n="d">mĕne pwa hana gandha sang prawara Pārtha kongas marūm</l>
.</lg>
1680 <!-- 1 (b) L matunggwê -->
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">wawang pwa mamangun galaknya maganas sawetnyâlapa</l>
.<l n="b">lanêngut-ingutĕn hatinya ya umöng wibhukty âlawas</l>
.<l n="c">katon ya ḍumĕpang hanêng bañu mangang sihungnyâsalit</l>
1685<l n="d">karal-karal ikê mukanya kadi Rāhu rodrâdbhuta</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">mulat nṛpatiputra tan wighani niścayâtah sira</l>
.<l n="b">hiner nira ḍatĕngnya tan dwa <foreign>maparö</foreign> harĕp mangdĕmak</l>
1690<l n="c">samangkana parĕng masö ta masĕlur patangkĕp nira</l>
.<l n="d">makin mapulingan paḍângiringi cidra tapwan marĕs</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (b) = L, K maparĕ -->
.<lg n="4">
1695<l n="a">sawet ni patarung nirâpan agĕlis manginte sikĕp</l>
.<l n="b">kadi pwa n udula ng nadī bañu niki n katūb miṇḍuhur</l>
.<l n="c">hanan lwir inayun ya motĕr i tĕngah latĕknyân wutah</l>
.<l n="d">sawang tinawu de nirân silih-usī saroṣângdumuk</l>
.</lg>
1700 <!-- 4 (a) L has a lacuna of initial five syllables followed by -rang (for rung) nirâpan (b) Q de ni for nadī -->
.<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">jĕmūr maputĕran silih-gyat awilĕt bĕtah tan mangel</l>
.<l n="b">wicitra tuwi nirbhayân ginurumung ndatan kātrĕsan</l>
.<l n="c">malĕs ta manikĕp tuwi pwa kinawil rinuṇḍĕk rinok</l>
1705<l n="d">hanan parĕng akañjaran laga nirân marangkĕp muwah</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6">
.<l n="a">tangeh prang ira saprahāra ta masor lĕkas ning graha</l>
.<l n="b">kacidra sinikĕp ndatan dwa pinutĕr ya kady âhangan</l>
1710<l n="c">pinanduk irikang śilāgra kapisan wĕhangnyânanā</l>
.<l n="d">cĕngĕlnya ya tikĕl ndatan pabiṣa de nirang Phalguṇa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (a) L saprahārā -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">ri sāmpun ika māti tan dwa winawêrikang bhūtala</l>
1715<l n="b">mulat kapĕnĕtan ta sang nṛpatiputra rehnyân pĕjah</l>
.<l n="c">bangun paniluman hiḍĕp nira rikân panon apsarī</l>
.<l n="d">ya rakwa n awatāra ning wuhaya māti sākṣāt hayu</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">rĕrĕb kusuma tan pĕgat ya tumibê narendrātmaja</l>
1720<l n="b">ikang bhramara medran ānghrĕng akarang-karang ring sĕkar</l>
.<l n="c">nahan mara pamūrṣitanya ya rurū ri sang Phalguṇa</l>
.<l n="d">ya kāraṇa narendraputra karĕṇan matakwan sira</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
1725<div type="canto" rend="met" n="29" met="puṣpitāgrā">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">krama mawara-warah tikang surastrī</l>
.<l n="b">surawanitā ngwang iki n manĕhta sākṣāt</l>
.<l n="c">hulunan ira Dhanādhipa pratīta</l>
.<l n="d">nghulun iki nāma si Sarwwadā ndatan len</l>
1730</lg>
. <!-- 1 (c) Q prasiddha for pratīta -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">papat ahayu sanak mami n surastrī</l>
.<l n="b">adulur atūt ngwang ameta rāmya secchā</l>
.<l n="c">katĕka ring Alakāwatī pradeśa</l>
1735<l n="d">ya ta taman ing Hamarāwatī surāmya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (b) Q madulur -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">wwaya ta sira mahārṣi siddhayogī</l>
.<l n="b">gumawayakĕn tapa tan samêng triloka</l>
1740<l n="c">smaraṇa nira nahan winighna dengku</l>
.<l n="d">kadi pangatag ning anĕmwa pāpakārmma</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">gĕlĕng ira ta manāpa kong asampay</l>
.<l n="b">graha tĕmahamwa kaṭungka ghātakêng rāt</l>
1745<l n="c">na wuwus ira samāntarântasūkṣma</l>
.<l n="d">kami kawĕkas wulangun saśokabuddhi</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">krama lumaku mamet nadī wisāta</l>
.<l n="b">tĕka ring Awindya muwah sirân kapangguh</l>
1750<l n="c">mami parĕng umusap ri jöng nirânghyang</l>
.<l n="d">ri wĕlas irâta maweha ng antaśāpa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (d) Q antasśapa -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">prakṛti nira parārtha śantacitta </l>
1755<l n="b">karuṇa sinambah inambwakĕn kabhaktin</l>
.<l n="c">manganumata anugrahântaśāpa</l>
.<l n="d">waluya ning angdadi śuddha ning kajanman</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">palalun iki dĕlāha rakwa tĕmbe</l>
1760<l n="b">hana ta ya Pārtha ngaranya Paṇḍuputra</l>
.<l n="c">hanan* ikana ḍatĕng mahas mara ngke</l>
.<l n="d">rasika sumĕngkakĕnê kitân muwah hyang</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (b) Q Pāṇḍusuta (c) LQ nahan -->
1765<lg n="8"><l n="a">ri tĕlas i pangucap nirêka lunghā</l>
.<l n="b">kami wĕkasan manusup mamet pradeśa</l>
.<l n="c">kalalu tĕka rikêng nadī Swabhadra</l>
.<l n="d">tĕhĕr atĕmah wuhayêka rodrakārmma</l>
.</lg>
1770 <!-- 8 (a) Q ni for i -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">pira kari lawas ing yuga wyamoha</l>
.<l n="b">alapa wibhukti tatan wri rāt mahūnghāng</l>
.<l n="c">mṛga uraga asing ḍatĕng minum wwe</l>
.<l n="d">niyata pĕjah parilĕnkwa śīrṇna bhakṣan</l>
1775</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">karaṇa nika tatan panoñ juga ngwang</l>
.<l n="b">kami katakutnya kabeh musuhnya ri ngke</l>
.<l n="c">makin alapa halib pwa duhkapāpa</l>
.<l n="d">pangawaśa ning [h]ati bhangga kaśmala bwat</l>
1780</lg>
. <!-- 10 (d) = LR -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">kunĕng iki ri ḍatĕngta labdhacitta</l>
.<l n="b">kita tiki sopana ning maluy surastrī</l>
.<l n="c">aparimita hutangku tan pahīngan</l>
1785<l n="d">kita ta sumĕngkakĕn ing [h]aweci pāpa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (c) L pahingan (d) MSS aweci -->
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">kṣamakĕna yadiyan kĕnoh rasanya</l>
.<l n="b">tuluyi usönta kadangku hilwakĕnta</l>
1790<l n="c">apan iki kawĕkas mamukti duhka</l>
.<l n="d">paḍa ta matunggalan ing nadī ya tângher</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="30" met="basantatilakā">
1795<lg n="1"><l n="a">nā ling nikang surawadhū ri sang āryya Pārtha</l>
.<l n="b">ndātan wihang nṛpatiputra hinop asantwa</l>
.<l n="c">yêkā n lum[am]pah adulur tikanang surastrī</l>
.<l n="d">tĕkwan mānyāt laris nira tan parāryyan</l>
.</lg>
1800 <!-- 1 (c) = LQ -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">prāptêng nadī kahanan ing graha durgga rāmya</l>
.<l n="b">sāmpun sinĕngkakĕn irêka kabeh umĕntas</l>
.<l n="c">saprīti kapwa umuwah matĕmah surastrī</l>
.<l n="d">mangkin mangañjali ri sang wara Paṇḍuputra</l>
1805</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">he āryya Pārtha kita sādhu parārtha ring rāt</l>
.<l n="b">rakryan prasiddha śaraṇangkwa pawitra sākṣāt</l>
.<l n="c">singgih bhaṭāra Naradewa kitâśarīra</l>
.<l n="d">anghing guṇanta sumĕnö mibĕk ing triloka</l>
1810</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">ndah mangka ôjar ika harṣa narendraputra</l>
.<l n="b">heh apsarī kita kapān aku bhagnacitta</l>
.<l n="c">anghing [swa]dharmma nira sajjana sambhawêng rāt</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan tinūtku n umaropaṇakĕn laranta</l>
1815</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) L mangke n ojar (c) = LQ; Q sajana for sajjana -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">tan sangka ring rajata kañcana ratna bhoga</l>
.<l n="b">donku n [h]umĕntasakĕnê kita duhkakāla</l>
.<l n="c">bwat sang kṣinatriya tatan dadi nisturêng rāt</l>
1820<l n="d">kīrtyâdi kewala ginĕgwa nahan sinadhyā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (b) = L (d) R ginĕnggwa, S ginĕngkwa; L sinaddhyā -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">nāhan wuwus prawara Pārtha sahôpapattya</l>
.<l n="b">lwir kodanan tĕkap ing āmrĕta tang surastrī</l>
1825<l n="c">denyâdhikāra panĕmunya waraprasāddha</l>
.<l n="d">tan wruh pwa yâmuhakanêng yaśa merutulya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (b) S adds (smrĕta) after kodanan -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">atyanta bhāra kuśalanta tĕlas kabhukti</l>
1830<l n="b">ndātan pamātra walĕsangkwa amogha nirdon</l>
.<l n="c">nirwighna māsku kṛtakṛtya jayārtha mangko</l>
.<l n="d">manggĕh pangöban ing anāśraya bhūmipāla</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">akweh pangastuti nikê nṛpaputra Pārtha</l>
1835<l n="b">ndâtīta sāmpun amuhun ya ri sang Kirīṭi</l>
.<l n="c">lunghā parĕng kṣaṇa mĕsat ya ring antarikṣa</l>
.<l n="d">ring swarggaloka dunungĕnya tatan wiwākṣan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">sang Pārtha kāri siwuhĕn sira mār katṛṣṇan</l>
1840<l n="b">lamlam luluy kamadĕlön sira yan tumĕnghā</l>
.<l n="c">cĕb ngĕr manah nira rumengwa gĕrĕh ya māsrĕt</l>
.<l n="d">ngkānê du kilyan anamar swara ning surastrī</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (b) L tumĕngö for tumĕnghā (c) R manĕh; L yā -->
1845<lg n="10"><l n="a">tangheh pangūha nira mogha tiling hyang ārkka</l>
.<l n="b">mangkin sirâsĕpi ri tīra nikang saraswan</l>
.<l n="c">rĕsrĕsnya kewala maśabda lumer ya medran</l>
.<l n="d">panglinggan ing sarayi śuddha śinuddha lingnya</l>
.</lg>
1850<lg n="11"><l n="a">ndah warnaṇĕn bala nirân tĕka yêka magyā</l>
.<l n="b">kapwâruhun-ruhunan amrih anūt ri wuntat</l>
.<l n="c">harṣâgirang hana ta rĕsnya tiki n silih wor</l>
.<l n="d">denya n ḍĕngö gati ni wṛtta nirêng surastrī</l>
.</lg>
1855 <!-- 11 (a) R warṇanĕ -->
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">tatkāla sang nṛpatiputra humer hana ngkā</l>
.<l n="b">ndan sang mahāmuni ring aśrama têki wāktan</l>
.<l n="c">sakweh nirâtapa ri deśa nikang Swabhadra</l>
.<l n="d">kapwângrĕngö ri hilang ing bhaya ning patīrthan</l>
1860</lg>
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">yêkā n satuṣṭa magirang mari de nirârĕs</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā prĕgya mangkata kabeh paratê sang āryya</l>
.<l n="c">cuṇḍuk ta sang prawara Pārtha sĕḍĕng marāryyan</l>
.<l n="d">ryy ākāra ning lituhajöng ya maweh kapūhan</l>
1865</lg>
. <!-- 13 (d) Q arkara -->
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">atwang sang Arjjuna ḍatĕng nira sang para rṣi</l>
.<l n="b">ngkāna n sirâśila sasomya paḍâtiśanta</l>
.<l n="c">mojar pararṣi tija bhāgya ḍatĕngta mangko</l>
1870<l n="d">ngke ring Swabhadra umah ārjja ri sang tapaswī</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 14 (a) Q maharsi for paraṛsi -->
.<lg n="15"><l n="a">ndan lingku de nṛpatiputra marêng wanādri</l>
.<l n="b">siddhyânu bhāra pinakāśraya ning masadhyā</l>
1875<l n="c">pangde bhaṭāra niyatêki jayanta ring rāt</l>
.<l n="d">byaktā n kṛtārtha ri hiḍĕp mami pamrihanta</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="16"><l n="a">nā ling nirang rĕṣi narendrasutârjjawôjar</l>
.<l n="b">opwan hanêky anumanā mpu rikêng kadi ngwang</l>
1880<l n="c">panggil wĕnang dadaha ing mangusir śubhārtha</l>
.<l n="d">icchānta mantasana kārmma nikang triloka</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 16 (a) S inserts line 17a in parenthesis before 16a (c) Q angusi -->
.<lg n="17"><l n="a">nā ling nira krama ḍatĕng tikanang pamṭjā</l>
1885<l n="b">pādyādi cāmana hanārgghya waneh sĕrĕh wwah</l>
.<l n="c">lāwan mahoṣadhi dudū ng phalamūla pattya</l>
.<l n="d">winwat nikang tapi-tapī paḍa sopacāra</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 17 (d) L tapa-tapī -->
1890<lg n="18"><l n="a">kāścaryya wāhu lumihat ri sang āryya Pārtha</l>
.<l n="b">sis hyang Manobhawa sirêki nihan mara ngke</l>
.<l n="c">sadhyā dumona mĕnĕm angrarahêng kalangwan</l>
.<l n="d">irṣyâmunah brata samādhi nahan ta lingnya</l>
.</lg>
1895 <!-- 18 (a) S kāscaryan (b) L sang for sis -->
.<lg n="19"><l n="a">ngkā sang watĕk tapa parĕng ta sirân pangajñe</l>
.<l n="b">sang Pārtha tan dwa hiniwö sira de pararṣi</l>
.<l n="c">sāmpun sirêkana <foreign>pinūja</foreign> makin sutṛpti</l>
.<l n="d">ndah ring samāntara mahārṣi muwah ta mojar</l>
1900</lg>
. <!-- 19 (b) Q maharṣi for paraṛṣi (c) J pinūjā -->
.<lg n="20"><l n="a">He sang nṛpātmaja kitâdhika śāraṇangkwa</l>
.<l n="b">sakweh nirang muni sagotra kabeh rinākṣa</l>
.<l n="c">āpa* ndatan hana waneh pakapuṇya jāti</l>
1905<l n="d">sangkê panonku ri kitâñ jaya siddhakāryya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 20 (c) L āpan ndatan -->
.<lg n="21"><l n="a">ndan mātra têki pitĕngĕn ngwang iki n rĕngönta</l>
.<l n="b">yāwat sukābhyudaya tāwat iwĕhnya bhuktin</l>
1910<l n="c">wit ning janapriya adṛśya matangnya langgĕng</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan pradhāna pinakāsya kadharmmamūrttyan*</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 21 (d) = LS -KR -murtyat -->
.<lg n="22"><l n="a">anghing prihĕn tĕmĕn i sandhi nikêng śarīra</l>
1915<l n="b">ekātwa mukya sarapungnya ginöng tar olah</l>
.<l n="c">maryyāda yukti hamĕngānya nahan winṛddhi</l>
.<l n="d">nāhan ta hetu nikanang ripu tan tumampĕk</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 22 (c) Q hamĕnganta -->
1920<lg n="23"><l n="a">yapwan triloka riy awakta tatan prabheda</l>
.<l n="b">nirdwaiṣa de ning anurāga lawan kaśāntan</l>
.<l n="c">sakweh nikang ripu ya tan tumamê yawê jro</l>
.<l n="d"><foreign>sarwweccha</foreign> nirbhaya kitêka sakāma-kāma</l>
.</lg>
1925 <!-- 23 (b) S anugara for anuraga (d) MSS sarwwecchā, -->
.<lg n="24"><l n="a">nā lwir nikang samaya winyakṛtâtiyukti</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā sang Dhanañjaya sirêka manādhukāra</l>
.<l n="c">towin saniścaya yinogya tĕmĕn rasanya</l>
.<l n="d">sangsipta mangkana pagoṣṭi nira byatītan</l>
1930</lg>
.<lg n="25"><l n="a">prāpta ng kulĕm ndan anginĕp prawarâryya Pārtha</l>
.<l n="b">ngkānêng tapowana ginocara sang tapaswī</l>
.<l n="c">rāmyâsyakāraṇa samṛddhya nikang patīrthan</l>
.<l n="d">de ning prabhāwa nṛpaputra sumiddhikāra</l>
1935</lg>
. <!-- 25 (d) Q ni -->
.<lg n="26"><l n="a">henak ta sang nṛpatiputra hanêng paranti</l>
.<l n="b">ring sthāna maṇḍapa manojña wiśuddha mārsik</l>
.<l n="c">simpar ya tônggwan ira rakwa muwah pinūjā</l>
1940<l n="d">ndan sang watĕk yati kabeh tuturung wisāta</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 26 (d) Q yatiwara for yati kabeh -->
.<lg n="27"><l n="a">ardhâlangö lĕngĕng ing aśrama śūnya rāmya</l>
.<l n="b">de ning niśākara rumĕngga pajangnya molĕm</l>
1945<l n="c">tulya praḍīpa suluh ing patapan katejan</l>
.<l n="d">mār gandha ning mayang arūm rumĕsĕp ta subnya</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="28"><l n="a">angras raras pangĕsah ing sara ḍanta kerir</l>
.<l n="b">kumbang mahângisĕk-isĕk ri kuwungnya māsrĕt</l>
1950<l n="c">ngel kungnya ring wĕngi hanāḍin aśoka tañjung</l>
.<l n="d">darpâmangun rĕsĕp i citta narendraputra</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 28 (c) S aneka for aśoka (d) S narendrasuta -->
.<lg n="29"><l n="a">akweh pwa gocara nirang ṛṣi kapwa tuṣṭa</l>
1955<l n="b">lāwan narendrasuta Phalguṇa rāmya sātūt</l>
.<l n="c">tingkah nikang surawadhū ya winahwa-wāhwan</l>
.<l n="d">ndātan kathākĕna ikang wĕngi tan dwa lunghā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 29 (a) Q nirêng for nirang -->
1960<lg n="30"><l n="a">eñjing ta sang nṛpatiputra mulih saka ngkā</l>
.<l n="b">tan warṇnanĕn ta sira ring wanamārga ngūni</l>
.<l n="c">prāptêng Mayūrapura rāmya sirân sinungsung</l>
.<l n="d">strī rājya harṣa sahananya rikang kaḍatwan</l>
.</lg>
1965</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="31" met="udgatavisama">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">riy ulih nira ndan alawas pwa pakurĕn ira rāmya ring dalĕm</l>
.<l n="b">pūrṇna sanagara kagöngan inak</l>
.<l n="c">kawawê sutṛpta haji de sang Arjjuna</l>
1970</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ri patūt nirâmithuna sanggama lulut ira tan kathākĕna</l>
.<l n="b">mānak aniru lituhayw aguṇa</l>
.<l n="c">wara Wabhruwāhana tināma sang yayah</l>

1975<lg n="3"><l n="a">irikā n kināryya winiśeṣa wali nira aneka de haji</l>
.<l n="b">tuṣṭa manĕmu maṇik ing jaladhi</l>
.<l n="c">iwa mangkanêki suka sang nareśwara</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (d) Q nareśwarya -->
1980<lg n="4"><l n="a">sira tan waneh ri hati ning sanagara karuhun wwang ing dalĕm</l>
.<l n="b">nghing sira juga ling ikā n siwinĕn</l>
.<l n="c">hinarĕp-harĕp pinakarākṣakêng prajā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) S sang for wwang -->
1985<lg n="5"><l n="a">kalaranya ngūni ya hiwön kadi kalara nikang tṛṇāngkura</l>
.<l n="b">rūkṣa malar i titis ing jalada</l>
.<l n="c">kasarambahañ jawuh awās hurip muwah</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">kadi tan pacāla sakapunpunan ira katĕkêng ḍusun-ḍusun</l>

.<l n="c">abungah lwir oliha śaśāngka bhāskara</l>

. <!-- 6 (b) L hayu for rahayu -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">adawā n matêki suka ning sanagara yadiyan winarṇana</l>
1995<l n="b">sang nṛpatanaya gumanty ajarĕn</l>
.<l n="c">atutur sirê wacana sang ṛṣiśwara</l>

.<lg n="8"><l n="a">apitowi sāmpun <foreign>aparö</foreign> sawĕlas ika tahun ya meh gĕnĕp</l>
.<l n="b">hetu nira tiki muwah tumihang </l>
2000<l n="c">ndan ikang kadhīran i manah nirâpagĕh</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (a) = LQ, K aparĕ -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">sira sang priyā nira kinol inari-hari tĕkap nṛpātmaja</l>
.<l n="b">towi winara[h] ikang aywa tinūt</l>
2005<l n="c">nda hĕlĕm sirân maluy umandangê sira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (a) R inserts sira after kinol (b) = LQ -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">waraputrikā wruh i manah ni kalulut ira tan kasangśaya</l>
.<l n="b">śāsana nira paramārtha tĕpĕt</l>
2010<l n="c">alĕmĕh yadi n kajahatêng warāngganā</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">ya ta hetu ning twas ira tan magigu saphala rājaputrikā</l>
.<l n="b">ndan ling ira pisaningūn mahala</l>
.<l n="c">yadiyan makon mulahakĕn kaniṣṭikān</l>
2015</lg>
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">irikā Dhanañjaya marĕk tĕhĕr amuhun i sang nareśwara</l>
.<l n="b">tan winaḍa sira tĕkap nṛpati</l>
.<l n="c">tuhu sādhu satya satirun sirêng sarāt</l>
.</lg>
2020</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="32" met="jagaddhita">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">sangsiptan ri tĕlas nirâmuhun umangkat atĕhĕr alaris tĕkê yawa</l>
.<l n="b">tan maglis dahatĕn ta lampah ira tūt hawan anginak-inak pijĕr mangö</l>
.<l n="c">rāmyânon langĕ ning pradeśa kadi tan bĕsur asayut asanggrahê sira</l>
2025<l n="d">hetunya n hacawit-cawit ndan amalar winulatan angungang ya tângaḍang</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">pinggir-pinggir ikang hawan paḍa katon sumaji-saji langönya yan liring</l>
.<l n="b">nyāsanya n kamatĕnggĕngĕn lwir inatīta paḍa kahĕnĕkañ jugângadĕg</l>
.<l n="c">lwir tan ryy amban alök mirah ni kayu teja nika cala mĕhah linalwakĕn</l>
2030<l n="d">osik pringnya maringgungan [n]dan agĕyuh ri panawat ing angin ya moṇḍuhan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (d) = LQ -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">wanwâtyanta halĕpnya söh sabha-sabhā wruh anukani patingkah ing hĕnū</l>
.<l n="b">manghāt-hāt ya tiki n panungsung i langönya tinĕmu nira yan lumampaha</l>
2035<l n="c">honyêki n walaharnya nirmmala ri hengnya kumulilingi tīra ning lĕbuh</l>
.<l n="d">wwangnyângangswa marêng pabañwan ika len tang aruruku katon paḍâhalĕp</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (c) L -êking (d) L -ângampwa for -ângangswa; Q kang for tang -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">nāntĕn ngganya pilih-pilih tinawung ing gati hinuḍaran ing kadang-kadang</l>
2040<l n="b">līlā bhāwa nikêniring saha tabang-tabang araras arūm kinangsyakĕn</l>
.<l n="c"><foreign>aśrī</foreign> denya marumpukan kusuma sāhyas awahĕl apĕnĕd bhinūṣaṇan</l>
.<l n="d">pintĕn yan panĕkar yathâcingang anon ri halĕp ira sĕḍĕng halintanga</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (c) = L, K aśri -->
2045<lg n="5"><l n="a">mangkā tingkah ikāng awan paḍa katon kalĕngĕngan ika de nṛpātmaja</l>
.<l n="b">kweh sĕñjang majajar-jajar tuwin apañcuran atalaga kapwa nirmmala</l>
.<l n="c">kalyan pangkaja wāhwa maikala sawang muka ning ahayu karwaban manis</l>
.<l n="d">raśminya n lagi kāmukan ri wĕrĕh ing bañu hasĕmu kase sumār marūm</l>
.</lg>
2050<lg n="6"><l n="a">tambak-tambak ikârjja <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>kapwa minahā wangunan ika sulakṣaṇâhayu</l>
.<l n="b">mangkā bapra nikêng gaḍuh bhinaṭa miśra mapacira minerw agopura<hi rend="superscript">†</hi></l>
.<l n="c">sarwwecchā n pangawe smi ning bhujagapuṣpa malaris anamar girahyasĕn</l>
.<l n="d">duṣṭā ning pawanâsring edi karaṇanya n akusa-kasikan lumimbaya</l>
.</lg>
2055 <!-- 6 (b) S nikang for nikêng -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">kady âbhūṣaṇa raśmi ning jring awĕlas-harĕp arĕja sawang wulang tatur</l>
.<l n="b">añjrah tang wara padmarāga niyata wruh angawakĕna jong jugâraras</l>
.<l n="c">kumbangnyâlarasan yayâkalib añumbana rumabhaṣa māryya koluyan</l>
.<l n="d">lwir tan pātma tinampik ing pawana nistura mawarah i raśmi ning mĕnur</l>
2060</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">tingkah ning rawa rāmya tĕkwan amĕwĕh-mĕwĕhi lĕngĕng iki n winarṇana</l>
.<l n="b">kady aptyâkilayū n langönya ri laris nṛpatanaya tĕkângalimbanga</l>
.<l n="c">kongang rūm ni sare-sarenya hana pāṇḍan asaniga puḍaknya tūt sisi</l>
.<l n="d">pañjrah ning śatapatra mĕmbang abungah mara hangaway ikang madhubrata</l>
2065</lg>
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">ngkānê tīra nikânĕḍĕng suraga rājasa paḍa kadi kambang ing jinĕm</l>
.<l n="b">honya ng cāmpaka kāpnĕtan wiphala danta nika turung inudwadêng mangö</l>
.<l n="c">kāryy ânglampwa hunĕngnya wet ni taya ning kawi humañang i kungnya sĕmpalĕn</l>
.<l n="d">manggā māty anapih kalangwan angañut kusuma nika lĕwas tibêng bañu</l>
2070</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">tanngeh tingkah ikāng awan mara hiḍĕp nṛpatanaya yadi n dawākĕna</l>
.<l n="b">mangkin śighra layat laris nira atīta ri lawas ira sambya manglĕngöng</l>
.<l n="c">tan dwêkī n kawawêrikang jaladhitīra tinĕmu nira rāmya kāhasan</l>
.<l n="d">alwā lwir ni bañunya śuddha kadi miśra wĕkas ika lawan langit lĕyĕp</l>
2075</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="33" met="kusumavicitrā">
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">tĕpi-tĕpi ning lod hamuhara lĕnglĕng</l>
2080<l n="b">i silu-siluknyârĕja tuwi rāmya</l>
.<l n="c">hana ta ya sunghe bañu nika māhning</l>
.<l n="d">sawang akirim ring jaladhi langönya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (a) R ing for ning; S muhara (b) Q siluk-siluk (c) L nikā -->
2085<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">manuk angurambat ri tĕpi madhāsya</l>
.<l n="b">hana maputih lālana ri <foreign>ya</foreign> lumrā</l>
.<l n="c">prawala kumĕṇḍĕng kumilip atuntun</l>
.<l n="d">asĕmu mĕnur lwir pangisi jugâwrā</l>
2090</lg>
. <!-- 2 (b) = L, K yā -->
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">kadi lukar ing ken pata-patahanya</l>
.<l n="b">wijah angaring tang himi-himi rāmya</l>
2095<l n="c">sahaja rajangnyâgarawalan osyan</l>
.<l n="d">makukud umaṇḍĕm ri surud ikang [r]yyak</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (d) R sinurud, S sinutud for ri surud; = Q, K yyak, L ryyaka -->
.<lg n="4">
2100<l n="a">hana ta karangnyân rucira kasātan</l>
.<l n="b">gĕtĕm angisis munggw iriya sumanglök</l>
.<l n="c">aruñu-ruñu krangnya paḍa kasangsang</l>
.<l n="d">mrakata kasenwān ing aruṇa raśmi</l>

2105<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">hurang angaring [ng]kā ri hujung ika kweh</l>
.<l n="b">ya ta katakut ning wihaga tinonton</l>
.<l n="c">hana ta ya mengin sumayab umingsor</l>
.<l n="d">kamaga manambĕr mawĕdi layat mūr</l>
2110</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) = Q -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">hiwak umĕsat kweh paḍa ta ya kombul</l>

.<l n="c">hana ta pĕsut mwang balanak awantah</l>

.</lg>

.<lg n="8"><l n="a">gumĕlĕk ikang maikala ya kawantus</l>

2140<l n="c">ri gati nikêndah ya juga manunggul</l>

.<lg n="12"><l n="a">baṇawa kumĕṇḍĕng lumari layarnya</l>
2145<l n="b">angulap-ulap lwirnya kadi manambay</l>
.<l n="c">amarahakĕn śrī ya ta winawanya</l>
.<l n="d">yan ahiliran śrī nika pahawṛddhin</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">ikang amayang söh manĕnga[h] asangkya</l>
2150<l n="b">hanan awĕlah tuṇḍan ika tumimbang</l>
.<l n="c">lagi kabalik yêka malara kedĕr</l>
.<l n="d">tĕkap ing iwak kadbhuta giri tulya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 13 (a) = LR, Q anĕngah -->
2155<lg n="14"><l n="a">jaladhi gĕrĕhnyân kumĕtĕr awantö</l>
.<l n="b">kadi mangawe kawy angapi kalangwan</l>
.<l n="c">lalita lumimbak kadi ta ya mosik</l>
.<l n="d">agirang anungsung nṛpasuta Pārtha</l>
.</lg>
2160</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="34" met="visarjita">
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">rāmya nikang sakatinghalan i laku nirê tĕpi ning hudadhi</l>
.<l n="b">tĕkwan ikang masa tunggang acala diwasanya ya tânglĕngĕngi</l>
2165<l n="c">towi wĕlĕk ni kukus ning amadĕk i samīpa nikang wulusan</l>
.<l n="d">mukṣa paroknya ri sānghub ing udadhi hatur sapadĕlwan unĕng</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">mwang pasawah-sawahanya hana pakapasan tinalun-talunan</l>
.<l n="b">lwir tan apujya langönya sumaji-saji rāmya ni tambak ika</l>
2170<l n="c">kīrṇna panungsung ikang pasung asira-siran tan aganty amĕsat</l>
.<l n="d">kāryya midĕng ta widĕngnya pakiwĕng-iwĕng ing wwad ikang piḍaḍa</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">mangkana kuntul <foreign>ikâ</foreign>mulih adulur arantayan ing gagana</l>
.<l n="b">kapwa mamet kahananya n akulĕman apan paḍa moruk atis</l>
2175<l n="c">wāhu sirĕm-sirĕm ing kiraṇa tĕkap i sĕbsĕb ikang jaladhi</l>
.<l n="d">tĕkwan ikang braja yêka cumaraṇa urutnya sawang sumirat</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (a) Q aranteyan; MSS ika mulih (b) Q akulĕm (c) Q jaladha -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">ndah ri siluk-siluk ing pasir acala madoh hana mātra lumöng</l>
2180<l n="b">krām-krām ikang balĕman wahu makapuratuk suminângaraman</l>
.<l n="c">lwir balut ing liring olĕm anahĕli rapuh kawawêng śayana</l>
.<l n="d">swang mawarah hana wanwa pakulĕman i saṇḍing ikang pasisi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (b) Q suminang ngaraman -->
2185<lg n="5"><l n="a">kāla surup nikang ārkka kayu nika katon gumĕgĕs ya matis</l>
.<l n="b">lāgy amilungsungi rĕm nikang udadhi ya rakwa hatur masuma</l>
.<l n="c">aṣṭami kṛṣṇa tĕngah wĕngi umĕtu tikang wulan angdadari</l>
.<l n="d">lāmpah irêka muwah pira ta lawas irâsring anganty anginĕp</l>
.</lg>
2190<lg n="6"><l n="a">ring Prabhaṣa lwa[h] anindya parama ya tinĕmwa narendrasuta</l>
.<l n="b">kyāti pawitra ya tâmṛtamaya śuci śuddha hilīnya magöng</l>
.<l n="c">yêka patīrthan ikang Yadunagara tanora waneh karĕngö</l>
.<l n="d">hetu nikī n adhikāra śaśadhara upāla manṛṣṭya jagat</l>
.</lg>
2195 <!-- 6 (a) = Q (c) Q tan nora -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">ngkā prawarâryya Dhanañjaya mari ta sirân pahawan pasisi</l>
.<l n="b">rāmya matūt tĕpi ning Prabhaṣa juga sirêka mangulwan atah</l>
.<l n="c">mogha makung lumihat sakalĕngĕngan iki n milanga ng twas angel</l>
.<l n="d">lot asĕgĕh ri halintang ira nṛpatiputra mahā sumĕpĕr</l>
2200</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">singgih anindya patingkah i racana nikang lwa[h] apūrwwa lengöng</l>
.<l n="b">söh kusumâluru haywan* ing angusuma kāryya hanê ryyak ikā</l>
.<l n="c">mwang jĕnu kumkuma miśra satata karaṇanya ya nitya marūm</l>
.<l n="d">wwang ri dalĕm nagara pratidina umahas ya wijah mapuḍe</l>
2205</lg>
. <!-- 8 (a) = LQ (b) LQ laywan -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">byakta karang bhujaganya apĕnĕd anamar karang ing jaladhi</l>
.<l n="b">honya tikī n asawang dwiraḍa kinasut ing wwad ikânulale</l>
.<l n="c">yêka paran-paran ing mahas angapi langö umañut turida</l>
2210<l n="d">lot pamawāna nikâhañang adulur anis malihêng pasisi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (c) L humayut for umañut -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">arcĕp i tĕmbing ikêng sana-sini tuwi pāṇḍan ikā n panĕḍĕng</l>
.<l n="b">rāmya katon manguḍoḍa puḍak ika waneh ta mungup sumĕkar</l>
2215<l n="c">yan rinarah tĕkap ing bhramara kajaruhan ri hṛbuknya minging</l>
.<l n="d">lwir gati ning parawan lumaru-laru yathāsuka mangrabhaṣa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 10 (b) L panguḍoḍa -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">tan huningan nṛpaputra sira nṛpati Kṛṣṇa gumanty ajarĕn</l>
2220<l n="b">ndah rumĕngö hana sang nṛpasuta wara Pārtha saharṣa sira</l>
.<l n="c">śīghra n umundanga Paṇḍutanaya wara Sāmbha kinon lumari</l>
.<l n="d">mwang Yaduwīra sahaśwa gaja ratha surākṣa tumūt mangiring</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">ngkā ri ḍatĕng nira Sāmbha marĕk angayubhāgya ri Paṇḍusuta</l>
2225<l n="b">ling nira toh paratêng nagara sira narendra makon ḍatĕnga</l>
.<l n="c">sis ta girang nira Kṛṣṇa atawa Baladewa kagöngan inak</l>
.<l n="d">kintu muwah sira sang Yadukula mabungah rumĕngö ri kita</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 12 (b) S nira for sira -->
2230<lg n="13"><l n="a">ndah wwaya têki sirang nṛpati rikang Araiwatakâgragiri</l>
.<l n="b">bwat Hari kīrti pangutsawa diwasa niki n paripūja haji</l>
.<l n="c">tan kawĕkas sira sang Yadukula mangĕnākĕna hotrawidhi</l>
.<l n="d">yêku kalotakĕnanta ri hatur ira yan taya ring nagara</l>
.</lg>
2235</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="35" met="jagaddhita">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">nā ling sang prawarâryya Sāmbha ri sirâdara taya winihang Dhanañjaya</l>
.<l n="b">ndah mangkat sira karwa munggah irikang ratha Yadukula kapwa mangdulur</l>
.<l n="c">līlâtah tuwi darśśanīya pakatonan ing angiringakĕn paḍâhalĕp</l>
2240<l n="d">mangkā ng parwwata nāma Raiwata ya rakwa paran ira sang āryya Phalguṇa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (d) L Raiwatakā ya; L āyya -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">warṇnan posik ikang wwang ing sanagarâsĕmu salaga turung kagĕntĕran</l>
.<l n="b">mangke wāhu rumengwa yan tĕka narendratanaya kadi dūta ning kapat</l>
2245<l n="c">strī-strī ratna hanêng dalĕm paḍa sumöng turida nika pinöm wawang mĕkar</l>
.<l n="d">tan wring dāya kataṇḍĕgan tĕkap i kungnya paḍa rĕngĕ-rĕngön kĕnêng hunĕng</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (b) S wahwa -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">akweh sang makire sumanggraha manisnya n abuhaya ri sang hañar ḍatĕng</l>
2250<l n="b">dudw îkâguñĕpan ya tângucap-ucap sira winisikakĕn ya tan humung</l>
.<l n="c">āngrĕs kelu sawang linad twas iki de ni kawuwusan irâmangun lulut</l>
.<l n="d">nghing ganyêsi nikang gĕlung lamakananya tĕka pinamahugya sanmatan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (d) LQ nggānyê, L lamalananya -->
2255<lg n="4"><l n="a">wwantĕn bhranta managwa-nagwakĕna raśmi nika sira minuṣṭi ring hiḍĕp</l>
.<l n="b">lĕnglĕngnyân pangajap priyambada nirân pangalapi lara kungnya mohita</l>
.<l n="c">agyâmbĕknya tikī n umaṇḍĕma langönya pangudanakĕn* ing matâmanis</l>
.<l n="d">manggâlampwa kaninya ring jaja yathāsuka bhaṣama yadi n pakolihĕn</l>
.</lg>
2260<lg n="5"><l n="a">tanngeh warṇnana buddhi ning wwang i dalĕm paḍa malara kĕnêng raras hati</l>
.<l n="b">sang Pārthâta ḍatĕng ri nātha Harimūrtti papupulan i sang watĕk Yadu</l>
.<l n="c">mukya śrī Baladewa kapwa marĕpat sahana nira ri mādhya ning sabhā</l>
.<l n="d">sobhā sthāna supūrṇna de ni halĕp ing para Yadu kadi dewatākrama</l>
.</lg>
2265 <!-- 5 (a) Q warṇani (b) L Pārthā ḍatĕng -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">yêkā n śrī nṛpa Kṛṣṇa garjjita manah nira tĕkap i ḍatĕng sang Arjjuna</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā n sanyāsa sinungsung ing smita manohara wacana nirâmangun rĕsĕp</l>
.<l n="c">antĕnku n tan i rāt hiḍĕp mami manĕmwakĕna kasuyaśanta digjaya</l>
.<l n="d">ngkê paryyangka kitâri māsku tariman hana humawitakĕn tayê kita</l>
2270</lg>
. <!-- 6 (b) L sanyāsā (d) S parangkat for paryyangka -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">manghat-hāt ngwang i māsku tĕkwan alawas nghulun angapi gatinta māmriha</l>
.<l n="b">an munggw ing Himawān tamolah atibhāgya katĕkana mĕne n samāgama</l>
.<l n="c">pangde ning widhi haywa wismṛti hiwĕh sang anĕmu suka tan kabañcana</l>
2275<l n="d">ngke ring Dwārawatī pangantya ta kitâmutusa samaya ning mulih muwah</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (a) L panghat- (d) Q omits ta -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">nāhan śabda narāryya Kṛṣṇa sira sang nṛpasuta mararĕm ri jöng nira</l>
.<l n="b">om om <foreign>sājña</foreign> narendra pĕh nikang anugraha saphala namo’stu kośala</l>
2280<l n="c">nāhan ling nira sang Halāyudha gumanti ri sira n angucap sagorawa</l>
.<l n="d">toh rakryan [n]da matêki sang Yadu kabeh kita sahaja lanênarĕp-harĕp</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (b) = L, K sajñā (d) = Q -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">yêking kāryya kināryya sang Yadu kitâri wĕkas ika dumeh sulakṣaṇa</l>
2285<l n="b">ndah yêki n pangaropaṇanta sarabhāra ni kapagĕha ning jagaddhita</l>
.<l n="c">anghing mangkana siddhayātra pangaranya larapan ing umantukêng sabhā</l>
.<l n="d">manggĕh ngwang tumutêryy ulihta bapa tan kari ta sira narāryya Keśawa</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">sāmpun mangkana de narendra Baladewa tinulusakĕn ing watĕk Yadu</l>
2290<l n="b">ndān āmbĕk nira sang minangkana sawang kumuda mĕkar inaswan ing rĕrĕb</l>
.<l n="c">singgih lingta sinambhawânulusakĕn kṛtawara ri patik nareśwara</l>
.<l n="d">sākṣāt ambalan ing manĕmwa guṇa tan wiphala juga ng angaśrayê kita</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">henak rakwa patūt ni sang Yadu kabeh taya kawiwal irê sang Arjjuna</l>
2295<l n="b">ndah sāmpun tinamuy-tamuy ta sira sang nṛpatanaya samenakê sira</l>
.<l n="c">tangheh warṇnana ring samāntara surup tikang aruṇa ḍatĕng tabĕh wwalu</l>
.<l n="d">söng ning megha rinaṇḍi ning kiraṇa warṇna cinaraṇa ginantyan ing kulĕm</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">mantuk sang nṛpa Kṛṣṇa tar sah i narendratanaya malulut nareśwara</l>
2300<l n="b">songgwan buddhi nirârĕsĕp ndan atĕhĕr mangalihi parahasyan ing kuwu</l>
.<l n="c">sangsiptan gati ning paḍôpasama sang Yadukula katĕkê Dhanañjaya</l>
.<l n="d">sānghub mwang bañu ning samudra ya ta rakwa kahiḍĕpan ira ndatan pahī</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 12 (a) S tan; S salulut (c) R paḍa pasama (d) L irā -->
2305<lg n="13"><l n="a">byātītan sira sang nareśwara kunĕng tucapa gati nikang wwang ing dalĕm</l>
.<l n="b">lwīr edī ri hunangnya ta pwa masa panglwang amaribini tingkah ing kulĕm</l>
.<l n="c">wintangnyân pangalih tinĕngwakĕn awarṇna cala-cala nikang liring minge</l>
.<l n="d">wör ning hangsa lamuk-lamuk pilih akarwan ahañanga marêng ghaṭâlangö</l>
.</lg>
2310 <!-- 13 (b) S anaribin -->
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">kāryy âśā lara ning madhubrata kararwan inalapan anganti ring gihā</l>
.<l n="b">āpan tan mĕkar ing saroruha dumadyakĕna hala lakunya medĕman</l>
.<l n="c">sāmbat ning taḍaharṣa śoka taya ning śaśi lumawad i kungnya ring kulĕm</l>
.<l n="d">oruk trāsa sawet nikang nawami kṛṣṇa tan amĕḍar i tambwang ing wulan</l>
2315</lg>
. <!-- 14 (b) Q metta ring for mĕkar ing; Q alal kungnya for hala lakunya -->
.<lg n="15"><l n="a">tĕkwan mandra patĕrnya himpĕr angatag kalĕngĕngan ika tan sahêng kapö</l>
.<l n="b">amwat gandha sirir nikang pawana warṇna jaruman ing angantya mangkata</l>
.<l n="c">tan dwâwās pajang ing wulan suminang angdadari madĕg i śṛngga ning wukir</l>
2320<l n="d">lwir harṣân pangungang sawet ni raras ing wwang ahawu-hawu rāmya ring dalĕm</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 15 (d) S pangunggang; L ramyanya -->
.<lg n="16"><l n="a">aśrī rehnya parĕng marumpukan aśoka sumanasa wijah mabhūṣaṇa</l>
.<l n="b">eñjuhnyân pagunĕm-gunĕm ri pajang ing śaśi hana manganām kukūr gĕlung</l>
2325<l n="c">lāgy âpet kalangön wilāśa ni pagoṣṭi nika tĕhĕr alunglungan lulut</l>
.<l n="d">de ning kung rasa tan kalib juga manisnya katalĕhan anon niśākara</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="17"><l n="a">rūm ning strī winagĕd ring inggita mangambwakĕna turida rāga ning kawi</l>
.<l n="b">pantĕs yan mapĕnĕd tayângiwagakĕn raras i panalukatnya ring kidung</l>
2330<l n="c">sotanyân winicakṣaṇêng nagara mĕnggĕp amuwuhi manis kinangsyakĕn</l>
.<l n="d">tapwan marmma ri panggarutnya n angalih madhujaladhi langönya mombakan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="18"><l n="a">strī-stry ângendahakĕn rarasnya n apangus paḍa tinama tĕlas jayêng langö</l>
.<l n="b">anglĕñjĕp ta lĕkasnya manggupit angīrakĕna ri rĕcĕp ing swarāwatī</l>
2335<l n="c">sengĕrnyân pangalap gula drawa lawan madhu kasingi sakêng wuluh rĕmĕk</l>
.<l n="d">kady âmiśra ri tambwang ing śaśi ri denya n agamĕl awaśâmirangrwangi</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 18 (a) L angapus for apangus (c) L omits lawan -->
.<lg n="19"><l n="a">wwantĕn rāmya magoṣṭi kapwa paḍa mesi turida mamanis ginocara</l>
2340<l n="b">wet ning twasnya kaḍanghanan tĕkap ikang Manasija pamawanya koṭuka</l>
.<l n="c">kingkingnyâlayanan waneh majamahan rasa kakawin umunggu ring puḍak</l>
.<l n="d">tibrângrĕs hadamar wulan pangucaranya ya kamuni unĕngnya mūrcchita</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
2345<div type="canto" rend="met" n="36" met="śārdūlavikrīḍita">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">ndan sang wyāpaka sūkṣma ning raras arūm śrī ning ṭikângiṇḍarat</l>
.<l n="b">antĕn pwânggĕh irê narendra Baladewânopamêng kadyahan</l>
.<l n="c">singgih yan karĕngö hajöng nira Subhadrā sang maṇik ning purī</l>
.<l n="d">sang sākṣāt ñĕñĕr ing gula drawa maluy pwângaṭpadê rūm nira</l>
2350</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">rāmyâpan hamajang śaśāngka nguniweh strī ratna mungggw ing purī</l>
.<l n="b">wah rūmrūm wihikan masiṇḍyan agamĕl sākṣāt surastry âraras</l>
.<l n="c">nghing dewī sira tan waneh panikĕlanyêng gīta pattyânulus</l>
.<l n="d">denyâgasyak arūm sawang pasir anak kontw ing barat ning kapat</l>
2355</lg>
. <!-- 2 (b) L weh for wah -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">tan samwas raras ing wwang adyah i dalĕm singgih putus ning manis</l>
.<l n="b">anghing raśmi nirang narendraduhitā tan popamânunggali</l>
.<l n="c">lwir tuñjung sumĕkar manohara lumöng sangkê kĕñar ning śaśi</l>
2360<l n="d">aśrī de nira n ahyas arja dinĕlö lwir mukṣa-mukṣêng langö</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (b) Q nira (d) L denya for de nira -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">ndah ping pat ri tabĕhnya rakwa sĕḍĕng ing strī-stry ârjja rāmyâwijah</l>
.<l n="b">nghing dewī sira harṣa wet ni pagamĕlnyângde harip ning mata</l>
2365<l n="c">hetunya ñ jinĕm arja lāgi tinatā sor ning wungū mrik sumār</l>
.<l n="d">raśminya n winahĕl smi ning kayu manis lumrā minging mwang mĕnur </l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">ngkā n pāmrĕm nṛpaputrikâsĕmu raras rūm ning Ratih ring tilām</l>
.<l n="b">lolyânidra rināmyan ing kalĕngĕngan yêkā n panūkṣmê hati</l>
2370<l n="c">len tang pādapa kady añāmara mirir lwirnya n miguh kānginan</l>
.<l n="d">angringring karahan hanêng wiwara tang kumbang ndatan krākaśa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) L -putrīkâ- -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">lāwan posik ikang garantung alangö tan pāntarânrang patĕr</l>
2375<l n="b">rāmyârūm swara ning gupit sapangawat ning strī lalityâraras</l>
.<l n="c">kady âmakpak anurwa-nurwakĕna rakryan yan panidrâlangö</l>
.<l n="d">tan pendah wali ning rara dyah anawung śṛnggāra munggw ing jinĕm</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
2380<div type="canto" rend="met" n="37" met="girisa">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">kalĕngĕngan ika ñĕpñĕp ngkānê kwan paḍa rumĕsĕp</l>
.<l n="b">tuwi kĕtĕr i kusuh ning tūbanya n lagi karĕngö</l>
.<l n="c">palu daluwang ikânggyat śabdanyâmuhara lĕngöng</l>
.<l n="d">pali-palin ika masring sugyan motus ahañanga</l>
2385</lg>
. <!-- 1 (b) S omits n before lagi -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">gĕrĕh umuni magupyan lwir kaptyâmisiki kapö</l>
.<l n="b">kadi hamaji kucup ning puṣpângjrah sĕkar ing unĕng</l>
.<l n="c">hangani hati lulut kung mār mrat tang mayang amĕḍar</l>
2390<l n="d">asana kasirir angras mrik gandhanya kapawanan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) L omits lwir -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">sahana nika langönya n lālityângĕtĕri hati</l>
.<l n="b">karaṇa nira tan āmrĕm sang Pārthâmbĕk ira lĕngöng</l>
2395<l n="c">kĕsĕh ing anila sūbnyân mangde srĕp tĕka ring awak</l>
.<l n="d">walik umuni rinĕngwan sāmbatnyâmuhara pacĕh</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">krama rahina tĕlas ning ratri lwir pinisalinan</l>
.<l n="b">ri mĕkar ing asananyê tunghā ning patapan arūm</l>
2400<l n="c">hyang aruṇa gumulak ring wwe ning lod wahu humidĕr</l>
.<l n="d">kiraṇa mawa ya tumrang diknyâbhrā kadi sinĕpang</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (c) L arūṇa -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">manuk angaji rikang pang rāmyâsrang parĕng amijah</l>
2405<l n="b">bhramara humung aliwran munggw ing srak wayuh angaras</l>
.<l n="c">irika n awas irâdyus sang Paṇḍwatmaja maraḍin</l>
.<l n="d">kamĕna nira mangādhisthānâditya japawidhi</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">ulaha nira sang amrih kastutyan tan alang-alang</l>
2410<l n="b">tuhagaṇa tikung āmbĕk bhakti ng hyang ginawayakĕn</l>
.<l n="c">kimuta ta sira sang śrī Kṛṣṇânggöng japa karatun</l>
.<l n="d">taya wiluma masadhyā līlâhyas makin ahalĕp</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (b) S tikang; L omits ng -->
2415<lg n="7"><l n="a">nda i tĕlas ira kālih sāmpūrṇnârahup ajapa</l>
.<l n="b">krama umĕtu tan imbā ngkānêng gopura tumihang</l>
.<l n="c">wĕḍihan ira ya kumrām lwir wālārka cumaraṇa</l>
.<l n="d">dinakara sira sākṣāt karwê tungtung ing udaya</l>
.</lg>
2420<lg n="8"><l n="a">Yadukula tĕlas arppāt sāmanta krama sumaji</l>
.<l n="b">Haladhara sira sāmpun sahyâbhūṣaṇa dumilah</l>
.<l n="c">aparimita sirâwās singhākāra sabhinaya</l>
.<l n="d">prasama tĕlas adandan sang Wṛṣṇy-Āndaka maḍĕḍö</l>
.</lg>
2425<lg n="9"><l n="a">krama lumaku tumanduk ngkānêng kośala wĕkasan</l>
.<l n="b">prasama tĕlas atingkah rāmyâlĕp taya kahala</l>
.<l n="c">dhwaja kumĕlab ahoccâlīlâneka marakata</l>
.<l n="d">layu-layu ya ta molah mwang paṭṭāka kagurilap</l>
.</lg>
2430 <!-- 9 (d) Q paṭaka, L paṭṭaka; Q pagurilap -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">Yadubala wija[h] ewör ngkānêng maṇḍala wĕki sök</l>
.<l n="b">ikang angawat asangkyâkweh tang <foreign>nārttaki</foreign> manaḍeng</l>
.<l n="c">tĕhĕr amĕpĕk i kulwan wetan lor kidul anguhuh</l>
.<l n="d">murawa paḍa humung mwang gĕṇḍing roñji masahuran</l>
2435</lg>
. <!-- 10 (a) = LQ; Q maṇḍapa for maṇḍala (b) L omits tang; = L, K nārttakī -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">makin atiśaya osik kweh ning Wṛṣṇi Yadukula</l>
.<l n="b">jalanidhi kusumâñjrah sobhâhyasnya winulatan</l>
.<l n="c">nguni-nguni tikanang strī-strī ratnâmuhara halĕp</l>
2440<l n="d">paja-paja karikilnyân polah ning halis alungid</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (a) Q Yadu kabeh for Yadukula -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="38" met="aśvalalita">
2445<lg n="1"><l n="a">makin asinang tikang kuśala koparĕnggan i samūha ning Yadu kabeh</l>
.<l n="b">amanuṣa rehnya tulya suraloka kapwa winiśeṣa kārcanan ikā</l>
.<l n="c">apan adukūla söh saha manitra kairatila mulyawastra tinatā</l>
.<l n="d">asĕmu siniddhikāra pinakolur-olur ika cawli warṇna dumilah</l>
.</lg>
2450 <!-- 1 (a) L samuha; Q Yadukula for Yadu kabeh (c) S anuduka for adukūla -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">sta[wa] jaya ghaṇta-ghaṇti kadi panghrĕng ing bhramara medran ing sĕkar arūm</l>
.<l n="b">ya tika linangwakĕn ri panguhuh ni śangka nika sinrang ing gubar awū</l>
.<l n="c">ḍwijawara kapwa mārddhawa parĕng mangunyakĕna mantra sasphuṭatara</l>
.<l n="d">makaphala haywa ning nagara nirwiruddha hilang ing durātmaka kabeh</l>
2455</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) = LQ (d) L omits nir- -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">ri huwus ikârcana [pwa] wĕkasan mamuṣpa ta narāryya ring widhigṛha</l>
.<l n="b">lawan ika sang watĕk Yadu kabeh mamuṣpa Puruṣottam<foreign>âstu</foreign> kinĕñĕp</l>
.<l n="c">sumilih ikang yaśôttama warādi kañcana ya rakwa song nira kunang</l>
2460<l n="d">ri sira wasundhara pratita hetu ning subhagakārmma sang narapati</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (a) = Q; (b) MSS -astu -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">wĕkasan ikang walikrama gumanti yêka ta dināhan adbhuta dahat</l>
.<l n="b">wija-wijah aśrama-śrama ta sang watĕk Yadu parĕng tumandang ahalĕp</l>
2465<l n="c">tĕkap ing amiṇḍa-miṇḍa paḍa paṇḍitêng rangin abhindhiwāla paraśu</l>
.<l n="d">makabharaṇang katon larap ikang rasuk ri pasĕlurnya mangkin ahulap</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) S dinanan for dināhan -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">hana ta mapaṇḍĕngan tama silih-silih dĕha palaywan arddha wihikan</l>
2470<l n="b">parĕng apajĕg tĕkâruh-<foreign>aruhān apan</foreign> tinahu bhāwakanya ring ayun</l>
.<l n="c">kahalĕp iki n supatra lumarap siping-siping ikā* karahnya kumilat</l>
.<l n="d">gumuruh ikang gubar paḍahi lot amuntarang awĕh lĕkasnya rabhaṣa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (b) MSS aruh-ruhan (c) = LQ K ikā -->
2475<lg n="6"><l n="a">ikang awĕrö tumandang ahalĕp sabhūṣaṇa nikârasuk mangaraman</l>
.<l n="b">paḍa kumĕñar wijangnya tĕkap ing ḍaḍarnya sawaneh bapangnya kumilat</l>
.<l n="c">paḍa ta rumampayak tar uningêng ulah kawĕlikan kidungnya n akikat</l>
.<l n="d">ikanang aminta sungsungana ring larih ya mari lajjitângaca-kacak</l>
.</lg>
2480 <!-- 6 (c) Q ya for ta -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">ikang angungang wwang adyah ana tânak ing kryan inucap hajöng panagara</l>
.<l n="b">kapacĕh anon matangnya n atukup ri lambay ika tan wĕnang puji-puji</l>
.<l n="c">makin araras patĕmwan i liringnya de ni kĕcap ing guyunya n amanis</l>
.<l n="d">kadi pasamūhan ing madhu tinĕngwakĕn ri pamĕḍarnya wahwa samirah</l>
2485</lg>
. <!-- 7 (b) Q atutup for atukup (c) S omits n before amanis -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">awicaritan gatinya ri tiling hyang ārkka tadanāntarân sinapihan</l>
.<l n="b">ginaway ikang mahotsawa ri mādhya ning yaṭana de nirang Yadu kabeh</l>
.<l n="c">paḍa humaḍang tikang surasa sesi ning wukir alas lawañ jalanidhi</l>
2490<l n="d">wijah anaḍah sirêkana rināmyan ing paḍahi de ning anglawa-lawā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (b) S Yadukula for Yadu kabeh (d) S anaṇḍah -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">narapati Kṛṣṇa Pārtha Baladewa sang nṛpatiy Ugrasena manitah</l>
.<l n="b">karaṇa nikâsmu guntur atulumbu tulya giri pāṇa mātsya surasa</l>
2495<l n="c">lawan upabhoga sāsing inarĕp-harĕp ya tinĕke* tĕkap narapati</l>
.<l n="d">makin awĕrö kabehnya tuwi kāmbahan drawina sindu māstawa marūm</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="39" met="sragdhara">
2500<lg n="1"><l n="a">nā lwir ning pūja winyākṛti tĕkap ira sang wīra Wṛṣṇy âdimukya</l>
.<l n="b">sangsiptan rakwa sāmpun panaḍah ira kabeh prīti de śrī narāryya</l>
.<l n="c">kintu pwa ng Wṛṣṇi bhṛtya prasama-sama huwus pūrṇna ring pāṇa bhukti</l>
.<l n="d">mangkin rāmyâwijah ring guwug ika sawaneh lālanâguywa-guywan</l>
.</lg>
2505 <!-- 1 (c) Q sama-sama for prasama-sama -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">tistis ning wai kamantyan irika ta Baladewângrarah langwa-langwan</l>
.<l n="b">mangkā śrī Kṛṣṇa munggw ī wuri nira n ahawan sangka ring rājyadhāni</l>
.<l n="c"><hi rend="superscript">†</hi>sering sang Pārtha ring śrī narapati mahawan syandanâkarwa-karwan</l>
.<l n="d">byaktêki n Waiṣṇawa mwang Madana hatur irêng rūpa<hi rend="superscript">†</hi> karwâniwaryya</l>
2510</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) L ngwe (d) Q -êka for -êki -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">tĕkwan sang wīra Wṛṣṇy-Āndaka makin apadudwan [h]amet* rāmya secchā</l>
.<l n="b">honyâmet-met mareng pājaran angapi langö tīra ning lwah parang grong</l>
.<l n="c">bheda pwâmet marêng śūnya wana pangalusanyângungang sāgara jro</l>
2515<l n="d">len têkâburwa-burwan wijah akĕla-kĕlan bhukti tang laryya-laryyan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (b) Q ing ngapi for angapi (d) L wihakĕla-, S wijak for wijah -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">mangkin lĕnglĕng pamangkat* nṛpawaraduhitā sang hatur citra molah</l>
.<l n="b">sāśrī munggw ing rathârĕngga kanaka sakala hyang-hyang ing Karttikêng rūm</l>
2520<l n="c">anglīlā lwir sakêng sūkṣma umĕtu mangalih rāmya ning kendriyângras</l>
.<l n="d">sangkĕp tang wīra munggw ī sana-sini kaharan pādarākṣâlĕp ahyang</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) LQ, mapangkat -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">wwang sangkêng jro kaḍatwan kadi salaga mĕkar harṣa cittanya sobha</l>
2525<l n="b">gundik mwang ceṭikâsrang wija-wijah angalap pangjrah ing puṣpa sālas</l>
.<l n="c">akweh tang dampa hemâruku-ruku sawaneh nīlawarṇnâpajöng mās</l>
.<l n="d">yêkângkĕn satpadângdon sĕkar amiru-miru truh-truh ing ciṇḍagâwra</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) Q sangkê -->
2530<lg n="6"><l n="a">warṇnânghrĕt lunglunganyângingin-ingin angawör citta ning wwang lumakwa</l>
.<l n="b">lāwan hododnya māpĕs wahu mulur angure lwir lume lolya manglih</l>
.<l n="c">sanggākāśâraras lwir kamasihĕn amĕkul mañjarinyârjja rāgī</l>
.<l n="d">tĕkwan lunggahnya rumbe rumĕmu saḍawatānyêka mambö manambang</l>
.</lg>
2535 <!-- 6 (c) R inserts (lagi) before rāgī -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">abhrā tang karṇnikārânĕḍĕng asĕmu tajug kañcanâmūrwwa raśmi</l>
.<l n="b">humbut ning hanwam olah cala-cala rumawe lwir tan aswī gaḍung mrik</l>
.<l n="c">mogha swang yan miguh menĕh i pangayuh ikang lunglungan [-]* rumambat</l>
.<l n="d">rāmyâpwe pwa ng cakikyar makĕpĕ-kĕpĕk i sor strīnya tar sah kinuṇḍang</l>
2540</lg>
. <!-- 7 (c) S menah (d) S pwopwa ng; L makĕpĕk-kĕpĕk -->
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">mangkā tang kaywa-kaywan ḍara-ḍaran angĕsah de nikang mārutâlon</l>
.<l n="b">molih truh ning kapat ngganya wijah atamuyan rūm ning onĕng ya masyang</l>
.<l n="c">poh mwang manggiṣṭa wunglwan waḍara wuni paḍāly âcawit kapwa mĕṇḍuh</l>
2545<l n="d">kahyun-hyun pwa ng sakī kapwa mamupu phala ning wwah-wwahan tūt awan kweh</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (a) S inserts (kawya-kawyan) before kaywan-kaywan (c) Q wulwan (d) S tur for tūt -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">menmen kapwâlangö rāmya kĕtĕ-kĕtĕg iki n kendahān ton kalangwan</l>
.<l n="b">denyâpingkas paḍâpet raras angalĕpakĕn kabwatanyârṣa tibra</l>
2550<l n="c">kengis ros ning wĕtisnyâsĕmu gaḍing anamar ketakī kesisan ken</l>
.<l n="d">pantĕs denyângĕūĕk rāga turida ning akung kāṇḍĕhan śīrṇna denya</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">nya ng kĕmbang ning wanânrang pura racana lĕngöng puṣpitābyūha kīrṇna</l>
.<l n="b">strī-strī lwir kāmikāwīra rumabhaṣa parĕng kewala syūh inaswan</l>
2555<l n="c">sākṣāt singhêng raṇa lwir madhukara manurung darpa tan seng ṣĕkar mrik</l>
.<l n="d">hetunya n kelu śīrna ng kusumita hañangĕnya n sinĕmpal tan amwas</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 10 (b) L syuh (c) L tan sahêng (d) Q kusumata -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">akweh denyâkire raśmi sahaja pinĕnĕd rūm nikâlakwa-lakwan</l>
2560<l n="b">sarwwecchâśoka sinwam pakamadana nikârumpukan sāri sumrak</l>
.<l n="c">śrīḍanta mwang wungū bhūṣaṇa nika n asawit mwang kalungnyârjja mahyas</l>
.<l n="d">kāsĕngkānyê hajöng tulya sakadang ing akung de nikâpet manisnya</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
2565<div type="canto" rend="met" n="40" met="vaṁśamālā">
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">śrī Kṛṣṇa Pārthâta sirêki warṇnanĕn</l>
.<l n="b">matūt gĕgĕr lampah irân yathāsuka</l>
.<l n="c">himbang ri sor byakta langönya kongkulan</l>
2570<l n="d">katon mawit rāmya niki n tininghalan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2">
.<l n="a">wwainyârjja muñcar kumiriñcing ing jurang</l>
.<l n="b">waneh pwa tūsnyânalagâmangun langö</l>
2575<l n="c">sāśrī pwa lumbunya nahan kasĕmburan</l>
.<l n="d">byaktêki* kalyan maṇi ratna sök riya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) L wweyâ- (d) first syllable is short m.c. -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">len tang wiśuddhâmalabar sakêng wukir</l>
2580<l n="b">katon hilīnya sphuṭa mangduk i[ng] parung</l>
.<l n="c">ngkānêrikang grong gumuruh sawang patĕr</l>
.<l n="d">anrang* gubar gĕṇḍing ikang mahotsawa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (b) = LQ (d) first syllable is short m.c. -->
2585<lg n="4"><l n="a">towin siratnya n mahĕning larap-larap</l>
.<l n="b">ya têka lumrā sumawur kasamburat</l>
.<l n="c">tulyâñjalinya n mararĕm panungsunga</l>
.<l n="d">tĕbĕng mamūjā ya ta rakwa ling nira</l>
.</lg>
2590<lg n="5"><l n="a">anghing narāryyârjuna harṣa yan wulat</l>
.<l n="b">tĕkap nikang parwwata kady asanggraha</l>
.<l n="c">mrāknyân panguwwang ri hunur nikang gĕgĕr</l>
.<l n="d">waneh kamānak ya parĕng silih-sahur</l>
.</lg>
2595<lg n="6"><l n="a">kumbang lalityângarang ing sĕkar marūm</l>
.<l n="b">atūt hawan somya karĕngwa de nira</l>
.<l n="c">denyângisĕp sāntĕn awarṇna bhikṣuka</l>
.<l n="d">mangaswakĕn stotra ri sang rwa yar ḍatĕng</l>
.</lg>
2600 <!-- 6 (a) Q harum (b) Q ramya for somya -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">lāwan kĕtĕr ning camaranya kānginan</l>
.<l n="b">tan aśru minggut ya ta kady ameñjuha</l>
.<l n="c">mandrâpĕpö pwa ng puputĕr manambangi</l>
.<l n="d">sinangkyan ing pakṣi kĕturnya suswara</l>
2605</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">lung hing wĕlas-hyun ya marūm arumpwana</l>
.<l n="b">lawan ikāng aṇḍiwa moda tan kasah</l>
.<l n="c">munggw ing tahĕn kapwa sumong rumambaya</l>
.<l n="d">rinamwan ing śewala warṇna māsiha</l>
2610</lg>
. <!-- 8 (a) Q marumpwana for arumpwana (c) Q i for ing; Q sumambeya for rumambaya -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">tĕkwan hure ning prabhu sanmatān hana</l>
.<l n="b">latānya lumrânawĕng i[ng] sukĕt-sukĕt</l>
.<l n="c">kahyun-hyun añjrah ta wuninya yan ratĕng</l>
2615<l n="d">wruhnya* n pamārppat lungid ing wajâhirĕng</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (b) = LQ, K i (d) first syllable is short m.c. -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">tingkah nikang Rewata parwatâhayu</l>
.<l n="b">nahan winarṇnākĕn irang Janardhana</l>
2620<l n="c">ngkā têki kasthitya bhaṭāra Keśawa</l>
.<l n="d">pangöban ing Dwārawatī ya tan waneh</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 10 (b) L ing nirang -->
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">nāhan ta don sang Yadu Wṛṣṇi nityasa</l>
2625<l n="b">amṛddhyakĕn pūja sabhakty amūrṣita</l>
.<l n="c">amrih rika swārtha umaywakĕn prajā</l>
.<l n="d">pakāśrayan hetu nirâñ jayêng hayu</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">nāhan ta ling Kṛṣṇa ri sang Dhanañjaya</l>
2630<l n="b">ya tâmangun gĕng i manah nṛpātmaja</l>
.<l n="c">mangkin sirômangkata harṣa de nikā</l>
.<l n="d">atūt siluk ning palapat jurang-jurang</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">āhöt <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>hĕnunyârddha tĕtĕl wuluh nikā</l>
2635<l n="b">tinampik ing māruta manda moṇḍuhan</l>
.<l n="c">len tang kalusyan<hi rend="superscript">†</hi> minahângisis tĕngah</l>
.<l n="d">sawang lumĕnghay hangĕsah katiṇḍihan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">sĕngkanya lungkān umiring rupit-rupit</l>
2640<l n="b">gĕsing pĕtungnya n mapipit paḍângadĕg</l>
.<l n="c">kengis lumis kapwa matanya tar miḍĕm</l>
.<l n="d">lawan [h]abungnyân agatĕl paḍâmranga</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 14 (d) L ĕbung, Q hĕbang -->
2645<lg n="15"><l n="a">tangheh wiwākṣan [r]yy aliwat nirêng sukĕt</l>
.<l n="b">makin kacuṇḍuk kalangönya de nira</l>
.<l n="c">ngkāna n tinĕnghânilumañ jugêng hayu</l>
.<l n="d">pacangkraman rāmya langönya n uttama</l>
.</lg>
2650 <!-- 15 (a) = LQ (b) Q mangkin for makin -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="41" met="jagaddhita">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">wwang ri jro nagarâlangö paḍa katon raras ika kadi wimba ning tulis</l>
.<l n="b">rāmyânĕmpala puṣpa pādapa hangendahi hayu nika kapwa komala</l>
2655<l n="c">lwir hintĕn liningir patinghalan ikânglĕngĕng amija-mijah macangkrama</l>
.<l n="d">utpatti ng kalangön ayunya n aśarīra wahu mijil i pañjrah ing sĕkar</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">kīrṇnêkāng ahajöng manisnya sakadang mwang asana wahu wanwa ring nadī</l>
.<l n="b">len mahyas hangilo rikang wway amatĕh gĕlung ika winahan susup-susup</l>
2660<l n="c">dudw īka n panguḍoḍa tapwan ahuyang swang angiwagi kucup ning erttali</l>
.<l n="d">kahyun-hyun hamĕḍar pwa ros ni pangawaknya hana hanuji kangsya ning Smara</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) L -êkang (c) S kucur for kucup -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">strī-stry ârjâsĕmu citra molah amanis pamatan ika ri denya yan liring</l>
2665<l n="b">darpâweh lara rāga tan cala patahnya makiris anamar ghaṇâhirĕng</l>
.<l n="c">ambĕt ning pangawaknya tĕkwan akarah kalung asana lawan wĕlas-harĕp</l>
.<l n="d">himpĕr Manmatha sṛṣṭi-sañcaya hayunya kinĕḍapan i rāga ning mangö</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">len tang tibra lĕngöng mulat ri*lĕyĕp ing jaladhi hayu nikânggagat lulut</l>
2670<l n="b">pangde ning kalangön rarasnya tan i rāt rasa maluya hajöngnya ring ṭika</l>
.<l n="c">tan sengĕh kahuwan tĕngahnya ri pangol ni tali-tali nikā n dadak lukar</l>
.<l n="d">kengis mātra sawang gaḍing saphala panghurusakĕna* rikang jayendriya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) = LQ K li -->
2675<lg n="5"><l n="a">wwanten rūmnya wagĕd cumāmpaka kapantĕs ika linarang ing Manobhawa</l>
.<l n="b">denyâmangku puḍak waśângisisakĕn wĕtis ika kadi hetu ning jawuh</l>
.<l n="c">raśminyân panulis ṭikânak-anakanya hinuḍaran ikêng nakâlungid</l>
.<l n="d">sarwwecchâsidĕhêng karang tĕhĕr anungkuli kalĕngĕngan ing wway ing jurang</l>
.</lg>
2680 <!-- 5 (b) R inserts (tĕngah) before wĕtis -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">ānyāt ta[ng] sumarêng śilā śayana raśmi nika n inapi mūrtti ning puḍak</l>
.<l n="b">rūm ning pādapa len mĕnur tila-tilamnya jĕnĕk i lĕyĕp ing langit lĕngöng</l>
.<l n="c">gātranyânwam awarṇna sinwam ing aśoka sinawawa tĕngahnya n angligā</l>
.<l n="d">byaktâlūma yadin linakṣyakĕna ring śayana tĕkap ikang smarātura</l>
2685</lg>
. <!-- 6 (a) = LQ; S omits n -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">gundik rāmya mawā langönya mawilāśa sumalaga lĕwas raras nikā</l>
.<l n="b">hāmhāmnyân pangusir manis paḍa rumūpaka raras angĕnoh kinonĕngan</l>
.<l n="c">harṣanya n pamabak-mabak kusuma sinwam apĕnĕd awahĕl-wahĕl wungū</l>
2690<l n="d">lindinya n hamĕrĕh-mĕrĕh sama-samângrahatakĕna gĕsĕngnya molaha</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">lwir tan warśih apet kalangwan agalar-galar asana minging lawan mĕnur</l>
.<l n="b">tañjung mwang priyakârjja mĕmbang inangitnya sinahaja pakö nikang gĕlung </l>
.<l n="c">rupnyânwam tarawarṣa roma saha nopura hinadu manis lung ing gaḍung</l>
2695<l n="d">sumrak rūm ni wijangnya tĕkwan akase hṛbuk arĕja tĕkêng payodhara</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">akweh ngganya pamiṇḍa ning raras ikang wwang ahayu yadiyan kathākĕna</l>
.<l n="b">nistanya n taya pangharusnya ri manis ni hayu nira sang angdiri ng dalĕm</l>
.<l n="c">simbantĕn maṇik ing purī marĕki warṇna nira wiphala rūm nikâkalib</l>
2700<l n="d">hīnganya n sira sāri ning [ha]hayu* sūkṣma ni kalĕngĕngan ing tasik madhu</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 9 (a) L yadyan; L kathakĕna (d) K hayu LQ ahayu -->
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">ānyāt têki parantyan ing kalĕngĕngan kadi haniringi rāmya ning tulis</l>
.<l n="b">anglīlā pinahat karang tuwi rĕcĕp niki jinamaṇikêng wĕlas-harĕp</l>
2705<l n="c">honya ng jangga mure marêng lirang apiṇḍa lalayan ika rāmya tūt sisi</l>
.<l n="d">molur kenggutan ing samīraṇa wanginya n angasĕpi sumār nirāntara</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">nāhan parṇnah irân rĕsĕp lumihat ing kaka paḍa tinamêng gitâlangö</l>
.<l n="b">mangkin lwir prathimângarang hayu nirân hana hamarĕkakĕn puḍak minging</l>
2710<l n="c">ndāñ jātī nira tapwa rañca sira kewala puji-puji ratna ning purī</l>
.<l n="d">warṇnākāra nikang madhu drawa katon yan angucapa sirâparan kunĕng</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 11 (c) L jāti -->
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">singgih yan sira hatwik ing raras arūm maṇik ing ahayu jīwa ning sarāt</l>
2715<l n="b">bhrantā ng satpada ring puḍak milu lĕlĕh tan awĕling angaras ri jöng nira</l>
.<l n="c">anggöng tan makalib salah ng iḍĕp anon ri sĕḍĕng ira hanêng karang liman</l>
.<l n="d">hyang-hyang ning kalangön waling ning umulat kṣaṇa maluya marêng nirātmaka</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">ndin tan bhagna larut raras ni wiji ning sumanasa kalawan puḍak sumār</l>
2720<l n="b">yadyastun racanêng pralāpita kapāna wĕnanga ning amarwanê sira</l>
.<l n="c">māntĕn denya ya ta n pupug lungid ikang tanah ing angapi tibra tan padon</l>
.<l n="d">lit-lit ning karas ārjja hĕntya tamatan palaca-laca hirĕngnya de nira</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">byakta syūha langö nikang pasir arĕs winaḍal i lĕwu tan panoliha</l>
2725<l n="b">lāwan parwwata śīrṇna tan wani gumāp tĕkap ira kadi māryya lĕnglĕnga</l>
.<l n="c">mogâsep lĕngĕng ing tawang yan ika wastwakĕna niyata nirwa kingkinga</l>
.<l n="d">śrī ning tāman amukṣa raśmi nika yadyapi mamangun aśoka tan tĕpĕt</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 14 (a) L syuha; R inserts (adoh) after pasir -->
2730</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="42" met="praharṣiṇī">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">ngkā sang Pārtha sira ḍatĕng tumūt ri Kṛṣṇa</l>
.<l n="b">harṣâmbĕk nira mulat ing wanādri rāmya</l>
.<l n="c">ndan sang Phalguṇa sira mogha tibra lĕnglĕng</l>
2735<l n="d">munggw ing twas nṛpaduhitā maweh prapañca</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">nā marmā nṛpatanayâtañê narendra</l>
.<l n="b">yêko sang hinucap anindyarājaputrī</l>
.<l n="c">lakṣmī ning raras ahajöng tikung Subhadrā</l>
2740<l n="d">putri śrī nṛpa Basudewa ratnakanyā</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">singgih tan papaḍa sirêng jagat samasta</l>
.<l n="b">ndya ngwang rāsika tan akūnga denya mūrccha</l>
.<l n="c">anghing rūm nika taya len paran ya rāgī</l>
2745<l n="d">mās ratnôttama tar iwĕh wĕlinya yogya</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (a) S samanta -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">mangkā ling nira sumahur narāryya Kṛṣṇa</l>
.<l n="b">om singgih ya tika nahan walingta rakryan </l>
2750<l n="c">yêky ântĕnkwa tuwi rare sĕḍĕng sukanyā</l>
.<l n="d">wastw êwĕh karaṇa nikân wineh atĕmwa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (c) S kunĕng ndatan wanehan for tuwi rare sĕḍĕng sukanyā -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">anghing prārthana gawayĕn swayambarâtah</l>
2755<l n="b">yan sahyāharaṇa kunĕng ndatan wanehan </l>
.<l n="c">yan wwantĕn ta sira mahāprawīra śakti </l>
.<l n="d">wāny ângambila tan arĕs ri sanmukangku</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (a) L nghing sang Pārtha na for nghing prārthana -->
2760<lg n="6"><l n="a">sugyanyângawaśakĕnê tuwuh ny aringku</l>
.<l n="b">mwang tañ jrih tumahĕna wīra Wṛṣṇiwangśa</l>
.<l n="c">ndah nāhan ling ira Janardhanâtĕrĕh bwat</l>
.<l n="d">kady ânggĕng mawĕngis i citta Paṇḍuputra</l>
.</lg>
2765<lg n="7"><l n="a">sang Pārthâta sira sudhīra tan hanâwri</l>
.<l n="b">sakwehnya n wĕnang umawit syuhĕnkwa śīrṇna</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan ling nira tumuluy madĕg sirôjar</l>
.<l n="d">ndātañ jrih ri Yadu kabeh wawang ta mangsö</l>
.</lg>
2770<lg n="8"><l n="a">sāglisnya n hinalapakĕn narendraputrī</l>
.<l n="b">kumyus mūrcchita wiparīta yan pinangkwa</l>
.<l n="c">munggah ring ratha pinĕkul gupe sirârĕs </l>
.<l n="d">byaktêki n winawan irâhañang wisāta</l>
.</lg>
2775 <!-- 8 (a) S manggĕh for munggah -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">ndah mangkā ng Yadubala kapwa dīnacitta</l>
.<l n="b">sakwehnyâlara mabunĕk ndatan tinanggĕl</l>
.<l n="c">āśābhūta mangĕn-angĕn [r]yy awaknya nirdon</l>
.<l n="d">denya n tuccha lalu kumöl dumehnya lunghā</l>
2780</lg>
. <!-- 9 (a) L mangkān ng, S mangkyang for mangka ng (c) = LQ -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="43" met="suvadanā">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">sangsiptan lwir narāryyârjjuna tucapa tikang Wṛṣṇi n kapalajöng</l>
2785<l n="b">prāptânambah marê śrī Haladhara mawarah reh Pārtha ri sira</l>
.<l n="c">yêkā n sakrodha sang bhūpati wawang angadĕg tang mānawibhawa</l>
.<l n="d">muntab söng ning wulat kady alatu-latu sakê bāng ning muka nira</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ndah śīghrângambuṣâtyanta tĕkap i pamanas ning krodha kumutug</l>
2790<l n="b">dhik hāh Pārthâtiḍuṣṭâdhama niyata katon śīrṇnanya pususĕn</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan ling sang narendra krama madĕg angalap śaktyāyudha magöng</l>
.<l n="d">mangkin kady anyuha ng rāt mwang amalika tasik Rudrâgni sakala</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">sakweh ning rājaputra pramuka haji parĕng sakrodha sumĕgut</l>
2795<l n="b">tĕkwan kapwâtirodrâgarawalan angadĕg lwir singha masiga</l>
.<l n="c">Pradyumna mwang Gadā Satyaka Niśaṭha waneh Sāmbhâśru maganas</l>
.<l n="d">kapwâtyantêng mahāśakti tuwi kalilip ing singhākṛti sira</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">mwang têkang Wṛṣṇi rotângjuru sahana niki n kakyāti nipuna</l>
2800<l n="b">towin śūrâniwaryyêng raṇa jaya kinawih manggĕh kṛtayaśa</l>
.<l n="c">tāwak* yan daitya len rākṣasa kapana ya tan sāñcurṇa yan asö</l>
.<l n="d">mangke n <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>krodhânggakārânggĕtĕm aruh-aruhan wetnyârddha magĕlĕng</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (c) LQ tāwat (d) S mangkin for mangke n -->
2805<lg n="5"><l n="a">lwir syūha ng Rewatâwrĕg kĕnas ika tĕkap ing śangkâtri tinulup</l>
.<l n="b">gĕntĕr<hi rend="superscript">†</hi> ning bheri lāwan kala-kala kumisik yêkā n muni parĕng</l>
.<l n="c">lāwan pārgung nikang sāmaja kuda gumuruh panghriknya n anguhuh</l>
.<l n="d">nānāwarṇnâsulam tĕngran ika katulajĕg sarwwâstra lumarap</l>
.</lg>
2810 <!-- 5 (a) L syuha -->
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">sangkĕp sakweh nikang yodhagaṇa bala pĕnuh lwir tan patagihan</l>
.<l n="b">āmbĕknyânggöng kaśūran makin angipak-ipak tulyârṇnawa pasang</l>
.<l n="c">manggĕh sāmpun hinajñan sajuru-juru dumon Pārtha prih usirĕn</l>
.<l n="d">nā hetunya n paḍâgyā guragaḍa maharĕp hāmhām tan atakut</l>
2815</lg>
. <!-- 6 (a) Q omits bala -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">göng-göngĕn krūra mākrak kagiri-giri katon têkang Yadu kabeh</l>
.<l n="b">kewalyâmātyana ng Pārtha ling ika rarahĕn rohĕn tan inaris </l>
.<l n="c">kapwânambut laras mwang palaga nika kabeh sakwehnya tumihang</l>
2820<l n="d">garwwanya n kapwa tulyântaka sahana niki n magyângala-hala</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">wāgyūt [t]ang wīra mangkat saha bala lumurug ryy ângkat Haladhara</l>
.<l n="b">kapwârāmpak gumĕntĕr kakĕrĕtug asĕlur denya n silih ayun</l>
.<l n="c">cuṇḍuk śrī Kṛṣṇa tapwan haruhara ya tiki n cittanya n atĕgĕg</l>
2825<l n="d">yêkângde gadgada śrī Haladhara lumihat de sang narapati</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 8 (a) = Q -->
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">ngkā rakwân śīghra mangsö ta sira mujarakĕn <hi rend="superscript">†</hi>śrī Kṛṣṇa tumuluy</l>
.<l n="b">āyay hantĕn ndya donta prih umĕnĕng i lĕkas ning Pārtha wipata</l>
2830<l n="c">nir tang sānak pwa yânggĕhnya taya ng ingĕt-ingĕt<hi rend="superscript">†</hi> ḍo haywa tinahā</l>
.<l n="d">wyartthân sāmpun pinūjâpratihata rahajöng sāmpūrṇna hiniwö </l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">yêki n sampaynya yak ton lĕwĕs angapa karih denyângapuyana </l>
.<l n="b">dhik dhūrttâpa kramânggöng kuhaka juga tikī nirśānta magĕlĕh</l>
2835<l n="c">sis tan wring twang humöt ring smṛti wĕnang awamānântĕnta hinañang</l>
.<l n="d">göng mūrka crol ya têkā niradara katuluy denyângdĕha hulu</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">nāhan tôjar nirâpyak irika ta sumahur śrī Kṛṣṇa ri sira</l>
.<l n="b">ḍū sojar śrī narāryyâtiśaya mara hiḍĕp sang nātha tan ade</l>
2840<l n="c">jātī ngwang wīra bhūpālaka saphala jayā lumrêng tribhuwana</l>
.<l n="d">göng ning śaktinta sākṣāt jalanidhi winuwus atyanta madalĕm</l>
.</lg>
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="44" met="turagagati">
2845<lg n="1"><l n="a">nda nihan paramārtha tūtananta</l>
.<l n="b">purih ing paṇḍita ring jagat guṇajña</l>
.<l n="c">taya lamban amet wiweka yukti</l>
.<l n="d">tar iwĕh ring maganal halit kaweśa</l>
.</lg>
2850 <!-- 1 (a) R ndan (b) S guṇajñana -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">wwaya tang hari len sahāya tonton</l>
.<l n="b">ya lanâmiṇḍa paḍâtisūkṣma kālih</l>
.<l n="c">pamihang nikanang hajöng gatinya</l>
.<l n="d">ya tikā hetu nikang hayu n kadadya</l>
2855</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">kita ta prabhu ring jagat wiśuddha</l>
.<l n="b">ikanang durnaya tan hanêka mātra</l>
.<l n="c">kadi bahni mahojwala prakāśa</l>
.<l n="d">hilang ing sarwwa kalĕngka donta nitya</l>
2860</lg>
. <!-- 3 (d) S milangang for hilang ing; S kalĕngkan for kalĕngka -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">amṛtâtmaka tulya ring halangghya</l>
.<l n="b">umañut wyāpara ning kaluṣya citta</l>
.<l n="c">tuwuh ing yaśa dharmma śuddhadeha</l>
2865<l n="d">kita ta śreṣṭhi <foreign>rikā</foreign> kabeh byawasta</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (d) S omits ta; MSS rika -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">iti marmma niki n humodana swī</l>
.<l n="b">takari ng hīna hangalpa buddhi nātha</l>
2870<l n="c">si Dhanañjaya lingta yar masampe</l>
.<l n="d">katuluy twangnya magöng nahan hiḍĕpku</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">nya dĕlön prabhu yogya lingnya sādhu</l>
.<l n="b">yan ikang strījana wĕlyan ing [h]apeṇi</l>
2875<l n="c">mwang ikang maṇi ratna kañcanâdi</l>
.<l n="d">ya tan oli n paśujāti kāṣṭa hīna</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 6 (b) = L -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">ndi ta sang minahā n tinonta ring rāt</l>
2880<l n="b">agĕlĕm dumwal anak nira n sukanyā</l>
.<l n="c">kinayogya kĕta ng swayambarâtah</l>
.<l n="d">tan ahāt rakwa sirêng adharmma ring rāt</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 7 (c) S sinwayambarâ- -->
2885<lg n="8"><l n="a">nda mĕne apa tan kināryya ri ngke</l>
.<l n="b">ikanang kārmma wiśeṣa dharmma yukti</l>
.<l n="c">ya ta hetu Dhanañjayâprawṛtti</l>
.<l n="d">wara sahyāharaṇa ndatan ya hīna</l>
.</lg>
2890<lg n="9"><l n="a">nya katon pangaḍānya wīra śakti</l>
.<l n="b">ya pinintonakĕnâniwaryya deha</l>
.<l n="c">ri wĕnangnya malap rikeng* Subhadrā</l>
.<l n="d">takarih parcaya de nikang kaśaktin</l>
.</lg>
2895 <!-- 9 (c) Q rikang -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="45" met="mr̥dukomala">
.<lg n="1"><l n="a">yan swīnĕn pwa ya de nareśwara hade hiḍĕpku wiphala</l>
.<l n="b">āpan byakta katoñ jayārtha nika ring swayambara dangū</l>
2900<l n="c">yadyastun hana têki ganta nika yan prihĕn kawĕnanga</l>
.<l n="d">tā ngwang śakti wĕnang mamangpanga guṇanya mon Surapati</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (a) Q narendra ta for nareśwara -->
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">an sāmpun karĕngö pratāpa naranātha digjaya kita</l>
2905<l n="b">yapwan sora kitêng parakrama tĕkapnya kerang-iranga</l>
.<l n="c">sangkṣepanya hanêki rakwa kalĕhĕngnya tak magalaka</l>
.<l n="d">tūtĕn tan n apalenan ing yaśa tinunggal ing parahita</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">nyā tang deya hitāwaśāṇa gĕlarĕn tĕkap sang ahulun</l>
2910<l n="b">tapwan piṇḍah akon umundanga rikang Dhanañjaya usön</l>
.<l n="c">toh pūjān warangĕn śramākĕna huwus nda haywa wiluma</l>
.<l n="d">donyâtūta lawan sa-Paṇḍawa pasānakanta rahajöng</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (a) Q deha (b) Q umundang irikang (c) S smarakĕna -->
2915<lg n="4"><l n="a">anghing manggĕh i buddhi ni ngwang apa tan waneh ngaran ikā</l>
.<l n="b">hetunya n tan akūnga ring wimukatângatīta hĕnĕnga</l>
.<l n="c">nāhan ling nira Kṛṣṇa nora winihang tĕkap Yadu kabeh</l>
.<l n="d">tulyâg[n]y ângabaran galak nira kawarṣan āmrĕta haji</l>
.</lg>
2920 <!-- 4 (d) = LQ -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">somya śrī Baladewa de nira narāryya Kṛṣṇa sakarĕng</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā n maṇḍĕg wĕkasan kabeh sumalah ing warâstra palaga</l>
.<l n="c">tan dwâdan tumuluy humundanga ta sang narendratanaya</l>
.<l n="d">gĕṇḍing rāmya lĕngöng swaranya makapangharĕp laku nira</l>
2925</lg>
.<lg n="6"><l n="a">mangkat sang para rājaputra saha bhṛtya kapwa mahalĕp</l>
.<l n="b">hopĕn pasrang ikang karaṇḍan ira söh tikang gaja ratha</l>
.<l n="c">lwir <foreign>tūban</foreign> kumusuh grĕbĕg ni laku ning wwang ākrĕp angiring</l>
.<l n="d">sahyâbhūṣaṇa warṇna puṣpa wana komalâlaku-laku</l>
2930</lg>
. <!-- 6 (b) Q ika for ira (c) MSS tuban -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">lāwan tĕngran aneka warṇna madulur halĕp winulatan</l>
.<l n="b">abhrâpiṇḍa kuwung-kuwung manurun ing sĕkar sumalaga</l>
.<l n="c">lāmpah ning ratha len liman kuda sawang karangnya n alangö</l>
2935<l n="d">lungkanyântara ning lumāmpah aḍarat matambĕh ariwĕg</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="8"><l n="a">tan warṇnan ta sirêng hawan nṛpatiputra Pārtha wuwusĕn</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā n pangrĕgrĕg angolakĕn sang ahajöng sirêpu tan arĕn</l>
.<l n="c">mangkin tan humĕnĕng sirârddha sumawe ri sang Yadu kabeh</l>
2940<l n="d">lwir mātyângĕsah ing kisapwan ira tan wri rāt kaḍĕḍĕtan</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="9"><l n="a">hetunya n hinimūr sawet ni raras ing priyambada sira</l>
.<l n="b">māskw indung palalunta māsku kapana n waluy kita mĕne</l>
.<l n="c">heman rūmta yadin hangiṣṭya luputanta ring karatala</l>
2945<l n="d">lwâmbĕk têbu huwus purākṛta kabhukti denta kawawa</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="10"><l n="a">mangke byakta panĕmwa ni nghulun i māsku ratnaduhitā</l>
.<l n="b">yogyân rūmta silunglungangkwa musirêng kasinghan ayaśa</l>
.<l n="c">manggĕh prārthana ni nghulun rĕbutĕn ing lawan tan awĕḍi</l>
2950<l n="d">hīnganya n kinaniścayangkwa mapagê kabehnya ḍatĕnga</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="11"><l n="a">kas ning bāhu nahan ta tinghalana śulka ring kadi kita</l>
.<l n="b">tan mithyâku kitâta sakṣya ri kaśūran i nghulun ibu</l>
.<l n="c">mangkā śabda narāryya Pārtha saha marmmarâñulu-ñuluh</l>
2955<l n="d">anghing drĕs nikang aśrupāta panulak sang onĕk angĕsah</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="12"><l n="a">akweh de nira n amrahāsana ri sang prapañca malara</l>
.<l n="b">ngkāna n rakwa ḍatĕng watĕk Yadu kinon umiñjĕmi sira</l>
.<l n="c">anghilyākĕna sopakāra sawilāśa ning mamapaga</l>
2960<l n="d">kapwâwwat ri girang nirân ḍatĕng amūrṣitê nṛpasuta</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="13"><l n="a">t āntuk māsku ri sang nareśwara nihan pakon ira huwus</l>
.<l n="b">mwang dewī sira karwa keringa t ulih parêng pura mĕne</l>
.<l n="c">āpan tuṣṭa dahat manah sang ahulun humundanga kita</l>
2965<l n="d">tan pendah hati* ning lirang winilĕt ing gaḍung juga sira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 13 (d) LQ gati -->
.<lg n="14"><l n="a">nā ling sang para rājaputra suka sang narendratanaya</l>
.<l n="b">lunghā ng ārkka samāntarân laku nirân umantuk iniring</l>
2970<l n="c">munggw ing ḍampa wulung sĕsök laku ning angrakĕt ndan ahalĕp</l>
.<l n="d">lwir nārīśwara sārdhadeha manurun hanopama sira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 14 (d) Q nareśwari -->
.<lg n="15"><l n="a">ndan sang śrī naranātha Kṛṣṇa ri yawā lawan Haladhara</l>
2975<l n="b">mangkā ng strī haji kapwa rāmya sumĕneha meh tĕka nira</l>
.<l n="c">māwâwās ri sĕnö nikang sulu[h] aneka piṇḍa rahina</l>
.<l n="d">lwir mājar suka ning sarājya kisik ing garantung araras</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 15 (b) S tĕkĕ (c) = LQ (d) S surājya -->
2980<lg n="16"><l n="a">ndah ngkā prāpta Dhanañjaya mwang iki sang narendraduhitā</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā rakwân pangusap ri jöng nira narāryya kālih papupul</l>
.<l n="c">tĕkwan māri wiwal narendra Baladewa harṣa masĕgĕh</l>
.<l n="d">siddhā ning paramārtha sang nṛpati Kṛṣṇa nora kahala</l>
.</lg>
2985 <!-- 16 (b) L pangucap for pangusap -->
.<lg n="17"><l n="a">sāmpun mangkat adūta sang nṛpati mantukêng purasabhā</l>
.<l n="b">ngkanê jöng Basudewa nātha mawarah ri tingkahan ira</l>
.<l n="c">byātītan ri lakunya sang prawara Phalguṇâta waluyan</l>
.<l n="d">rāmyârūm papupul nirêng kuwu lawan watĕk Yadu kabeh</l>
2990</lg>
. <!-- 17 (a) Q mangkat ta (d) S apupul; S kuwa -->
.<lg n="18"><l n="a">mangkin söh awuwuh wiśeṣa pangiwö nirê nṛpasuta</l>
.<l n="b">salwir ning [h]upabhoga ṣadrasa huwus dine pwa ya hana</l>
.<l n="c">ndātan pis ta tĕkap narendra Harimūrtti sapriya tuwi</l>
2995<l n="d">āpañ jāti nira n kṛtajña kajanapriyañ juga lanā</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 18 (b) MSS upabhoga -->
.<lg n="19"><l n="a">byātītan ri sĕḍĕng ni sang prawara Paṇḍuputra hiniwö</l>
.<l n="b">lunghā pwa ng wĕngikāla sākṣaṇa pakĕg nikang sanagara</l>
3000<l n="c">mĕntas ring wĕkasan tĕkā ng rahina kapwa sāmpun awungu</l>
.<l n="d">ngkā n mantuk sira sang narāryya dinulur nikang Yadukula</l>
.</lg>
.<lg n="20"><l n="a">sang Pārtha pwa sirêniring mwang ika sang narendraduhitā</l>
.<l n="b">ngkā ring Dwārawatī <foreign>sirâstu</foreign> pinapak tĕkap sang ahulun</l>
3005<l n="c">nya ng pāṇigraha kāryya manggala wiwāha kārmma gawayĕn</l>
.<l n="d">āpan ya pranidhāna sang nṛpati Kṛṣṇa yan pangucapa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 20 (a) R sirêhiring (b) MSS sirastu -->
.</div>
3010<div type="canto" rend="met" n="46" met="-+---+-+---+------+-+---=">
.<note>Meter called Wirat Nĕtĕg by Creese.</note>
.<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">ḍatĕng ta sira sang watĕk Yadu hanêng nagara lagi sinungsung ing wwang angungang</l>
.<l n="b">manahnya paḍa kāñaran mulat i sang nṛpatanaya sirâdhikāra karĕngö</l>
3015<l n="c">ya hetu niki kapwa māprĕgi sawet ning abhinawa wawang marāmpak i yawa</l>
.<l n="d">rare matuha len ulañjar angaḍang hana lilu tumakul ya milwa mijila</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 1 (d) Q wulañjar -->
.<lg n="2">
3020<l n="a">paḍâgarawalan parĕng kapalayū hanan anguhuh arĕpnya tan karuhuna</l>
.<l n="b">silih sĕḍĕk arok waneh tang apipit-pipit aruh-aruhan tayêng lĕbuh agöng</l>
.<l n="c">alah ya nirupekṣa ring hyas asulung-sulung arĕbut anon ri sang nṛpasuta</l>
.<l n="d">dudū tang amahaywa kenya umijil ya katĕrag alayū ndatan dwa kawudan</l>
.</lg>
3025 <!-- 2 (a) Q kapilayu; S angubah for anguhuh; S kawruhana for karuhuna (d) Q kataragal alayu for katĕrag alayu -->
.<lg n="3">
.<l n="a">atīta ri ḍatĕng Dhanañjaya lawan narapati madulur cumuṇḍuk i dalĕm</l>
.<l n="b">yathākrama sirângusap lĕmah i jöng narapati Basudewa len nṛpawadhū</l>
.<l n="c">katanggama sirê Dhanañjaya apan lituhayu tuwi śūra śakti guṇawān</l>
3030<l n="d">lawan sawawa molihê prabhusutā hiḍĕp ira taya len pasānakan ira</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (d) Q mulihê for molihê -->
.<lg n="4">
.<l n="a">nihan ling ira he wĕkangku kita Pārtha kunang iki ujarku māsku ri kita</l>
3035<l n="b">prasiddha kita śāraṇangkwa taya len wwaya tiki Harimūrtty Akarṣaṇa tuwi</l>
.<l n="c">pahaywakĕna têki māsku kinatunggalakĕna bapa tan dagêng manah anūt</l>
.<l n="d">apan sakura nora bheda ngaran ing kadi kita sasawīja haywa malupa</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) L ujarmu (d) Q sakuru for sakura -->
3040<lg n="5">
.<l n="a">wuwus nṛpati sārjjawâmṛta haturnya manginaki sang angrĕngö rasa nikā</l>
.<l n="b">tuwin saphala wṛddhabhūpati huwus kṛtasamaya ri sandhi ning parahita</l>
.<l n="c">sirang winuwusan mangañjali umastwakĕna hayu ni wākya sang narapati</l>
.<l n="d">mahânginakakĕn rĕsĕp ri manah ing bala gaṇa rumĕngö saharṣa mamuji</l>
3045</lg>
. <!-- 5 (c) S amastwakĕna -->
.</div>
.<div type="canto" rend="met" n="47" met="kāmamālā">
.<note>Creese calls this meter Wirat Tĕbu Sol.</note>
3050<lg n="1">
.<l n="a">ri huwus nirângucap-ucap krama tinuduh ikang balâdhikā</l>
.<l n="b">tumitah tikang pamiḍuḍuk pasaji-saji nikang smarāgama</l>
.<l n="c">ri hatur narendraduhitā tiki n inayu lawan Dhanañjaya</l>
.<l n="d">śubhakāla rakwa sakatambaya ta sira ciniṇḍya de haji</l>
3055</lg>
.<lg n="2"><l n="a">ya [ta] hetu sang Yadu kabeh pĕnuh acatura munggu ring sabhā</l>
.<l n="b">mwang ikang balakrama hanêng nagara sajuru-jurw atingkaha</l>
.<l n="c">humiwö ri kāryya naranātha hasaniga kabeh mapadgata</l>
.<l n="d">tuwi sāmprayukta winidāna tĕkap iki n anindya ring halĕp</l>
3060</lg>
. <!-- 2 (a) = LQ (b) S -juru tingkaha -->
.<lg n="3"><l n="a">nda huwus dināhan umaḍang sahana-hana nikang walikrama</l>
.<l n="b">kawawê pratāpa nira sang nṛpati parama Wiṣṇu kottama</l>
.<l n="c">nguniweh wangun-wangunan ing gṛha ri yawa tĕkê dalĕm purī</l>
3065<l n="d">paripūrṇna kapwa atisobha paḍa-paḍa minūlya hinyasan</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 3 (b) Q narapati tuhu for nṛpati parama -->
.<lg n="4"><l n="a">asinang pwa maṇḍapa nikâhalĕp inululan ārjja bhūṣaṇa</l>
.<l n="b">sawawê tihangnya pinakokiran iki n apadudwan ing tulis</l>
3070<l n="c">tuwi wangśapatra lumarap palipiran i pagĕrnya bhāswara</l>
.<l n="d">tinulis-tulis ri maya ning tuwu-tuwuhan ikā sawang rakĕt</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 4 (a) R maṇḍala for maṇḍapa -->
.<lg n="5"><l n="a">katĕkê wuwungnya n apĕnĕd prawala cinaturangga wiḍruma</l>
3075<l n="b">pinapat hiwak tinaming ing jamaṇika paciranya tūt sisi</l>
.<l n="c">tinatā tikang kanaka jangga marakata lumĕnghay ing tĕtö</l>
.<l n="d">amirah tikang cawĕni simbar ika sinuji lungsir ujwala</l>
.</lg>
. <!-- 5 (b) S tinaming jamanika ri paciranya -->
3080<lg n="6"><l n="a">tuwi ghūrṇnitêng nagara warṇna pamarabal ikang payonidhi</l>
.<l n="b">swara ning mṛdangga nguniweh paḍahi haji parĕng magĕnturan</l>
.<l n="c">ulah ing mahotsawa kināryya tĕkap ira ta sang watĕk Yadu</l>
.<l n="d">kamĕnā nirângarĕpakĕn pawarang ira sang āryya Phalguṇa</l>
.</lg>
3085 <!-- 6 (a) S ghurṇitang; L pamara balik ikang -->
.<lg n="7"><l n="a">sirang Ugrasena tĕlas arppat i yawa nguniweh watĕk ratu</l>
